content.title: Nouns Esports 2024
content.description:
# Nouns Esports 2024

Authored by [Sasquatch](https://twitter.com/PartSasquatch), [Peter](https://twitter.com/peterpandam), [Brennen](https://twitter.com/brennen_eth), and [Gatsby](https://twitter.com/gubsby), with contributions from the broader Nouns Esports community.

## TLDR
Nouns has established itself in tier-one esports competition. Let's keep the momentum going! This is our opportunity to become a globally recognized legacy brand in esports.


- **Dota 2:** The highest placing North American team, achieving an impressive 7th place at The International 12 this October.
- **Counter-Strike 2:** The #2 ranked team across North America.
- **Super Smash Bros. Melee:** Our player is now ranked among the global top 10.
- **And More!** Exciting initiatives and fan-favorite teams in Pokémon UNITE and Brawl Stars.
​

---

### **Re-Introducing Nouns Esports**

We’re **Nouns Esports.** A tier-one esports organization on a quest to disrupt esports one victory at a time while proliferating Nouns across the competitive gaming space in all sorts of unique, engaging, and nounish ways. It all started with **[Prop 68](https://nouns.wtf/vote/68)**, where we picked up our first team and since then we’ve seen tremendous growth and success, now competing at the highest level in numerous esports.

We’ve had a crazy journey so far, and now that we’ve established Nouns within the esports ecosystem we want to double down and make 2024 the year that Nouns Esports becomes a globally recognized legacy brand.

Want a quick look at what we do? Check out the short documentary **[“A New Model”](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SAXzMQ8pPvE)** by our friends over at [nounish](https://twitter.com/nounish).


[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BkQ5q1vQa.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SAXzMQ8pPvE)

---
### **Dota 2**

Our story begins in early 2022 when Nouns Esports jumped into an outsized opportunity by signing Dota’s 3rd/4th best North American team. Our goal was to give these players the top-level support needed to hone their skills to become contenders at The International. 

The International is Dota 2's most prestigious event, bringing together the best 20 teams from across the globe to compete on one stage for millions of dollars, and this year we not only qualified for the event, but we turned heads and finished in 7th place as the highest ranked NA team in the past 4 years.

![Walkout Gif](https://i.postimg.cc/kGhdSX9X/2e2-Image-Box-1.gif)

One of our highlights of the tournament was beating the reigning TI champions, Tundra Esports, in a series peaking at **903,210** concurrent viewers.

![Adidas Jerseys](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJad9yD7T.png)

Dota 2 is known for its open ecosystem which fosters brand and business incubation. Unlike other publishers, Valve adopts an open approach toward IP rights, making it a ripe frontier for brand proliferation. Nouns already have numerous permanent assets within Dota and will continue to get more with each season that we support a top team.

![In-Game Items](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Syt8egum6.png)

Building upon our success of last season, we want to assemble a roster capable of being not only the best in North America but the world. Top 8 at TI was a great accomplishment, but now we're aiming higher and want to leverage our better positioning within esports to target more ambitious achievements in 2024.

We're committed to putting our players first and are proud to take an industry leading **0% of prize money** from any of our teams. Our in-game success is imperative to proliferating Nouns across esports so we always want to incentivize consistent top-level performance from our players.

![TI Placement and Prize Money](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/H1zZ_9qXa.png)

Our contribution to the post-TI roster shuffle excitement was met with tons of community hype for our announcement of Nouns veterans Gunnar and Lelis returning to the roster and the new addition of Dota 2 legend, Tal "Fly" Aizik.

[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/B1NV39bEa.png)](https://twitter.com/nounsesports/status/1723772464180650436?s=20)

---


### **Counter-Strike 2**

In September of last year, we picked up an unsponsored CS Team that was left astray by their previous organization right before an important planned bootcamp and together we built and supported the roster into becoming one of the region's best teams. Our team's record in CS2 is an impressive **13W-2L** so far, and is [**ranked #2 in all of NA**](https://www.dust2.us/news/41188/nouns-unjustified-jump-up-in-dust2us-november-2023-rankings).

![CS2 Players](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rkDBhAwQ6.png)

Since its inception, our CS squad has qualified for numerous top-tier events around the globe:
- **USA**  —  IEM Dallas 2023
- **SWEDEN**  —  IEM Road to Rio RMR 2022
- **MEXICO**  —  Paris Major RMR 2023
- **SERBIA**  —  CCT Online Finals #2
- **POLAND**  —  Thunderpick World Championship
- **SWEDEN**  —  ESL Challenger Jonkoping 2023

Our goal is to immortalize the Noggles within CS. By qualifying for a Major, we secure the right to have our own in-game stickers, which generate significant revenue and brand proliferation.

![Sticker Preview](https://i.postimg.cc/pLSLgtmj/dfsdf-Image-Box-1.gif)

CS2 was recently released this September and is currently seeing an all-time high in player count, with an active user base of over 40 million people in the last month and millions logging in daily. 

In the esports world, when a new game drops it creates opportunities for new players to out-hustle the previously established professionals. We are optimistic that our current positioning in CS2 could lead to significant growth of Nouns Esports revenue streams and brand awareness.

---


### **Super Smash Bros Melee**

Aklo, a rising star in the competitive Smash scene, now ranks in the top 10 on the global stage. Our relationship with Aklo has strengthened since we recruited him last year. His growing enthusiasm for our vision has motivated him to take on a greater role within the organization. Not only will Aklo represent us in Smash competitions around the world he will also be a strong advocate and leader of our Prop House initiatives.

[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/ByRYnYbNp.png)](https://liquipedia.net/smash/Aklo)

The community's enthusiasm has enabled its continued growth two decades after the game's release solidifying its standing as a paragon of esports. Smash boasts one of the most extensive fighting game communities, with a broad array of local events in numerous major cities, creating an aura of invincibility reminiscent of 'Fight Club'(without the explosions). Smash is here to stay, and our goal is to expand our presence within this dynamic community through Prop House for the foreseeable future.

While several organizations in the community direct funds towards events, none match our level of openness. Prop House stands out with its competitive edge, offering complete transparency in funding and proposal specifics. This transparency is precisely why we see Prop House as a future mainstay in the Smash Esports ecosystem.

---


### **Prop House**

With [Prop 119](https://nouns.wtf/vote/119) we experimented with two Esport Prop House Rounds,
- One that supporters players competing at esports events
- Another that supports event operators hosting local tournaments

We were incredibly satisfied with this pilot which is why we aim to expand & grow this part of our initiative.

For 2024, we'd like to engage the esports community further in governance. We have three rounds in mind that would be compelling to our audience.

**Round 1:** For players seeking support to represent Nouns Esports in esports competitions
**Round 2:** For tournaments seeking the support of Nouns to help fund their events
**Round 3:** For content creators who create content about our Esport teams and players

**Previously Supported Events**
Galint Melee Open 2023 - [**prop.house**](https://prop.house/nouns-esports/tournaments/8260)
Tipped Off 14 - [**prop.house**](https://prop.house/nouns-esports/tournaments/5985)

[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJ0q99q7p.png)](https://prop.house/nouns-esports/tournaments/5985)

---

### **Nouns Esports Pass**

[![](https://i.postimg.cc/y8v6hLrp/Asse3t-1-2.gif)](https://nouns.gg)

Bridging the gap between gaming and web3 has always been a tall order, however, we have been incubating an interactive tool for fans to solve this problem. Currently, [nouns.gg](https://nouns.gg) is a static website that provides information about upcoming matches, rosters, and important links. Over the last 6 months, it has served nearly 10k unique visitors and over 20k page views with about 30% of the traffic being raw Google searches. We want to take our website to the next level by transitioning it into a fully interactive web-app that over time will become a hub for all things Nouns Esports. 

The Nouns Esports Pass will be the first of many onchain experiences we provide for our community. It will serve as a gamified "passport" to a community member's journey through Nouns Esports allowing them to collect badges for attending events, level up, claim rewards, and show support to their favorite teams. The Nouns Esports Pass is being designed from the ground up to support an entirely onchain experience that is accessible to anyone, crypto native or not. We aim to achieve this by leveraging recent and upcoming tech such as [Smart Wallets](https://cointelegraph.com/learn/account-abstraction-guide-to-ethereums-erc-4337-standard) and [Passkeys](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7212). These advancements will allow us to design an experience where the user doesn't have to interact with wallet popups, gas fees, or seedphrases all the while not sacrificing the web3 values and primitives Nouns are rooted in. 

Ultimately, the Nouns Esports web-app will serve as a platform that we can leverage to continually innovate and provide new and exciting experiences for our community.

---


### **Nouns Esports League (NEL)**

The [North American Dota Challenger's League](https://twitter.com/NADotaEsports) (NADCL) will rebrand as the ‘Nouns Esports League’ (NEL).

The NEL will be led by [Peterpandam](https://twitter.com/Peterpandam), a TI champion and pod member at Nouns Esports since [Prop 119](https://nouns.wtf/vote/119) in August 2022. His expertise in the Dota scene makes him an invaluable asset in steering the league toward new heights. We believe that the NEL has significant potential for growth and can become the most popular non-professional league in all of Dota.

In an effort to integrate the Nouns community more closely with the NEL, all Nouns Season Pass holders will be granted complimentary access to all NEL events. This initiative is designed to attract a more engaged fan base to Nouns Esports. 


---


### **Additional Initiatives**

At Nouns Esports we’re always evolving and exploring different ways to reach a wider and more diverse audience, from competitive teams to content creators, our flexibility allows us to more easily bring nouns around the globe to a wide range of communities.

![csImage Box](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/r1S5pj9X6.png)

From the great success we've had in Europe with our [Pokemon UNITE division](https://liquipedia.net/pokemon/Nouns_Esports), to our brand new [Brawl Stars team](https://liquipedia.net/brawlstars/Nouns_Esports) from Brazil, more and more people are learning about Nouns through esports every day.

While we continue to focus mainly on our larger initiatives, we have big ideas for 2024 and plan to continue experimenting and trying out new things to further grow the Nouns Esports fanbase.

---


# **Goals for 2024**

![Fans Wearing Noggles](https://i.postimg.cc/bYbWbL6x/Assfet-1-2.gif)

- **Brand Awareness**
    - Noggles are on a path to becoming iconic within esports
    - Competitive Success drives awareness of how Nouns operates
​
- **Elevated Partnerships**
    - Adidas
        - As our first partner outside of Nouns, Adidas was our apparel sponsor for The International 2023. Nouns community member [Benjamin](https://twitter.com/benjaminlatsko) has brought this partnership to Nouns Esports and will continue his efforts of leading on the relationship. For the upcoming season, we hope to further collaborate
![adidas](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BkpnrFZ4T.png)
    - Two or more financial partners
        - Targeting partners who resonate with our brand ethos
        - Our competitive success has shifted the dynamics in our favor, attracting partners rather than us seeking them out
​
- **Expand Onchain Experiences**
    - Transition our static website to a fully interactive webapp
    - Deploy infrastructure that allows non crypto natives to participate in these onchain experiences
    - Moments
        - Structured and more frequent open edition mints that capture our esports success throughout the year
    - Nouns Esports Pass
        - An onchain experience designed from the ground up to engage with all of our fans, crypto native or not
​
- **Operating as a Non Profit Org**
    - Aligned with our vision
    - We don't need stakeholders
    - This is another opportunity to innovate within Esports
​
- **Merchandise**
    - At TI we sold thousands of dollars of product
        - Distributed thousands of Noggles
           ![Noggles Gif](https://i.postimg.cc/02KHkFht/rfframe2-1.gif)
        - Video clip at Convention Center of people wearing Noggles
    - Collaborated with Nounish Artists
        - Sold a varied set of items from shirts to hats to branded chocolate
            ![MerchGif](https://i.postimg.cc/kMLzr7D1/fsqqq-1-1.gif)

---


### **Budget**

**2,312,500 USDC for 2024**

The budget increase for Nouns Esports is a strategic move to match the rising stock of our team and players in a competitive market. Higher player salaries are essential to retain top talent against other organizations' offers. We're also introducing structured payments for support staff to ensure steady operations year-round, an aspect previously under-budgeted. 

**Breakdown:**
- **Player/Coach Salaries** -  1,254,000 USDC
    - Salaries increased to match market rates of our new & existing talent
​
- **Support Staff** - 549,500 USDC
    - First time we are paying the core team full-time rates
        - General Manager, Content Manager, Developer, Player Manager, Project Manager, Graphic Designer, & Wellness Support
​
- **Operational Expenses** - 329,000 USDC
    - Travel, Equipment, and other miscellaneous costs.
​
- **Nouns Esports League** - 90,000 USDC
    - Three Seasons, 60% going directly to the prizepool.
​
- **Prop House** - 90,000 USDC
    - Three rounds supporting players, tournaments, and content creators.

**Why an annual budget?**
- This is the typical term of operations within esports. This is what players expect and given the nature of the competitive landscape, what makes sense.

---


### **Org Structure**

These are the roles we expect to staff for the 2024 season. We'd like to work with the same core team that we used during our run at The International 12.
- **General Manager**
    - Business Development & Strategy
        - Organizational Direction
        - Partnerships
        - Merch Fulfillment
​
- **Player Management**
    - Manage Player Schedules, Travel, and Accommodations 
    - Interface with Tournament Operators
    - Assist players with meeting sponsor deliverables 
​
- **Social Media/Content**
    - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nounsesports), [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nouns_esports/), [Farcaster](https://warpcast.com/esports), [Tiktok](https://www.tiktok.com/@nounsesports), [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@nounsesports)
        - Thus far Twitter has been our primary social platform. This year we will make an effort to grow all of the aforementioned channels.
    - Types of Content:
        - Shoot video content at live events
        - Clipping online broadcasts
        - Producing content pieces with compelling narratives
            [![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Hyf1favm6.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hiyCyDcVIHg) 
​
- **Dev Team**
    - Maintain and build [nouns.gg](https://nouns.gg)
    - Capture significant moments as open edition mints
    - Build and launch the Nouns Esports Pass
​
- **Wellness Support**
    - We brought in top-tier esports wellness support earlier this year and both teams saw significant improvement in results.
    - Health and wellness practices
    - Fosters strong interpersonal relationships
    - Introduces stress management techniques
    - Nurtures team dynamics
    - Esports Community appreciates these efforts as it shows we care for player well-being

---


### **Multisig**
We will be using the same multisig that was created for Proposal [119](https://nouns.wtf/vote/119) & [263](https://nouns.wtf/vote/263) consisting of Nouners and Nounsfolk. We will be adding Nouns community member [Sam](https://twitter.com/SamScolari) to the signers list, making our multisig 3/6.

- Sasquatch
- Brennen
- Maty
- Oni
- Peter
- Sam

content.title: Nouns x Ledger | Global Partnership
content.description:
# Nouns x Ledger | Global Partnership

There has been a clamoring for a Ledger + Nouns Collab in the past few weeks…

![](http://i.imgur.com/N1ULyK8.gif)

**We are excited to announce that Ledger is onboard to create an OFFICIAL GLOBAL PARTNERSHIP with Nouns!**

![](https://i.imgur.com/p6DTFYB.jpg)

In this first Campaign, **500 fully customized units** will be produced with the help of the community which will be distributed in fun and engaging ways, as well as being available to purchase to the wider public.

- Community Distribution: **140 Units**
- Available to purchase via Ledger website: **360 Units**

**Ledger Nano S Plus** will be the chosen model, as it has the best value and customization options. Not only will the device be fully customized, but also the full packaging, as shown below.

![](https://i.imgur.com/AyvO2lO.png)

**Ledger will be an active partner** throughout this campaign and will promote the collaboration on their own social media channels and incentivize larger community participation.

![](https://i.imgur.com/xMsW2HT.jpg)

*Ledger has over 700,000 followers across Twitter and Instagram. **Nouns Ledger** will be promoted on both platforms.*
‎ 
## Community Designs:

For the community, by the community.

In an effort to create awareness and community engagement, a Prop House round will be created for artists to **submit their own designs of the Nouns Ledger** and its packaging.

Two designs will be selected by Nouners, one for the outer sleeve and one for the actual device. Each one of the winners will receive 1 ETH and 2 units of their designed Ledger, adding an incentive for active participation.

Being able to have **your very own design forever carved on a Ledger** is an incredible incentive, which we believe will garner **a massive turnout and community awareness.**

![](https://i.imgur.com/HX6EII8.png)
‎ 
## Ledger Quest:

Quest will be an educational experience for the public to learn, play and earn their unique Proof of Knowledge NFT certification, gain access to **Nouns Ledger** and a special raffle for those who hold the NFT.

Ledger Quest will be a 20-question, educational quiz on Ledger's website. After the successful completion, participants will receive a soulbound PoK NFT.

To prepare the community for the Quest, **Nouns & Ledger will engage in activities such as workshops and Twitter spaces** providing exclusive access to the most qualified experts on both sides to discuss topics such as Web3, security, Nouns and DAOs, to be scoped by both teams.

Ledger is strongly commited to the success of this campaign and will also produce several assets to boost awareness of the partnership and this activity, such as:

- Partnership Announcement Teaser
- Quest + PoK NFT + Custom Nano Reveal Trailer
- Custom Nano static asset
- PoK NFT static asset

![](https://i.imgur.com/ym4FAoA.gif)
*ApeCoin Ledger Quest trailer.*
‎ 
## Community Distribution:
‎ ‎ 
**- Ledger Quest Raffle (100 units):**

To further engage community participation and as a way to portray our public good ethos, we will raffle 100 units of **Nouns Ledger** to all those who successfully participate in the ledger quest.

Ledger will automatically raffle these units amongst the holders of the PoK NFT.

**- Content Creators & Nounish Ecosystem (36 units):**

We will be collaborating with influential creators who resonate with the Web3 as well as nounish communities, such as TNS, Nouns Esports, Gnars and others to be selected by the team.

Each will receive up to 2 units of the **Nouns Ledger** to help promote the partnership organically with their community. Our objective is to leverage their reach and credibility in order to maximize exposure.

**- Prop House Winners (4 units):**

As mentioned above, each one of the two winners of the Prop House round will receive 2 units of the **Nouns Ledger.**
‎ 
## Public Sale & ROI:

The remaining 360 units will be made available for purchase at Ledger’s website. Each Ledger will be **priced at $99 each**.

Initially **Nouns Ledger** will be available to purchase to those who completed the Ledger Quest and are holders of the soulbound PoK NFT.

**The total net revenue of this sale will be returned to the DAO**. If the units sell out the DAO can expect to see a very significant amount being returned to the treasury.
‎ 
## Funding:

- $50K USDC for Ledger Production: Investment for the production of the units and overall Ledger partnership;

- $8K USDC for Marketing and Community Efforts: Resources for effective marketing strategies, community engagement initiatives, paid media and an IRL launch event;

- $7K USDC for Distribution and Logistics;

- 2 ETH for Prop House Winners;

- **Total: $65K USDC + 2 ETH**
‎ 
## Team:

**[Mo El-Sayed ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mohsen-el-sayed)| Head of Community & Education @ Ledger**

Marketing, Brand Strategy and Community Building specialist with 10 years of insight into the intersection of technology and culture. Having a background in creative strategy and film production, as well as experience in consumer tech and a thing for gaming, I've embarked on a journey to explore, narrate and onboard people and brands onto the next era of the internet: Web3 and the Open Metaverse.

Currently heading the Community & Education department at Ledger, working alongside a team of passionate creators, educators and community builders who leverage technology and culture to create engaging content, build innovative products and design experiences that empower communities to confidently navigate Web3.

[**João Borges**](https://twitter.com/joaocsb)

In crypto since 2017 and one of the most prominent leaders of the gaming industry in Brazil. Currently Co-founder of bayz, one of the largest Community Builders/Publishers of Web3 games in Latin America and former official representative of ‘The Sandbox’, in Brazil.

Led one of the largest eSports organizations in Brazil, former Head of Innovation and Mobile Gaming at INTZ. Lecturer and Mentor of programs such as Startup Weekend, FRST Falconi and Gama Experience, as well as making the Forbes Under 30 2022 list.

[**TheBower**](https://twitter.com/thebower_)

Bower is deeply connected with the Nouns ecosystem, owning a Noun and actively contributing to the community in several projects such as Nouns Esports Brasil, NounsBR as well as his newsletter Active Governance. He is involved in the crypto industry since 2015, having a deep understanding of the technology and culture.

Bower is an experienced manager and producer leading projects at marketing agencies and music festivals such as Electric Daisy Carnival and Ultra Music Festival.

[**jp.⌐◨-◨**](https://twitter.com/eusou_jp)

Motion designer, content creator and community builder. Building the Nouniverse for more than a year, involved in projects such as Nouns Esports Brasil, Public Good Beer, The Noun Square, Nouns in Rio and others.

👾

content.title: Index the Noun Hunter
content.description:
# Index the Noun Hunter

**Disclaimer: Nobody asked me to put this prop up, it just makes sense to me.**

Index is running an experiment in throwing weight behind zero weight votes with reason (via zeroweight.eth) and Noun 747 is the perfect Noun to be used in this experiment. The process is currently manual with rumours of an automated solution in development.

**Why do this?**

- This empowers individuals looking to participate as a zero weight voter
- Noun 747 is then pretty much guaranteed to not be sold or dilute "BV" etc
- Index card is arguably one of the most valuable memes within the Nouns experiment and we should provide the tools needed to grow the meme

I believe Index to be a special one-off case and I don't see a similar scenario appearing again anytime soon, therefore I am including the "Verbs bonus" of 16e to cover any unforeseen expenditure and as retro/future compensation for 24/7 participation (suspected neural-implant of the Nouns DAO), acting as a money lender for those in need and being a much needed source of humour and memes whilst exhibiting commitment to a lifetime of servitude at the DAO.

**FAQ**
Q: Why would we give index another Noun, as we just gifted Noun 809?
A: This is a totally separate scenario and the Noun will instantly become an active voter giving an entirely new and different perspective to that of Index/Nouns 809 & 487
Q: Why don't we just delegate the noun?
A: This adds a layer of (imo unnecessary) complexity to achieve the same result

**zeroweight.eth** - let's make this happen:
![zero weight](https://raw.seadn.io/files/e3e0406f5f43700c100108e90865cca9.svg)

content.title: Gift Nouns to Nounish Founders: Lil Nounders
content.description:
# Gift Nouns to Nounish Founders: Lil Nounders

**tl;dr - Honor early founders of nounish communities: Lil Nounders**

This is the third of a set of proposals to gift Nouns to the founders of the first three Nouns forks who proliferated Nouns via unique iterations of nounish DAOs which evolved into the largest nounish communities today.

I feel the reputation of these founders precedes them, so I'll be brief. These three founders were very early builders in the Nouns ecosystem, without them the most active nounish communities today would not exist. Not only were they behind the earliest iterations of the Nouns auction and DAO structure, they have continued to contribute to the ecosystem as time has gone on.

As devoted builders in the nouniverse, they have proven their value and alignment with the DAO and would be ideal candidates to receive Nouns. 

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SyYinN_M6.png)
[*Source (h/t MikeGood, Lil Nouner)*](https://twitter.com/GoodBeats/status/1706019634246213811)

These communities **far** exceed the size of the community of Nouners. The majority of people who are active in the Nouns ecosystem are involved through one of these sub-DAO communities.


---

## Lil Nouns

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SkFTSNdMT.png)
* **dot** and **adelidusiam**, lil nounders at [Lil Nouns](https://lilnouns.wtf/):
    * The first full Nouns fork (utilized both nounish auctions and governance mechanism)
    * Launched May 11, 2022
    * 1 every 15 minutes
    * Uses unique art - Nouns, but Lil
    * Nouns DAO Reward: Every 11th Lil Noun token is sent to Nouns DAO
    * Contributed over $2 million to the Nouns treasury
    * Proposal pipeline to Nouns: finding, nounspilling, piloting then supporting many builders to pass props at Nouns
    * Governance pipeline to Nouns: 41 wallets purchased Lil Nouns before their first Noun

---

## Notable Works from Lils

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/H1nm64OMa.png)
Lil Nouns has **proven** itself as a launch point for those interested in Nouns, with many Nouners having purchased a Lil Noun long before their first Noun. [*Source (also by MikeGood)*](https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/mike.g1931/viz/fromlilholdertonounsholder_v1/Sheet4)

content.title: Gift a Noun to Nounish Founders: gami
content.description:
# Gift a Noun to Nounish Founders: gami

**tl;dr - Honor early founders of nounish communities: gami**

This is the second of a set of proposals to gift Nouns to the founders of the first three Nouns forks who proliferated Nouns via unique iterations of nounish DAOs which evolved into the largest nounish communities today.

I feel the reputation of these founders precedes them, so I'll be brief. These three founders were very early builders in the Nouns ecosystem, without them the most active nounish communities today would not exist. Not only were they behind the earliest iterations of the Nouns auction and DAO structures, they have continued to contribute to the ecosystem as time has gone on.

As devoted builders in the nouniverse, they have proven their value and alignment with the DAO and would be ideal candidates to receive Nouns. 

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SyYinN_M6.png)
[*Source (h/t MikeGood, Lil Nouner)*](https://twitter.com/GoodBeats/status/1706019634246213811)

These communities **far** exceed the size of the community of Nouners. The majority of people who are active in the Nouns ecosystem are involved through one of these sub-DAO communities.


---

## [gami](https://gami.wtf)

* Founder of:
    * [Gnars](https://www.gnars.wtf/)
        * The second Nouns fork (Launched February 15, 2022)
        * Utilized the Nouns auction mechanism but not onchain governance (only initially, Gnars have since migrated to full onchain governance)
        * Originally auctioned 1 Gnar per 666 blocks with no auction extensions, which led to the community rallying around the end of the auction like a game and attempting to snipe each other in the final block
        * Uses unique art - incorporated the Gnars hand logo and each Gnar held a skateboard in the v1 art
        * Gnars v2 reduced the auction time to 10 minutes and implemented the Gnarving - every 1,000 auctions the auction duration doubles. Currently the auction duration is 80 minutes.
    * [Tings](https://tings.wtf/)
        * The fourth Nouns fork (Launched May 31, 2022)
        * The second full Nouns fork (utilized both nounish auctions and onchain governance mechanism)
        * 1 auction every 2 weeks
    * [Art Haus](https://art.haus/)
    * [Omega](https://www.omega.build/)
    * [Forgeries](https://www.forgeries.wtf/)
* Contributed to Nouns Proposals [51](https://nouns.wtf/vote/51), [164](https://nouns.wtf/vote/164), [165](https://nouns.wtf/vote/165), [189](https://nouns.wtf/vote/189), [231](https://nouns.wtf/vote/231), [260](https://nouns.wtf/vote/260), [266](https://nouns.wtf/vote/266), [269](https://nouns.wtf/vote/269), [363](https://nouns.wtf/vote/363), [382](https://nouns.wtf/vote/382), [393](https://nouns.wtf/vote/393), [402](https://nouns.wtf/vote/402)
* Contributed over 200 ETH to the Nouns treasury via auctions
    * [Noun 189](https://nouns.wtf/noun/189): 89.89 ETH
    * [Noun 401](https://nouns.wtf/noun/401): 95.32 ETH (Given away through an [Omega raffle](https://twitter.com/0xigami/status/1579311847081025536))
    * [Noun 542](https://nouns.wtf/noun/542): 30.69 ETH (Sold at breakeven but ended up [making it's way to Bob Burnquist](https://nouns.wtf/vote/402))
    * Total = 215.9 ETH
* Coined the term ["droposal"](https://twitter.com/0xigami/status/1610072306868707329)
* First person to [submit a new Noun trait to Noundry](https://github.com/nounsDAO/noundry/pull/3)
* Onboarded [Lil Bubble](https://twitter.com/TheCryptoBubble) and [Mr Seaks](https://twitter.com/SeaksMr) and appeared in some of their nounish media:
    * Lil Bubble's [FOREVER LONG!?](https://twitter.com/TheCryptoBubble/status/1557476902763302913) video 
    * Lil Bubble's [Have You Heard About NFTs?](https://twitter.com/TheCryptoBubble/status/1648306633863225349) video
    * Mr Seaks' [Pencil pushin'](https://twitter.com/SeaksMr/status/1645730955389452289) video (winner of the [Nouns Video Contest](https://prop.house/nouns/$200k-video-contest-final-vote/6042))
* Coordinated the [AO Metaverse Collaboration](https://twitter.com/AOmetaverse/status/1603937313842946049)
* Promoted Nouns on popular podcasts:
    * ufo: [serendipity machines & hypercultures — lght + gami](https://pod.link/1647366883/episode/3c8eed96ba6d7eeeb0784eaedfb7af52)
    * web3 galaxy brain: [crypto producer and founder of gnars](https://pod.link/1601791381/episode/db055258617d1b182f4518103c98a8e5)
    * ufo: [skateboarding in a cc0ciety with nouns & gnars](https://pod.link/1647366883/episode/5bce72ce2e0abce2e321438901fb2b00)
    * defire: [selling nfts and building the red bull of web3](https://pod.link/1475404980/episode/27f78698090a2ad1bc0d6e75f6d4572b)
    * mint: [decoding the intersection of skating and daos](https://pod.link/1575762146/episode/cc4f52ff77ff2e3c9f0c6b2018141377)
* Author of ["Hypercommons: A Manifesto for a Positive Sum World"](https://hypercommons.wtf/)



![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SkEP8VdGT.png)

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1tbuVdz6.png)
*Gnar #0*

---

content.title: 🔥 The Burn: pause for now
content.description:
# 🔥 The Burn: pause for now

## TLDR
1. Support dealing with the arb with current protocol nobs.
2. Pull audit funds back to the USDC payer contract.

## Description

The original burn design was meant to mitigate the arb in the short term, and it did so by burning BV in excess of recent auction prices immediately, with no delay.

The spec changed to give voters more coordination time, and that led to the burn no longer mitigating short term arb.

We spent time discussing additional changes to combine with the burn, e.g. require noun age to fork, and decided it’s all too complex and the problem can be solved with existing tools.

We wrote [the arb analysis post](https://mirror.xyz/verbsteam.eth/W4gaOrp6NC6jopc6vGsGuhz3o4ej0G_0TFhBlcLed94) after this realization, hoping to provide voters with a framework on how to take action with protocol as it currently is.

Since the burn in its current spec doesn’t solve the arb and seems to have lost some consensus and momentum, we suggest dropping it at least until the current arb problem is dramatically mitigated, i.e. BV is equal-ish to natural demand.

Once we’re in that reality we can revisit the value of adding the burn and certainly do so if there’s enough energy behind it!

## Transaction

Withdraw the audit funds from the Tech Grants multisig back to the Payer contract, which is where the DAO holds USDC to fund proposals.

## Summary

Please signal if you agree/disagree and articulate your thoughts in the reason text; the more people signal, the more accurate our understanding of consensus will be.

Thanks!

content.title: Buy Nouns From Lil Nouns DAO (pt 2)
content.description:
# Buy Nouns From Lil Nouns DAO (pt 2)

In the interest of providing a fair/functional/uniform minority protection, I would like to propose that Nouns DAO purchase Lil Nouns 16 Nouns tokens at the BV valuation the time of [Prop 162](https://lilnouns.wtf/vote/162). This is part 2 which is for 10 Nouns, part 1 is for 5 Nouns. 

Subdaos/fractional Noun owners are unfairly disadvantaged by Nouns Fork due to the unpreventable (unless addtl infra is built) risk of 51% attack once assets hit the fork treasury. Additionally, there are economic forces that incentivize using these Nouns as leverage to expedite meeting forking threshold, even if an additional attack is not carried out. This too is a classic sybil vulnerability where token-holders have economic incentives outside of a dao greater than those inside, and the nouns fork itself is in this case the primary driver.

fractional owners should not be unduly exposed to an additional layer of risk for carrying out their exit prerogative, or be coerced into exit by a hostile token majority motivated by self-enrichment.

Currently there are 2 props up to sell all 16 of our Nouns for 21.5eth, these props will not be cancelled unless this prop was put up. There are also 2 additional props up to sell 15 Nouns at 23eth as well.

content.title: Increase Fork Period to 10.5 days
content.description:
# Increase Fork Period to 10.5 days

Looking for a sponsor-  

Even if Subdaos/fractional owners manage to add governance logic bypassing risk of 51% attack associated w forking, 3.5 days is often not enough time for proposal cadences to complete.  

10.5 days generously accommodates a 10-day turnaround with a little time to get a proposal together (helpful in instances when fork calls are able to bypass escrow phase)

content.title: One Noun, Every Day, Forever... in an Action Rogue-Lite Game! V2
content.description:
# One Noun, Every Day, Forever... in an Action Rogue-Lite Game! V2

# Proposal

![Header](https://i.imgur.com/Aw5LE39.png)

**Play as One Noun, Every Day, Forever, in an action rogue-lite game developed in collaboration with Nouns and Forgotten Runes Wizard’s Cult to be released on Steam/PC!**

### **TL;DR**
We are asking for $75,000 to deliver a polished and playable vertical slice for our indie Nouns game developed in Godot 4.  We will also explore the game mechanics and creative direction with the Nouns community to discover product-market fit.

Play our pre-production demo [here](https://thepixelshop.itch.io/nounstown-demo)!

# A Vertical Slice of One Noun, Every Day

![stage_nouns_v_souls.png](https://i.imgur.com/hK0MOWs.png)

**The One Noun, Every Day game mode will be the hook and anchor behind this game.  We want to re-imagine the continuity and diversity of Nouns through the lens of a dynamic and captivating game for the masses**.  

Just as each blockchain hash determines the traits for each noun, every day, we will use a game seed to generate new elements for a each game, every day.  These changing elements include Nouns equipped with fun and diverse items, a generative world map populated with vibrant environments, random upgrades available to select from, and enemy minions and bosses you must battle to win.  Every player will have a 24 hour rolling period to defeat each version of the game.  This innovative mechanic has the potential to fuel a social and competitive gaming culture due to the following reasons:

- Replayability - Optimize gameplay strategies through trial and error as you explore new characters and maps
- Progression - Unlock new content and playable characters to use in the “Classic Mode” by defeating the game and a robust achievement system
- Competition - Compete against all other players for the fastest clear time, and more importantly, bragging rights!
- Game Metas - Discover unpredictable metas in a dynamic Nounish world

## **Funding Details and Deliverables**

**We are asking for $75,000 to develop a polished and playable vertical slice of the One Noun, Every Day game loop to demonstrate our intended player experience.** 

This funding request provides for a $65,000 production budget (approximately 1,500 hours) and a $10,000 marketing budget, over an approximately 3-month period.  Key features required to produce this vertical slice include player character design, items and upgrades, environment design, sound design, UI/UX, and a single boss encounter.  Each feature will go through design and documentation, art and animation, programming and development, sound design, and testing and quality assurance, as applicable.  The deliverables and estimated allocation are as follows:

- 1 Boss Encounter - 20 percent or 300 hours
- Generative Map and Environment Assets - 20 percent or 300 hours
- 7 Items and 7 Upgrades - 15 percent or 225 hours
- 7 Rotating Nouns Characters - 15 percent or 225 hours
- Sound design for completed features - 10 percent or 150 hours
- Functional UI/UX for Menus and Gameplay - 10 percent or 150 hours
- Comprehensive Game Design Document - 10 percent or 150 hours

We have allocated a marketing budget of $10,000 to produce the following deliverables:

- Branding and Marketing Assets
- Establish Social Media presence and Steam Page
- Professional Teaser Trailer

# Creative Direction

## Nouns

Our game embraces a clash of two starkly contrasting worlds. On one side, the Nounish personality will be at the core of the player character, the items and upgrades you acquire during each run, and NPCs you discover over time.  These elements will be designed to permeate Nounish personality through vibrant colors, joyful energy, and whimsical ideas. 

### Items

We are exploring ideas that are “outside of the box” and consistent with the outlandish and diversely strange Nouns world.  

### Upgrades

As the player clears each room,  they are rewarded a pair of Noggles that unlocks a powerful new upgrade to use during the run.  Players will experiment with different combinations of upgrades to create fun synergies and provide a unique gameplay experience each run.  Each upgrade is inspired by various characters from the Nouns collection.  

## Forgotten Souls

And on the other side, you'll uncover the corrupt Forgotten Souls that have crossed into the Nouniverse upon discovering the power of Noggles.  The Souls are holding Nouns captive in their inanimate forms and using the power from the stolen Noggles to convert the Nouniverse into their own shadowy realm.  The Souls will serve as the enemy minions, bosses, and antagonist of our game, designed with contrasting dark personalities and colors.  

### Minions

All minions will be designed to showcase their haunting personalities through fantastical and diverse character design, animations, and attack styles.  The contrasting nature of the minions will provide for an aesthetic design that emphasizes readability and a visual feeling of cleansing the corruption from Nouns Town as the player progresses.  

![Minions](https://i.imgur.com/aZx9FC4.png)

### Bosses

Our boss encounters thrive to be one of the more memorable experiences that you will encounter in our game.  Our bosses will be inspired by rare Forgotten Souls characters but have our own stylistic flare.  These boss encounters will be visually stunning and paired with cohesive game play mechanics that immerse and challenge the player.  

## Environment

The collision of these two distinct moods creates a captivating experience.  Each run will begin as a corrupt Nouniverse that has taken over by the Souls.  As the player progresses through the map, the corruption is pushed back and the vibrant Nounish world is slowly restored!  

We’ll design Nounish locations with their own distinct aesthetics and corresponding play styles.  Each location on the map will go through a similar design process and produce the following deliverables:

- Concept Design - Establish the location’s identity with clearly defined characteristics
- Map Assets - Represent each location by a low resolution design on the map
- Tile Sets -  Outfit the walls, floors, and objects within the rooms of each location.  The following tile set was used in our demo and will receive a Nounish update:
    ![Demo Tileset](https://i.imgur.com/Bc2Ms0C.png)
- Decorations and Objects - Fill each room with decorations for personality and destructible objects for an interactive setting

## Creative Commons

All of the art and animations that we produce will be open-source and available for anyone to use!

# Future Vision

**The goal of this proposal is to “follow the fun” through addicting game play and Nounish creative expressions.  However, we have a long term vision to produce and distribute a fully fleshed out Nouns indie game.**

### Additional Classic Mode

Our core game loop will be the One Noun, Every Day game mode.  However, as the player character and map remain constant in this game mode, we also plan to release a Classic Mode to serve as a more traditional rogue-lite focused on randomness and meta progression, or progression that exists outside of regular gameplay.  In this mode, no two runs will be the same as a fresh new map is generated with each play through.  

But there’s also significant depth beyond the randomness.  This mode will be accompanied with a robust achievement system that challenges the player to unlock exciting new items, upgrades, and cosmetics.  

### Organic Growth

During development, we’ll maintain a steady pipeline of project updates, promotional content, and social engagement to generate organic growth.  Additionally, we plan to attend major game development conventions such as GDC, PAX, and Gamescon to engage with our community in person.  

### Game Distribution

We will use Steam as our primary distribution platform to release the game.  Steam provides access to the largest PC gaming community, as well as extensive marketing and analytics features.  We will explore porting the game to Nintendo Switch post-release to reach a wider audience.

## Collaboration

### Nouns Community

We are committed to an open and inclusive collaboration process throughout production.  We will regularly engage with select community members to explore creative discussions, validate game design concepts, and explore marketing opportunities.  Our goal is to create an immersive game that represents the Nounish identity and resonates with both the community and the player.  

### Forgotten Runes Wizard’s Cult

The game will be in collaboration with our friends from the Forgotten Runes Wizard’s Cult.  Their team is well-respected and produce engaging and high-quality products and experiences.  This collaboration brings promotional support from both their community and team’s established network within the gaming, content creation, and entertainment industries.  This partnership presents an opportunity to elevate our game, expand its reach, and enhance the prospect for breakout success.

### Nouns Esports

We will collaborate with Nouns Esports to generate excitement and promotional content with the game launch.  This partnership will explore ideas to engage the Nouns gaming community primarily through streaming, competitions, and giveaways.  

# Why a Nounish indie game?

A rogue-lite indie game provides a compelling opportunity for Nouns to enter the gaming sector:

### Creative Expression

Indie games provide for a perfect landscape to build a Nounish world complete with innovative game mechanics that are complimented with vibrant aesthetics and visual representation.  We aim to populate our world with original Nouns characters, an outlandish environment, and charming storytelling to engage players and cultivate a connection to Nouns culture.    

### Strategic Advantages

Our small indie team provides several advantages including streamlined communication, transparency, adaptability, and a strong team synergy.  Yet, while being a small team, we have access to powerful platforms such as Godot for development, Steam for distribution, and social media and Discord for our community.  Our game is thoughtfully designed to pack a punch with addictive gameplay mechanics, engaging progression and replayability, and long-term scalability and new content.  We’re able to accomplish all of this within a reasonable scope and production budget, and without sacrificing on the game’s entertainment or aesthetics.

## Genre

Our genre of choice may be a mouthful (Non Linear Action Rogue-Lite Bullet Hell…) but it’s a great platform for a Nouns game.  The generative rogue features share a strong parallel with the Nounish identity; bullet hells offer replayability.  We have described the key features of each sub-genres and the games that inspire us below:

### Rogue-Lite

The key feature of a Rogue-Lite genre is a game loop that results in permadeath.  Each time a player begins their attempt or run, they will either defeat the final boss or die trying.  A Rogue-Lite game generally involves some meta progression that takes place outside of the run; usually in the form of upgraded items, statistics, abilities, or skill trees.

### Bullet Hell

Bullet Hell combat mechanics emphasize complex bullet patterns for the player to navigate and dodge.  Our bullet hell game will be designed as a twin stick shooter where the player is on a flat plane with a top-down perspective.  

### Non-Linear Progression

One of the unique selling points of our Rogue-Lite game is that it will have Non-Linear progression.  The two main features to highlight in this design include a unique map that is generated each run and the freedom for the player to decide their order of progression.   

### Inspiration
[Enter the Gungeon](https://store.steampowered.com/app/311690/Enter_the_Gungeon/), [Hades](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1145360/Hades/), [Risk of Rain 2](https://store.steampowered.com/app/632360/Risk_of_Rain_2/), [Nuclear Throne](https://store.steampowered.com/app/242680/Nuclear_Throne/), [Vampire Survivors](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1794680/Vampire_Survivors/)

# Why The Pixel Shop?

![The Pixel Shop](https://i.imgur.com/57yu7tx.png)

[The Pixel Shop](https://thepixelshop.app) is an independent Art and Game Development studio founded in March 2022. We are a team of four talented artists and developers with over 30 years of art and game development experience, collectively.  Our team has experience producing artwork with major indie game studios; developing game engines, commercial software, and game mods; and managing large scope projects through completion. 

As a team, we recently led the creative and art direction for Battle for Goblin Town, an upcoming on-chain “Settlers of Catan” style game developed by [Forgotten Runes Wizard’s Cult](https://www.forgottenrunes.com/).  During this project, we designed and produced all of the art assets, UI/UX, [gameplay trailer](https://x.com/GoblinTown_Game/status/1708859222623232363?s=20). 

![Goblin Town Promo](https://i.imgur.com/hGejLix.png)

We also just completed our latest Moonbirds project which demonstrates our creative and technical capabilities, and shares many parallels with this Nouns proposal.  For this project, we animated all 10,000 Moonbirds as pixel sprites and introduced a mini-game as a proof-of-work to showcase how these sprites can be used in indie-game development.  All of the artwork produced for this project is cc0 for others to enjoy and build on.  Check out our [Mini-Game](https://thepixelshop.itch.io/moonbirds) and [GitHub repository](https://github.com/the-pixelshop/moonbirds).

![Moonbirds](https://i.imgur.com/itg7Pfh.png)

We are driven by our passion and commitment to releasing exciting pixel art games. 
 Thank you for the opportunity and please provide us with any feedback that you have!

content.title: One Noun 3D Animation, Every Day ⌐◨-◨ (Revised)
content.description:
# One Noun 3D Animation, Every Day ⌐◨-◨ (Revised)  

# 


**This is a  revised version of [Candidate: 2 YEARS OF EVERYDAY 3D ANIMATIONS ⌐◨-◨](https://www.nouns.camp/candidates/0x8e6ab6d4f70cc6e00a61498a427df5e9407ddf0e-2-years-of-everyday-3d-animations---), which incorporates all the given feedback via Twitter, Discord and Candidate comments.**


## **TL;DR**
NounsLATAM is seeking $50K to develop, produce and distribute daily 3D animated Noun-themed videos on a global scope for six months. 
Our initial aim was to develop, produce and distribute over 800 engaging 3D animated Noun-themed videos on a global scale for 2 years of everyday animations. With the feedback provided, we have adjusted the time frame to a six-month period, in which we will showcase the impact of Nouns in YouTube.

**PROOF OF WORK**
For the past 10 months, we have been producing non-stop Nouns-themed animated videos daily, and we are about to complete our first successful year. 
We have created over 300 daily animated videos, with over 20 million views, 100,000 hours of watch time, 30,000 subscribers, and 5,900 comments. We have also generated over 800,000 views from YouTube remixes. **All of this has been done with no funding coming from the DAO.**

Our team has self-funded all of our Nouns-themed animated video-work to date, demonstrating our commitment to Nouns DAO and our belief in its global potential.

**OUR IMPACT**
In our first 2.5 Months (in which we created 73 videos in 73 days), we became the top subscribed Nouns Content YouTube Channel, rising from 0 subscribers to 1.1K!
Today, 10 months in, we are currently at 33.8K subscribers on YouTube, a **30x** rise in subscribers. 
 **All this work was accomplished without any funding from the DAO!**
![](https://i.imgur.com/y1PVOsi.png)
![](https://i.imgur.com/IPa6eh8.png)
*Today, we are the #1 most subscribed Nouns Channel in all of YouTube, and will be the first to cross the coveted 100,000 YouTube subscribers goal.*

![](https://i.imgur.com/elw5VlT.png)

**YOUTUBE STATS**
⌐◨-◨  20+ MILLION VIEWS
⌐◨-◨  [300+ Daily Animated Videos (in 3D!)](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4MBWgNEwIAxi0Dbkbb1KDfP1c2qMfzOF)
⌐◨-◨  100,000+ Hours of watch time
⌐◨-◨  30,000+ Subscribers
⌐◨-◨  5900+ Comments
⌐◨-◨  800,000+ Views from Youtube Remixes

**⌐◨-◨  20+ MILLION VIEWS**
![](https://i.imgur.com/pGzV1yz.jpg)
*NounsLATAM's animated video content has gone viral, with our top three videos racking up over 15 million views combined.*


**[⌐◨-◨  300+ Daily Animated Videos (in 3D!)](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4MBWgNEwIAxi0Dbkbb1KDfP1c2qMfzOF)**
As a **two-person** video editor and graphic designer team with over 22 years of combined experience, we have consistently created these Nouns-themed animated 3D videos for the past 10 months, working **exclusively (and full time)** on this proposal. 
![](https://i.imgur.com/aTKTfU6.jpg)
*Check out our process for making our daily animated 3D videos!*


**⌐◨-◨  100,000+ Hours of watch time**
 ![](https://i.imgur.com/e72R4ZQ.png)
***WE HAVE NEVER BOUGHT ADS**: 100,000 hours of organic watch time from people who really love our daily animated Nouns memes and stories, all in 3D!*



**⌐◨-◨  30,000+ Subscribers**
![](https://i.imgur.com/gJ1qU2Q.png)
*We began with zero subscribers and are about to cross 40,000. People love our Nouns content!*

![](https://i.imgur.com/2UzYzwf.png)
*Our strongest demographic is the 25 - 44 year old range!*


**⌐◨-◨  5900+ Comments**
![](https://i.imgur.com/byDikrL.png)
*Organic community and comments, from people all over the world who really love Nouns characters!*


**⌐◨-◨  800,000+ Views from YouTube Remixes**
YouTube remixes make it easy for other creators to incorporate clips from our Nouns videos into their own original creations!
![](https://i.imgur.com/2EiQghC.png)
*People take our Nouns content, create new videos and proliferate the Nouniverse because they love our animations!* 

  
**PROPOSAL DELIVERABLES**
This proposal will cover **six months** of NounsLATAM 3D daily animated videos. 

1. Provide high quality, DAILY content, deliverables which are as follows:
-   200 3D animated daily videos 
-   One animation a day x 6 months  (=180)
-   An additional twenty (20) 3D animated videos to round off an even 200 deliverables (To be used for special occasions / holiday / trending topics )
-   Check out our [First 300+ Nouns Animated 3D Videos](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4MBWgNEwIAxi0Dbkbb1KDfP1c2qMfzOF)!

2. Onboard additional Nouns characters from both holders and Nouns communities, to further grow Nouns exposure!
3. We will decentralize our 3D assets by making them freely downloadable and available to all who want to use them!
 
![](https://i.imgur.com/Klwpwjf.png)
*Every Noun holder, community and NounsDAO participants can request their characters animated!*

**NounsLATAM will become the first (and so far only) Nouns YouTube channel to cross 100,000 subscribers, and earn a YouTube Creator Award. (2025)*
![](https://i.imgur.com/Zn11Dxu.jpg)
*This will be an incredible achievement for the DAO. NounsDAO will become the first web3 NFT Collection to have its name engraved in a YouTube Creator Award.*

**BREAKDOWN**
NounsLATAM is seeking $50,000 to develop, produce and distribute over 200 engaging 3D animated Noun-themed videos on a global scope for 6 Months of everyday animations. 
![](https://i.imgur.com/IDGeagO.png)
![](https://i.imgur.com/ZMhHy4Q.png)


## **NounsLATAM TEAM**
NounsLATAM is a team of creators who use digital and physical channels to expand the Nouns brand and community around the world.
![](https://i.imgur.com/kxkDPwr.png)

**NOUNS CONSTRIBUTIONS INCLUDES:**

**DIGITAL:**

-    3D designed, created & animated [NounsLATAM POAPs x The Nouns Square](https://nounslatam.wtf/poaps)
-    Created [Nounish GIFs](https://nounslatam.wtf/gifs) // [Holiday GIFs](https://nounslatam.wtf/holiday-gifs) //  [GIF Factory: Nouns Builder Meme GIFs ⌐◨-◨](https://x.com/NounsLatam/status/1619583275663753216?s=20)
-    Built [Nouns Metaverse Museum (Voxels/ CryptoVoxels)](https://nounslatam.wtf/metaverse-museum)
-    Illustrated, 3D designed & created [Viral multiplatform stickers](https://nounslatam.wtf/viral)
-  3D designed & animated on [YouTube: 3D animations everyday](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4MBWgNEwIAxi0Dbkbb1KDfP1c2qMfzOF) (+300 days!)


**IRL:**
-    Designed 30+ different types of never before seen, unique, and awesome [NounsLATAM / Nouns DAO merch](https://nounslatam.wtf/merch) distributed in different events across different countries [including Nouns at DEVCON (Colombia) & LABITCONF (Argentina)]

    - [Latin American OTG activation TOUR of three cities @Colombia](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/latin-american-otg-activation-tour-of-three-cities-colombia/2338/13)

content.title: Nouns x BasePaint
content.description:
# Nouns x BasePaint



*tldr:
Commit to minting 6 ETH of Nouns Themed BasePaint dailys for three consecutive days (2 ETH per day).*

---

[![image](https://i.imgur.com/gfeyoyi.png)](https://basepaint.xyz/gallery)

[BasePaint](https://basepaint.xyz/) is a shared pixel canvas. The community makes art for 24 hours. After which, the canvas locks, and an open edition NFT of the artwork is available to mint for 24 hours. 

I propose committing 6 ETH to mint three days of Nouns themed canvases. **For three days, the BasePaint theme would be whatever Noun is on auction at the time of which the BasePaint canvas opens**. This is a fun initiative would accomplish a few things:
- Further cement Nouns into BasePaint works (noggles have shown up in a few works already: [BP1](https://opensea.io/assets/base/0xba5e05cb26b78eda3a2f8e3b3814726305dcac83/1), [BP33](https://opensea.io/assets/base/0xba5e05cb26b78eda3a2f8e3b3814726305dcac83/33), [BP47](https://opensea.io/assets/base/0xba5e05cb26b78eda3a2f8e3b3814726305dcac83/47) and [BP71](https://opensea.io/assets/base/0xba5e05cb26b78eda3a2f8e3b3814726305dcac83/71)).
- Ten Nouns artists will be whitelisted for bronze BasePaint brushes to collaborate with the BasePaint community. If you're interested, [apply]([link](https://tally.so/r/3NlAMB)) and mention Nouns.
- Support BasePaint crypto native artists 
- Make our first transaction on an L2!

I've been in contact with the cofounders of BasePaint ([Zach](zherring) and [WINTΞR](https://twitter.com/w1nt3r_eth)) to set the themes for the days on which Nouns would be minting. 

## Logistics:
- We’d be using the [BasePaint bot](https://www.basepaintbot.com/) to commit the ETH. 
- The proposal would be calling [Base Portal contract on Ethereum](https://etherscan.io/address/0x49048044D57e1C92A77f79988d21Fa8fAF74E97e#readProxyContract) which would both deposit and call the [BasePaint bot contract](https://basescan.org/address/0xb129419F9B035E9d80B4a320ffcf5BE93Cb7994B#code). 
- We'd be minting 699 each day (at a cost of 0.00286 per mint) for a total of 1.9999 ETH per day (699 * 0.00286).
- The mints would be under the [DAO's alias address](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/blob/develop/specs/deposits.md#address-aliasing) so that the DAO can call it from L1 if it chooses to move them.


## Timeline:

- Assuming the proposal passes, the mint would start 9 days after the proposal is put onchain (7 days vote turnaround + 2 days queued). 

## Where the ETH would go:
There’s a 10% fee that the BasePaint bot takes at mint. Once minted, 90% of the profits of the OE are distributed to the artists proportional to the number of pixels they painted. 10% goes to the protocol.

--- 

*A big thank you to [solimander](https://x.com/_solimander_), [backseats](https://x.com/backseats_eth) and [wilson](https://x.com/wilsoncusack) who helped put the tx together*

content.title: Buy Lils Nouns
content.description:
# Buy Lils Nouns 

Subdaos/fractional Noun owners are unfairly disadvantaged by Nouns Fork due to the unpreventable (unless addtl infra is built) risk of 51% attack once assets hit the fork treasury. Additionally, there are economic forces that incentivize using these Nouns as leverage to expedite meeting forking threshold, even if an additional attack is not carried out. This too is a classic sybil vulnerability where token-holders have economic incentives outside of a dao greater than those inside, and the nouns fork itself is in this case the primary driver. 

fractional owners should not be unduly exposed to an additional layer of risk for carrying out their exit prerogative, or be coerced into exit by a hostile token majority motivated by self-enrichment. 

in the interest of providing a fair/functional/uniform minority protection, i suggest we offer to buy back some or all of the Lil Nouns 16 tokens at current bv (somewhere around 25 eth?) 

putting this up to gauge sentiment since Lils would presumably like to act quickly.  this would give them the optionality to make the determination if liquidation is the right path for them without the confounding variables associated with internal forking props.

content.title: Nouns House 1 - Tokyo, Jpn
content.description:
# Nouns House #1 - Tokyo, Jpn

## **v3 updated on 11/05/2023**

This proposal serves as an alternative to Proposal Candidate **["Nouns House DAO"](https://nouns.wtf/candidates/0x1bde33dbc5c2ac7109c4a7ecf0d0a0a6cd6f57cc--nouns-house-dao)**, offering a **phased approach to establishing a new Nounish subDAO called Nouns House DAO**. It outlines the first steps which includes creating the first Nouns House and mobile app. As a second step, we plan to submit follow-up proposal by Feburary 2024 to transfer initial funding to the DAO treasury followed by successful execution of this proposal.

**We have already established the Nouns House DAO multi-sig [treasury](https://etherscan.io/address/0x0BC7181dc3863932F9b375bC348fe4A421B8003A), and all of the funding from this and future proposal will be going to the treasury.**

***

## TL;DR

Hello! I am **[tenichiliu.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/tenichiliu.eth)**, co-founder of Enabler DAO (**[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/enabler.fun/)**, **[Twitter](https://twitter.com/enablerofficial)**, **[Website](https://enablerdao.com/)**). Our decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) focuses on gathering, utilizing, managing, and improving idle assets like unused houses and cars within communities worldwide. My fellow co-founder at Enabler DAO, **[yukihamada.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/yukihamada.eth)**, is a holder of **[Noun 312](https://nouns.wtf/noun/312)**, and we believe in the power and potential of NounsDAO just as you do.

We are proposing a funding of **47,600 USDC** to give a Nounish makeover to a vacation rental property in Tokyo, Japan, valued over $1,000,000 USD. We intend to create “Nouns House #1” with this funding. Our property has already completed interior and exterior renovations; **all of the funding will be used for the Nounish makeover, and development of the mobile app.**

Beyond just providing the property for Nouns House #1, **we will contribute 10% of the profits made from Nouns House #1 to the Nouns House DAO treasury for the first 5 years**. For future Nouns Houses real estates that are funded by the treasury, 100% of the profits will be returned to the treasury.

In alignment with NounsDAO’s CC0 philosophy, we will make all software and hardware implemented in this project open source. Furthermore, we plan to collaborate with the Nouns projects that are active in Japan such as **[pNouns](https://pnouns.wtf/en/)** (**[Noun 553](https://nouns.wtf/noun/553)**, **[Noun 556](https://nouns.wtf/noun/556)**) for events and promotions.

**The diverse industry experience of our team will significantly contribute to the success of this project.** **[yukihamada.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/yukihamada.eth)** is a former executive CPO at Mercari, **[yukill.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/yukill.eth)** is a former CEO at ZOZO Technologies, **[Jiro](https://twitter.com/jiroisagame)** is a former YouTuber with 1.3 million subscribers, and I, **[tenichiliu.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/tenichiliu.eth)**, am a former engineer from Amazon Seattle.

This proposal was inspired by **[Nouns Deli](https://twitter.com/NounsDeli)**’s proposal (**[Proposal 254](https://nouns.wtf/vote/254)**, approved on 03/09/2023). Our next step is to establish a Nounish subDAO, called “Nouns House DAO”. Similar to the **[Nouns Builder Protocol](https://nouns.build/)** (**[Proposal 167](https://nouns.wtf/vote/167)**, approved on 11/12/2022), we aim to create a subDAO inheriting NounsDAO’s auction, treasury, and governance system. In the follow-up proposal, we plan to request initial funding for Nouns House DAO treasury, in order to create Nouns House #2 and subsequent Nouns Houses based on community decisions governed by the DAO.

## 1.  Nouns House DAO ⌐◧-◧

Nouns House #1 created through this proposal will serve as the first Nouns House governed by Nouns House DAO. Following the successful execution of this proposal, we will submit a follow-up proposal to transfer initial funding to the Nouns House DAO treasury. This initial funding will be substantial enough to secure the purchase of the second Nouns House. The exact amount, along with detailed plans and specific property information, will be disclosed in this follow-up proposal. We believe that having initial funding in the treasury will create strong momentum for this new Nounish DAO.

Our goal is to establish Nouns Houses in major cities globally, allowing individuals to experience Nouns art and culture. Additionally, we aim to **operate this as a profitable venture**, positioning Nouns House DAO as the pioneering Nounish subDAO that introduces a **3rd revenue pillar for the treasury, complementing the NFT auctioning and ETH staking.**

Nouns House DAO will oversee the operation and financial management of all Nouns Houses. **As a testament to our commitment, we will contribute 10% of the profits from Nouns House #1 to treasury for the first 5 years.** For all subsequent real estates that are funded by the Nouns House DAO treasury, 100% of the profits will be directed back to the treasury.

![Bedroom](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1W23f_T6aANo9mXh9-lUu3bypKSzU12M4)

## 2. Enabler DAO / Core Team ⌐◧-◧

Enabler DAO is a asset sharing community that aims to facilitate easy sharing of large assets like houses and cars by leveraging blockchain and AI technology. As of November 2023, we operate 10 properties across 5 locations (Tokyo, Kyoto, Atami, Teshikaga, and Honolulu) in Japan and the United States. These properties are monetized through asset sharing within the community as well as through Online Travel Agencies (OTAs) such as Airbnb and Booking.com. Below are some of our properties and links to OTAs.

🇯🇵 [**WHITE HOUSE Atami**](https://airbnb.com/h/white-house-atami
) - Shizuoka, Japan
🇯🇵 [**MACHIYA Kyoto**](https://www.kyoto-machiya-inn.com/accommodations/hanatoki/
) - Kyoto, Japan
🇯🇵 [**THE NEST Teshikaga**](https://airbnb.com/h/the-nest-teshikaga) - Hokkaido, Japan
🇺🇸 [**BEACH HOUSE Honolulu**](https://airbnb.com/h/beach-house-honolulu-annex) - Hawaii, USA

![Properties](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1C5UfxmK62s98QryMGZ_SoTIpED1fTUru)

The 4 founders of Enabler DAO are **[yukihamada.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/yukihamada.eth)** (**[Noun 312](https://nouns.wtf/noun/312)**), former executive CPO of Mercari; **[yukill.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/yukill.eth)**, former CEO at ZOZO Technologies & fund manager for MZ Web3 Fund; **[Jiro](https://twitter.com/jiroisagame)**, former YouTuber “Charisma Brothers” with 1.3 million subscribers & managing partner at iFund; and **[tenichiliu.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/tenichiliu.eth)**, a trilingual former Amazon HQ engineer with 5-years of experience. 

Enabler DAO was founded in October 2021, and we currently operate with about 10 DAO members. We have been operating highly successful and profitable vacation rental properties in multiple locations (10~20% annual ROI), and bring expertise in both rental operations and property management. Moreover, our diverse team brings a wide range of business and product development experience, combined with our strong track record, **I believe we are in a unique position to be successful at running the first Nouns House.**

## **3. Nounish Makeover ⌐◧-◧**

We plan to transform our property in Aoyama, an upscale district in Tokyo, into "Nouns House #1," with a Nounish makeover filled with art and goodies. 

![Living Room](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1bwo_xZOKns30glLVRyeoQ7ROKojrQkIE)

Aoyama is a hub of designer boutiques, art galleries, cafes, and shopping districts. It's not only a attracts for affluent individuals but also a popular tourist destination. Given the area's reputation and successful track record of our nearby properties, **we anticipate strong demand for high-end vacation rental property in Aoyama.**

![Sauna](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1kabDge7tB6HDlZqn1fYccFdnsMt0-AdX)

In recent years, there has been a “sauna boom” in Japan. The number of sauna enthusiasts has been increasing due to heightened health consciousness and the proliferation of sauna facilities. In fact, the number of sauna users in Japan has increased by more than one million in the past year, and high-end sauna facilities in Tokyo are extremely popular. **We believe that Nouns House #1 will become widely popular within the sauna communities and beyond.**

![Bath](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=190MOtkZF68sFwLUJzwbxoO4hNEtKDfch)

The artwork used for interior and exterior of Nouns House #1 will be directed by [amiyoko.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/amiyoko.eth) who have contributed many artwork to various Nouns projects such as NounsDAO Anniversary Art 2023 and Sushi Nouns.

![Exterior](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1bESaiRK3zLewixG-8MvEEq9HgIhnkbqc)

The 1st floor is the sauna area, the 2nd floor features a living-dining-kitchen area, and the 3rd floor will be an office space and a bedroom. We aim to infuse each floor with Nounish elements while maintaining a sense of luxury in the interior design.

![Chill](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1CvxZml-3RPmPaHxNUzN7yUE2DKu-wLyU)

## 4. Marketing Efforts **⌐◧-◧**

To amplify the presence of Nouns House #1, **we will be forming a strategic partnership with a popular Japanese YouTuber group, [EvisJap](https://youtube.com/@EvisJap?si=6Oi6Ll6fIzis70ib).** With a subscriber base of 630,000, primarily young adults, they are known for their energetic travel blogs and lively social gatherings that resonate with the adventurous spirit of youth.

During the weekdays, EvisJap will be utilizing Nouns House #1 as their recording studio, bringing a creative buzz to the space while providing regular exposure of Nouns to a broad audience through their videos. On weekends, Nouns House #1 will transform into an luxury private sauna. This dual-use approach optimizes the utility of the property, and exemplifies the innovative and adaptive spirit of the Nouns.

This collaboration, born from our unique relationship with EbisJap, is a synergy that offers exposure to Nouns House without direct marketing efforts. The value of this organic promotion is an example of the unique contribution that our team brings to the Nouns community.

## **5. Mobile App ⌐◧-◧**

**We will develop a mobile app for facilitating reservations and assigning maintenance work for Nouns House DAO**. This app will be powered by open-source framework called **[Skeet](https://skeet.dev/en/)** which seamlessly integrates with Google Cloud Platform and Firebase, making it easier to develop serverless full-stack applications. 

It's worth noting that both Enabler and **[El Soul Labo](https://labo.elsoul.nl/en/)**, the team behind Skeet, received equity funding from **[East Ventures](https://east.vc/)**, one of the biggest venture capital fund in Asia. With the cutting edge Skeet framework and the invaluable support from the creator of Skeet, we can efficiently develop this app with just one engineer on our end.

The app will integrate with existing tools that offers API such as **[Beds24](https://beds24.com/)** for inventory management, **[Sesame Smart Lock](https://jp.candyhouse.co/)** for automatically issuing one-time guest keys, and **[Stripe](https://stripe.com/en-jp)** for fiat payment processing. In the interim, before our app release, we'll use **[LINE](https://line.me/en/)** and **[LINE Marketplace](https://line-marketplace.com/jp/app)** apps for chat-based reservation.

Furthermore, we will incorporate web3 capabilities such as token-gating and cryptocurrency payment into the app. We plan to offer special coupons and priority reservations to Nouns House NFT holders, and allow payments in major cryptocurrencies.

## **6. Utility Token ⌐◧-◧**

We plan to introduce a utility token which will be used for accessing Nouns House and can be earned through completing maintenance gigs listed in the app. **We envision some members of the Nouns House DAO to work maintenance gigs in order to earn the utility token.** We plan to use Solana chain for the token for 3 reasons: near-zero gas fees, rapid execution, and its integration with the user-friendly multi-chain wallet called Phantom. Enabler DAO has already been experimenting with Solana based utility token called [**EBR**](https://solscan.io/token/E1JxwaWRd8nw8vDdWMdqwdbXGBshqDcnTcinHzNMqg2Y) (available on [**Orca DEX**](https://v1.orca.so/liquidity/browse?tokenMint=E1JxwaWRd8nw8vDdWMdqwdbXGBshqDcnTcinHzNMqg2Y)) and have experience in this realm.

## **7. Roadmap ⌐◧-◧**

We will begin the Nounish makeover and the development of mobile app, immediately following the approval of this proposal. In January 2024, we plan to pre-open Nouns House #1, followed by grand opening in February. Beta version of mobile app will be released in March, followed by production release in April. We will submit submit a follow-up proposal by Feburary 2024 to transfer initial funding for the DAO treasury followed by successful execution of this proposal.

![Roadmap](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1xkl6xzFYEi-rAtpjmnARWpc34Pj_Dlh4)

## **8. Budget ⌐◧-◧**

We are proposing **47,600 USDC funding for creating Nouns House #1 and to kick start the software infrastructure development for Nouns House DAO.** The Nounish makeover will cost $17,000, and the development of the mobile app will cost $30,600. All work will commence immediately upon the approval of the proposal.

**Nouns House #1 Nounish Makeover: $17,000**
- "Nounish" Exterior Wall Art: $6,000
- "Nounish" Interior Art: $8,000
- "Nounish" Goodies: $3,000

**Mobile App (6-month development): $30,600**
- Founding Engineer: $5,000/month
- [Skeet](https://skeet.dev/en/) (Enterprise Support): $100/month

## **9. Community Benefits ⌐◧-◧**

This proposal aims to **expand the Nouns community by creating the first "Nouns House", a network of properties where people can experience Nouns art and culture in major cities worldwide.**

In the next step, we will propose to transfer initial funding for Nouns House DAO treasury. This new Nounish subDAO will own Real World Asset (RWA) and operate them as a profit-making business. RWA is an area where the web3 industry is still struggling, and this new venture has the potential to significantly advance the industry on this front.

Nouns House NFT holders will be offered special perks such as discounted rates and priority access to Nouns Houses via token gating. Additionally, upon the funding of the Nouns House DAO treasury in our next proposal, **existing Nouns NFT holders can apply for Nouns House NFT airdrop by a pre-determined date**. This airdrop is optional and provides an opportunity for existing NounsDAO members to participate in the governance for Nouns House DAO without having to bid in the auction.

## **10. CC0 ⌐◧-◧**

We believe, Nouns House’s CC0 culture will bring innovation to the real estate industry. While real estate design and architecture are generally not open-source, we will make all of these publicly available through our CC0 library. CC0 approach will also have a large impact on the vacation rental industry. **By providing tools to help achieve efficient operations, we will accelerate the automation and digital transformation of the vacation rental industry.** The interest and attention that this CC0 model will generate within these industries will serve as the ideal platform for spreading the culture and values of Nouns.

## **11. Risks & Considerations ⌐◧-◧**

We are enthusiastic members of the Nouns community and, as Noun owner, strongly resonate with the vision of Nouns. **We believe that the Nouns model holds innovative power in asset management and vacation rental fields.** This decentralized, community-led governance model has the potential to offer new approaches in asset sharing and feels like the ideal way to manage assets in a decentralized manner. On the other hand, there are some risks considered in achieving the vision of this project:

1. **Regulatory Risk**: Operating within a decentralized framework could potentially make the project subject to regulations. Compliance with local laws is crucial.
2. **Technical Risk**: The integration of blockchain technology with physical assets like real estate presents several challenges. The implementation of smart contracts to manage the property must be executed flawlessly.
3. **Community Engagement**: The strength of a DAO lies in its community. For long-term success, it's important to maintain community engagement and participation in governance.

By acknowledging these risks and proactively addressing them, we aim for the success of the Nouns House project.

contentSignatures.reason: We,pNouns support this proposal. This vision is to create a Nounish DAO that is financially sustainable and scalable in the realm of property rental. It extends beyond simply using existing OTAs like Airbnb; we want to explore the potential of becoming a decentralized platform/brand that leverages the power of DAO, smart contract and cc0. By building our own app, we can (1) save the ~15% OTA fees, (2) have flexibility to do hourly rental, (3) explore the path of becoming the “web3 property rental platform”

Tougher than the Nouns Deli, but worth it to try.  NFT branded hotels to date have been cringe, goal will be how to make this a cc0 decentralized brand that other hoteliers can join for free and get value from using (and add value to).  Gotta make it have network value.
