content.title: The Many Hats of Ben - a documentary about Benbodhi.⌐◨-◨ ✦₊
content.description:
# The Many Hats of Ben - a documentary about Benbodhi.⌐◨-◨ ✦₊

# The Many Hats of Ben
*(working title)*

**TL;DR**
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1Ci311Qp.jpg)
**Discover the transformative power of Nouns DAO through the journey of Benbodhi**

Ben spent a few months lurking in the original Nouns Discord before saying anything.
Now, he is one of the most devoted and loved members of the community, a funded prop builder, and even co-founder of a fork of Nouns.

**Short documentary film (20 minutes) | Budget: $48,970 USDC**

---

**THE PLAN**
The Nouns DAO community is about the passionate individuals behind it.
With this documentary series, we aim to spotlight these inspiring journeys.
First up, Benbodhi.
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Byly9yJma.jpg)
*Ben with hxnzΞ, Gami and Aubtoshi @ SXSW Sydney*

We'll track Ben's story and his daily schedule, which occasionally includes working 16+ hours a day on some of our favorite Nouns projects:
* Nouncil
* TNS
* Gnars DAO
* Alps DAO
* Prop 218
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Hkg7PiH0zp.gif)
*as part of proposal 218, the largest ⌐◨-◨ in the world were manufactured.*


**THE SCHEDULE**
We will deliver the final cut within 3 to 4 months of being funded.
Around February 2024 with filming scheduled for late November 2023.

**THE ASK - $48,970 USDC**
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rykpUyJmp.png)



**THE FUTURE**
We have reached out to a few of our favourite Nounish builders, devs and artists and ultimately decided to start small with only one documentary for now.

We will move on to other stories after we deliver Ben’s and the community is happy with the result.

If  successful, we will make new proposals for the following stages:
* Stage 01 - Australian Wave: Gami, Mr. Seaks, TBD
* Stage 02 - Brazilian Storm: JP, Vlad, TBD
* Stage 03 - USA, Canada: TBD
* Stage 04 - Latin America: TBD 
* Stage 05 - Europe: TBD
* Stage 06 - Asia/Japan: TBD

This is a 2 to 3-year plan and the idea is to save on budget and time by having the same film crew shoot more than one story in each continent.

**Please get in touch with us if you have suggestions of people/places/projects we should be considering.**

Also, since all the material will be cc0, we can think of it as building blocks of a feature-length documentary in the not-so-distant future.
And anything else anyone wants to build with it.



---

**THE TEAM**
We are essentially the same crew from “Non-fungible Aotearoa”.
Proposal 405 funded us to submit the documentary to 50+ film festivals:
[https://nouns.wtf/vote/405](https://nouns.wtf/vote/405)

Leo Clark (Director/Producer)
[https://warpcast.com/leoclark.eth](https://warpcast.com/leoclark.eth)

Simon Ogston (Director of Photography)
[https://www.bellbirdpictures.co.nz/](https://www.bellbirdpictures.co.nz/)

Foothead (VFX Artist)
[http://www.foothead.net/](http://www.foothead.net/)

Jonathan Crayford (Music composer)
[https://www.jonathancrayford.com/](https://www.jonathancrayford.com/)

DOP
[https://www.departmentofpost.com/](https://www.departmentofpost.com/)
One of the most important post-production facilities in New Zealand.



Thank you for reading 🙏
Let’s make more art in Season 3 🫡

content.title: 🏠 Nouns House DAO
content.description:
# 🏠 Nouns House DAO

![NounsHome](https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/c.eblr.io/nounshouse-1.png)

# Down NFT Sales Stopped
We've temporarily halted the sales of Down NFTs and cancelled all existing purchases. The proposal will be revised based on the feedback received, and sales will recommence shortly.

# 📋 Executive Summary
We propose a strategic investment in "Nouns House DAO," a venture initiated by He Nouns 312, requiring a capital of 312 ETH. In exchange, nouns.eth will receive a 10% allocation of the token supply. Our objective is to transform the property rental sector through the integration of smart locks and applications, ensuring transparency and efficiency in the process. By leveraging the strength of the Nouns brand and community support, we aim to introduce innovative opportunities in governance, user experience, and property utilization through NFTs and fungible tokens (FTs).

## 🔍 What is Enabler DAO/LLC?
Founded by Yuki Hamada, a seasoned tech entrepreneur and former Executive CPO of Mercari, Enabler DAO/LLC operates as a Decentralized Autonomous Organization. It also maintains a legal entity status as an LLC in Japan to facilitate formal contracts, participating as a member of the DAO. The organization currently manages a range of luxury properties located in Tokyo, Hawaii, Kyoto, and Hokkaido, demonstrating a profitable business model in real estate. The transition towards tokenization is underway, with plans to issue utility tokens based on property usage, offering unique benefits to NFT owners.

![NounsHome](https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/c.eblr.io/NounsHome.gif)

## ❓ Why Approve This Proposal?
### Beyond Art 🎭🌐
We emphasize collective management of our properties, fostering a sense of community and cooperation. This initiative extends beyond monetary gains, focusing on building relationships and enhancing our spaces through collective decision-making. The integration of AI will further streamline management processes, emphasizing the communal aspect of our project.

### Setting a Good Precedent 📜🌟
Our approach has the potential to establish a positive precedent for future DAOs and projects, contributing to the strength and evolution of the decentralized ecosystem.

### Approval and Participation Mechanism 🗳👥
Decisions on these matters will be made post-approval by Nouns House DAO, with participation options available through nouns.eth (treasury) voting or involvement in DAO auctions. The 312 ETH will be transferred following decentralized procedures.

## 🆕 Nouns House: Updated Features

### Artwork and Rewards 🎨🏆
**Nouns House** will feature **NFT Artwork Tokens**, inspired by Nouns and available in various categories:
- **Houses 🏠**: 90%
- **Islands 🌴**: 9%
- **Earth 🌏**: 1%
These tokens offer holders the opportunity to unlock special rewards and benefits.

### Property Contributions 🏡🌇
I will contribute seven properties valued at approximately $10 million as part of the project launch. For further details and updates, visit [our Instagram page](https://www.instagram.com/enabler.fun/).
![NounsHome](https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/c.eblr.io/Enabler.JPG)

### Property Utility Tokens 🛠🪙
**Nouns House** will also issue **Property Utility Tokens**, managed by **Nouns House DAO**, providing utility access to the properties.

### Legal Aspects ⚖📜
We acknowledge the complexities involved in transforming physical properties into digital assets and are committed to ensuring legal compliance throughout this process.

## 🎉 Conclusion
We are confident that the approval of this proposal will bring significant benefits to both our initiative and the broader Nouns ecosystem, and we look forward to your support and participation.

## FAQ: Enabler & Nouns House DAO Partnership

### Enabler's Traction 📈
**Q:** What progress has Enabler made so far?
**A:** Enabler DAO is already operating luxury properties in various locations and is on track to achieve profitability by December 2023, indicating a promising future for Nouns House DAO.

### Transition to a DAO 🔄
**Q:** Why transition to a DAO, specifically Nouns DAO?
**A:** Nouns has exerted a considerable influence on the industry, and we find their approach highly favorable. Hence, we are adopting their method of selling governance tokens.

### Nouns' Gains 💰
**Q:** What benefits does Nouns stand to gain from funding Enabler, aside from property ownership shares?
**A:** Nouns members stand to gain from the potential success of this innovative investment model.

### Proliferating the Nouns Meme 📣
**Q:** How does this partnership help in proliferating the Nouns meme?
**A:** This project exemplifies the real-world impact of Nouns, connecting the community with tangible assets and proliferating the Nouns meme.

For updates and queries, follow me on [X @yukihamada](https://x.com/yukihamada) or visit our Instagram page [Enabler.Fun](https://www.instagram.com/enabler.fun/).

## 🛤 Roadmap
Upon approval of the proposal:

### 1. Proposal Approval ✅
The community decides on our future.

### 2. NFT Auction Begins 🎨🔨
We initiate the NFT auction, offering unique governance and user experience opportunities.

### 3. DAO Establishment 🏛
Nouns House DAO officially forms, transitioning us into a decentralized, community-driven entity.

### 4. Community Building and Governance 🤝
NFT holders engage in governance, shaping the DAO’s future.

### 5. Implementation of Features and Services 🚀
We roll out our innovative real estate solutions and unique experiences for NFT holders.

### 6. Long-Term Growth and Evolution 🌳
We continue to innovate, expand, and deliver value to all stakeholders.

content.title: Governance Pools v2
content.description:
# Governance Pools v2

_This proposal is still in progress, I'm opening a candidate prop now to encourage open discussion._

## tldr
Fund the continued development of [Federation](https://federation.wtf) governance pools and establish a community owned pool of 20 Nouns aimed at increasing voter participation and expanding the social experience around Nouns.

# History

Leading up to Fork-0, governance pools played a key role in reducing governance deadlock while increasing overall participation and attention to the proposal process. Emergent behavior such as the formation of [Keep Nouns Weird (KNW)](https://twitter.com/keepnounsweird)  ensured the health of the community was preserved, as a rush to take advantage of the treasury threatened the future of Nouns.

# The Future of Governance Pools

Governance pools auction off votes for each proposal, allowing anyone to bid on how they should be cast. Although this can lead to unwanted behavior, there's a plethora of real world use that shows governance pools can be used to advance our ecosystem in a positive way by extending the Nouns game with a fun and social experience.

![social](https://i.postimg.cc/cLMzdNQm/praise.png)

A specific list of features is tentative, but directionally the next version of governance pools will provide a more consumer based experience and support:

- Social features such as "bid with reason"
- Crowdfunding of bids
- Safety measures like a threshold vote to veto malicious bids
- Indicators for real time activity on the site (e.g. cursors on party.app)
- Experimentation around pricing of votes (e.g. a time based pricing curve for auction reserve price to incentivize early bids vs last minute swings)
- 100% of auction proceeds sent to the DAO treasury

Ultimately the community will be able to provide input on how parts of the protocol are developed, ensuring that governance pools are used for good and remain a positive force for Nouns. 

Participating in governance pools needs to be **FUN**!

# Other

To ensure that the community has full control over Nouns delegated to the pool an intermediate contract will be created that custodies them and manages the pool delegation. The community will be the owner of the contract, providing the ability to withdraw Nouns in the future at any time using the standard proposal process.

Until then, I'm asking for the Nouns to be sent to a multisig with signers [xxx]. The Nouns will sit idle until governance pools v2 is released.

# Budget & Terms

400 ETH and 20 Nouns

The funds will be allocated towards: 

- infrastructure and server costs
- funding the team and outside help
- continued iterations and support post deployment
- audits
- grants to support new and existing initiatives like Keep Nouns Weird

The Nouns will be stored in a multisig located at: 0x000

All code can be found on our [GitHub](https://github.com/nounish/)

\- [wiz](https://twitter.com/0xWiz_)

content.title: The Noun Pulse: Meme Analysis Database and Analytics - Updated
content.description:
# The Noun Pulse: Meme Analysis Database and Analytics - Updated


EDIT: We've updated this proposal based on community feedback. Looking forward to your thoughts!

---

*“Is Nouns activity growing?” “Who is helping increase engagement and spreading the meme?” “Which proposals are driving growth?” “What’s our spend rate?” “How many builders are contributing to the Nouns ecosystem?” “Are the amount of proposal candidates increasing?”*

## **TL;DR**

We aim to create a single-purpose website where Nouns activity metrics are published. It will integrate activity across social channels and highlight which Nouns, advocates, and proposals have best supported the Noun’s meme propagation. Our creative motto is: *Track Memes, Not People.*

As a starting point, this proposal focuses on [1] onchain activity (supported by the Nouns subgraph), [2] two sources of social media (Farcaster and Instagram), and [3] a limited set of metrics — such as proposal submissions, votes, comments, posts, and engagement. Opportunistically, we will incorporate additional sources and expand the set of metrics.

## Background

As of the moment, the Nouns’ community and audience members produce a wide variety of data. Over time, more data is likely to migrate onchain (e.g. similar to vote comments today) and data will be produced across even more digital localities. The *United World of Nouns* will have a wide-ranging data footprint. Combining data across these localities can become a powerful tool for proposal development and decision-making.

However, as @Krel mentioned in their [Request for Proposers](https://www.notion.so/Nouns-DAO-Request-for-Proposers-94dadff999ac493b9902aa002e4b296e?pvs=21):

> *“Nouns DAO does not have a reliable way to measure ‘growth’ or ‘success’. Its not clear what should be measured, or what growth in the context of Nouns even means.”*
> 

This project will create an initial repository of activity growth combining onchain and offchain data. We are long overdue to experiment on this front!

## Scope

The metrics tracker will be in the form of a single-purpose web application.

To begin, we will include onchain data available in the Nouns Subgraph and two social media channels: Farcaster and Instagram. We will publish a selection of core metrics that provide clarity to Noun holders and the wider community.

Most importantly, the underlying data pool (Meme Activity Database) will serve a first step towards a data-driven Nouns culture, which community members and potential builders can use to find opportunities for proposal submissions.

Success of this project will be measured based on web application usage (unique visitors), proposal references (e.g. This project will increase X metric supporting Noun activity growth), and data pool connections (e.g. external usage of the Meme Activity Database).

As a stretch goal, we will look to expand the data sources, for example including key derivative NFT projects (Gnars, LilNouns, cc0-lib) and other dominant social spaces (Discord, Discourse, X, Lens, etc).

*Note: X (formerly Twitter) has been deprioritized due to its cost ($5k per month) until initiative is proven useful. It would be included in future proposals.*

*Note: Discord has been deprioritized due to its fragmentation (there multiple Nouns servers) until initiative is proven useful. It would be included in future proposals.*

## Product Components

### 

Whenever we want to test our internet speed, we can easily go to a speed test website. If we want to see how our activity on X (formerly Twitter), we can go to profile analytics. 

**Where do we go to check how the Nouns ecosystem is growing?** We go to *.*

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/ByD5JEHfp.png)

The Pulse is a single purpose website showcasing onchain and offchain activity metrics. This includes public conversations related to the **********************United World of Nouns.********************** The main graph, which we are currently calling *“Activity Momentum”* will showcase daily activity growth, a proxy for the Noun meme adoption and mind-share online.

Our data analytics approach will combine methodologies from (1) traditional media broadcasting (e.g. combining data like number of views, replies, likes, proposal submissions, unique voters, etc.), (2) crypto-native metrics common across DAOs, and (3) materials science and engineering (read more about how engineers develop [material selection indexes here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Material_selection)).

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HJSJgVrGp.png)

Data will be synchronized in real-time directly from the Nouns’ Subgraph, Farcaster, Instagram to an SQL database. The sync mechanism will be architected in a uniform adapter interface for easier future integration with other onchain data and offchain sources, such as Twitter, Discourse, Discord, Telegram, DeSo, and Lens.

**Example Onchain Metrics:**

- Treasury
- Treasury Usage Rate (Monthly Spend)
- Burn Value
- Candidate Props Growth
- Proposal Submissions Growth
- Active Proposals
- Percent of Proposals Funded
- Total Unique Builders
- Average Auction Price

**Example Offchain Metrics:**

- Number of Posts
- Total Engagement (Likes+Comments+Shares)
- Engagement Rate (Ratio of Engagement to Posts)
- Most Engaged Content
- Total Followers
- Follower Growth Rate (Updated based on API opportunity)
- Noggles Score: Count of posts using “⌐◨-◨” on Farcaster*

**In the first phase it won’t be possible to index Instagram posts by content, only be hashtags. As a result, the Noggles Score won’t be able to include Instagram posts.*

### Meme Activity Database (a.k.a. The MAD)

Curcially, the product’s underlying data model will be available for others to query and contribute to. That way, others can embed the index into their own Noun interfaces. Anyone should be able to get clean and reliable **meme-data-as-a-service** to support a diversity of Noun initiatives. Imagine a world where active proposals have conversation hype trackers, or ongoing projects can easily see total impressions across social media channels.

At the end of the day, we want to facilitate the use of data across the Nouns ecosystem. As the cc0 library enables media usage, the activity database enables tracking and impact analysis.

The Web API interface will be available publicly in the form of parametrizable JSON endpoints. The data will be distributed per specific sources (onchain Nouns, Farcaster, and others) as well as in aggregated form to enable the development of tools such as alerts, bots, and analytics dashboards.

## Product Roadmap

The execution of this project will be done in an iterative fashion. By building in public and getting ongoing feedback, we can deliver what the community needs, and data that will support Nouns decisions.

**Iterative Phases:**

- **Phase 1:** Deliver basic UI w/ limited branding and processed Farcaster data displayed in form of metrics. Deliver mock-up UI for onchain metrics and Instagram metrics. Host open Q&A with Nouns (e.g. via Aburra) to gather community feedback.
- **Phase 2:** Deliver basic UI w/ Farcaster metric feedback, plus Noun Subgraph indexing and onchain metrics. Host open Q&A (e.g. via Aburra) to gather community feedback.
- **Phase 3:** Deliver basic UI w/ Farcaster, Onchain metric feedback, and Instagram metrics for specific accounts and hashtags. Host open Q&A (e.g. via Aburra) to gather community feedback.
- **Phase 4:** Complete UI polishing and metrics calibration. Host open Q&A (e.g. via Aburra) to celebrate launch and discuss future opportunities (where next).

## An Ambitious Vision

This project aims to uncover what “Nouns-Native” analytics could look like, and what data infrastructure is necessary to feed this analytics into the broader Nouns governance and participation process.

We’ve already intuited that we want to ***Track*** ***Memes, Not People*** — and we’re certain there will be other innovations along the way. After all, we need to address challenges in crossing the web3-to-web2 data pipeline chasm. Is it possible? We think so.

Nouns is a place for ambitious ideas, and we are an ambitious team.

## Team

This project will be led and executed by Rafa Fernandez (Farcaster: @rafa) and Rafi Gutkowski (Farcaster: @rafi). 

- Rafa Fernandez is a community architect with a focus on building [Digital Public Utilities](https://www.notion.so/General-Networks-e4615b9b52294f8bab34a82b47023d11?pvs=21). He has decade of experience in corporate analytics and studied materials-science and engineering. He is the founder of Folklore (Folklore.Institute), a community that curates and commissions research on digital cultures. Most recently, he was part of the Summer of Protocols research program looking at [online swarms](https://www.notion.so/Welcome-to-the-Swarm-41c114211ac045f087c44c16bd993748?pvs=21). Previous to the program he worked at Mirror where he worked in creator partnerships and community development.
- Rafi Gutkowski is a software engineer and data scientist ([libred.org](https://libred.org/), [LinkedIn](http://linkedin.com/in/rgutkowski)). He started mining bitcoin in 2015 but only after exiting from his recent startup, did he double down on web3. Since then Rafi has been working on sementic analysis of decentralized social graphs, as well as creating web3-web2 bridges, such as Folklore’s web3-signature to feed [broadcast applet](https://www.notion.so/Folklore-5d34757913064064b87119c4593eda74?pvs=21).

## Funding

We are a stream of 22.5 ETH to fund this project over approximately 10 weeks.

The funds will be allocated to a two-person team (Rafa and Rafi). They are split roughly 25-75 between planning and iterative engineering. There is about a 40-40-10 between data engineering, visuals and handoff. There is approximately 10% reserved for bugs and issue resolution.

We expect that once the initial traunch of data engineering and visuals is complete, then we can make a decision on what the community needs more of (if anything), such as expanded data, or expanded analysis

## Our Commitments

- We commit to posting updates on [updates.wtf](https://updates.wtf/) with sprint plan and outcomes, in alignment with each of the community Q&A feedback sessions.
- We commit to cancelling the stream based on community feedback.
- We commit to executing this work as an open-source project, such that other onchain communities and organizations can benefit.

## Other Notes

This proposal was built based on the Basic Nouns Proposal Template, built by Rafa and available here: https://hackmd.io/@rafathebuilder/BkPAmHZbp

If you’d like to learn more about this proposal, the first Q&A conversation on Aburra is available here: https://youtu.be/_dr2yZulMG

content.title: Bounce Nouns Across the Metaverse [UPDATED w/ Feedback Q&A]
content.description:
# Bounce Nouns Across the Metaverse [UPDATED w/ Feedback Q&A]

# TL;DR

The Nouns community has created high quality libraries of Nouns artwork and assets that are incredibly all in the public domain. These are fantastic resources for developers and designers, but can be difficult for non-technical audiences to use. We want to bring accessibility and utility of Nouns to **everyone** by providing a simple, seamless way to use Nouns avatars and art across the best digital platforms and spaces. 

![nounsIntegrations](https://baunsu.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/nouns/pineappleMosaic.gif)

## Proposal brief
With the Bounce platform, we want to bridge the Nouniverse and the open Metaverse:

- make current and future Nouns easily to use, seamlessly, across digital platforms ⇒ **everyone** can experience and enjoy Nouns, forever
- bring exposure in more spaces to new audiences, both web3 and web2 ⇒ **grow** Nouns community
- build and open and extensible system with a Bounce API & SDK ⇒ **empower** community to innovate and build on top of Bounce

## Feedback Q&A

**onizuka.eth - Abstained**

**Q**: I think there is a value in proliferating across Snap/Instagram, but I think there has already been progress made on filters there (from CoralOrca?) I'm not sure what exactly the public API would be for? general infrastructure like this can be valuable, but I'm not optimistic about something like the bounce site getting any sort of use from such a decentralized org like Nouns

**A**: Great feedback and thanks for bringing up these points. CoralOrca and 0xFloyd have done fantastic work on [social filters](https://www.snapchat.com/explore/nouns/lenses), as well as [Noun 3D models](https://3dnouns.xyz/). This proposal builds on top of both of these by providing a hub where all experiences are easily accessible, not only social filters but also VR Chat, Mona, and any other platforms that will be integrated into Bounce in the future.

Our goal is to make these cross-platform experiences easily accessible through all DAO projects, both web (with a public API to link directly to Nouns experiences) and physical (Bounce NFC tags, QR codes). The Bounce site will act as a hub for Nouns and other onboarded projects, and will help bring in other users and communities into the Nouniverse.

## Budget

We’re asking for 15 ETH (to the Bounce multisig safe) to onboard Nouns onto Bounce and enable cross-world experiences.
The budget includes:

- Build a Nouns X Bounce community microsite
- Cost of asset onboarding and processing all existing and future Nouns for the following platforms:
    - VRChat
    - Mona
    - Snap
    - Instagram
- Making Bounce connections free for everyone, across all spaces, forever
- Developing new platform integrations for spaces the Nouns community is excited about

# Proposal

Bounce is a new cross-world digital asset platform that makes it easy for fans and collectors to embody their avatars in immersive web2 and web3 platforms, and connect with their communities. Our goal is to empower avatar communities to embody their avatars, express themselves and come together in more immersive and engaging ways.

This proposal is to onboard Nouns onto Bounce as an early partner, making Nouns enjoyable by the community across a range of digital spaces, including social, gaming and metaverse platforms

## How Bounce benefits the Nouns community

- Easily enjoy Nouns as avatars, sticker packs, face filters and more across social, gaming and metaverse platforms
- Expand the community and reach of the Nouns brand and content across digital spaces
- Access more platforms and experiences as they roll out, new spaces are available to all Nouns, new and existing
- Support other DAO projects with public API and SDK that make “bouncing” a seamless and hassle-free process
- Bounce Tags support phygital projects with easy onboarding and allocated stock
- Nouns on Bounce will be free for everyone, forever

## Deliverables

The project is estimated at 1.5 to 2 months and will include:

- **A unique Bounce X Nouns microsite** where the community can go to bounce across spaces and enjoy exclusive content. This site also acts as a landing page for special Nouns events and activations across spaces. (EXAMPLE MOCKUP BELOW)
    
    ![nounsMicrositeMockup.jpg](https://baunsu.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/nouns/nounsPage.jpg)
    
- **Cross platform digital avatars** that can be used as in-space characters, face lenses and filters, sticker packs and more across a range of platforms.
    
    Platforms include:
    
  - VR Chat
    
    ![VRChat Nouns](https://baunsu.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/nouns/vrchatGifNouns.gif)

    
  - Mona
    
    ![Mona Nouns](https://baunsu.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/nouns/monaGif.gif)
  
    
  - AR Filters: (ROUGH PROTOTYPE BELOW)
    - Snap
    - Instagram
    
    ![AR Filter Nouns](https://baunsu.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/nouns/social+lenses.gif)

    
- More spaces the community is excited about
- **Public API, SDK and docs** that can be used by other DAO projects to give utility to digital assets and make bouncing a hassle free integration.
- **Free access to everyone, across all spaces, forever**

We also commit to posting frequent updates on https://www.updates.wtf/ to keep the community informed on progress and updates, both as the proposal is developed, and as future platforms and experiences are rolled out and made available.

# Future proposals

## Bounce X Nouniverse events and community activations

We think the best way to experience bounce as a community is through special events, gatherings and activations. Our collab with the Wassies community was made so much more exciting by their VR Chat Among Us and Zombie Survival (https://twitter.com/ByWassiesEvents)

As Nouns is decentralized, we’d like to put forward future proposals to design, plan, coordinate and market events and games across platforms.

## Bounce Tags for DAO and community projects

Bounce Tags, our secure chain-linked NFC tags, are integrated into the Bounce ecosystem and make bouncing from a physical collectible to digital spaces a quick and seamless experience. Many DAO proposals are dedicated to crafting both amazing new Nouns physical products (Noggle Changers, NounsDAO x Pudgy Penguins toys, NOUNISH FRIENDS mini-figures, etc), and these could all be linked using tags (think tapping your Nouns glasses and bouncing to Nouns AR filters and more). We would like to put forward a future proposal to provide tags for community projects (as part of their proposals) that will be custom designed, programmed and integrated with our support. 

# Who we are

## About Bounce

Bounce is a new cross-world avatar platform that makes it easy for fans and collectors to embody their avatars in immersive web2 and web3 platforms, and connect with their communities. We automate all platform-specific integrations, such as coding, rigging, file conversions and API & SDK connections, making it simple to use a unique physical or digital collectible (such as NFTs, sneakers, trading cards and more), generated based on unique traits, as an avatar across platforms. Our Bounce Tag uses active encryption NFC to ensure a secure and permanent link between authentic physical goods and their digital counterparts.

- Learn more about Bounce - [letsbounce.gg](http://www.letsbounce.gg/)

## Bounce partnerships with avatar communities

A great example of how Bounce can help engage and activate a web3 community is our recent partnership with Wassies. Bounce allows the Wassies community to enjoy their fridge-dwelling creatures in new ways, from face filters on Snap and Instagram, to custom avatars on VR Chat, and create unique HD renders of their Wassie. 

Wassies on Bounce can be viewed by everyone, holders can bounce their held ones, and CC0 Wassies are available for everyone to bounce.

Response from the Wassies community has been great, and the team has created a series of engaging events on Twitter and VR Chat that brought together fans and holders to play games, show off their unique renders and wassify their socials. 

Below is footage from a Wassies concert in VRChat this weekend, powered by the Bounce VRChat integration.  
![Wassie Event](https://baunsu.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/nouns/wassiesEvent.gif)

## Links

- [Microsite for Bounce collab with Wassies](https://beta.letsbounce.gg/wassies)
- [Wassies announcement tweet](https://twitter.com/bywassies/status/1709554217331949818) (41.4k impressions)
- [Wassies VRChat event](https://twitter.com/bywassies/status/1710625261178228794)

## The Team

Bounce is developed by Barak & Jasper, experienced creative technologists and builders in web3. Previously, they worked together at a Japanese art collective, [teamLab](https://www.teamlab.art/), and in 2021 they co-founded [Strata](https://www.strata.gallery/), a digital art incubator.  At Strata, they developed [DenDekaDen](https://www.dendekaden.com/) with Toei Animation (the Japanese animation studio behind One Piece and Dragon Ball Z).

- More on [Barak](https://twitter.com/barakchamo)
- More on [Jasper](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jasper-degens-7269a256/)

content.title: HEAR YE, HEAR YE!!!
content.description:
# HEAR YE, HEAR YE!!!

I think it's time to add a "Person" to the nouns daily rounds. What better persona than Nounye West. Love him or hate him. He is by far one of the most successful, iconic, creative minds of our time. What artist do you know can throw a listening party for an unfinished album last minute, and sell it out? He created a whole new lane musically... Fathering in such artist as Kid Cudi, Tyler The Creator, and Travis Scott to name a few. Can you imagine if the real Ye caught wind of his Nounish Avatar?!.. He would probably want to be the only one to own it / them!.. Imagine him owning a noun, and voting on proposals. He would have a million things to say; and ideas for said props. What if he were to wear an actual pair of noggles! How much would that world wide exposure be worth in ETH to nouns? Well... I used to create custom clothing for a lot of artist to wear in video shoots, and special events, but when my Pops got sick and passed, I dropped out of the scene... And now these friends are calling again. As I noun pill them, there is a high chance I just might be seeing and working with Mr. West. 

I created 1 Nounye with assets that correlate to 4 of his albums, with 2 variations to choose from per album. It's up to vote which one is coolest. The idea is not to make the Nounye's part of the everyday auctions in perpetuity, but a one time only appearance. The 4 Nounye's would randomly mint one time, and that's it... Making them the rarest of rare! Keep Nouns Weird and cool ⌐◨-◨  

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/divineopus9/d09/main/Nounye%20on%20temp.jpg

https://x.com/divineopus9

content.title: NounsWatch: Nouns Iconic cc0 Timepieces ⌐◨-◨ ⌚ (V2)
content.description:
# NounsWatch: Nouns Iconic cc0 Timepieces ⌐◨-◨ ⌚ (V2)

# 

# tldr
1. **Why funding a NounsWatch?**
    - **Cultural Capital**: In the digital age, physical products with a cultural and fashion statement become powerful tools of social reach and influence. They serve as “physical memes," carrying the DAO's brand and ideals into new spaces.
    - **Leveraging Existing Success**: Building upon the memetical success of the sunglasses, the NounsWatch diversifies the DAO's brand to new places and moments, making it more resilient and future proof.
    - **Broader Audience**: This opens up the growing fashion watch market and audiences in numbers never reached before.
    - **Revenue Share**: With a 10% return of sales revenue to the DAO's treasury, the NounsWatch contributes to the much need flywheel spin.
    - **Open Source Legacy**: By making the blueprints and digital models public domain (CC0), the project stands to benefit the broader community, true to NounsDAO open-source nature.
2. **What is the NounsDAO funding covering?**
    - The partially done product development.
    - The minimum order quantity of 1000 watches (Dwiss will cover overproduction)
    - The launch campaign.
    - The team compensation ensuring the project’s success from inception to market.
3. **What is the Go-to-Market Strategy?**
    - Position the NounsWatch collection in the prominent affordable fashion watch segment.
    - Run a Pre-sale discount Drop on Indiegogo massive 10 million people audience.
    - Continue selling on Shopify.
    - Run Influence Marketing and User Generated Content campaigns.
    - Keep on building.

![](https://i.imgur.com/qj6bN2J.png)

# A new hero product for Nouns

The NounsWatch serves as a new, tangible interface for the Nouns brand. Designed to be worn day and night, it reaches places that the Noggles glasses can't. This watch represents a powerful demonstration of what the Nouns community can achieve, extending the brand's narrative into an entirely new realm of self-expression. It seamlessly combines nounishness and horology, on the verge of becoming **the most personal and novel product Nouns has ever created**.

![](https://i.imgur.com/PleFEx9.png)
## The NounsWatch cc0 design: accessible to everyone

Created by renowned watch designer Rafael Miranda, the bold Noggle-inspired design is **half a watch and half a ⌐◨-◨**, literally. And like all nounish things should be, it’s cc0!



It's as much about functionality as it is about meticulous attention to detail. It features an exquisite *mysterious hours* full day half display, with a glass mirror and a black dial. The hour and minute handles are individual pieces that combines every hour to form the Noggles symbol. On the NounsWatch, **every hour is Noun O'Clock!**

![](https://i.imgur.com/NC00WLn.gif)

## The most personal Nouns product yet

Explore a diverse range of personalization options with the interchangeable straps. Choose from 8 solid colors for the body and straps, or select one of the 8 available Nouns Accessory-themed straps. With 128 unique combinations, the NounsWatch will fits various styles.

![](https://i.imgur.com/9ptDzga.png)

## First Prototypes

To demonstrate our unwavering commitment to the project, not only have we developed two 3D-printed prototypes, as shown below, but we've also field-tested the product for comfort and fit on the wrists. Just imagine how stunning these will look when adorned with the final production finish and colorful straps! Watch the prototype live in video: [here](https://x.com/rsmiranda/status/1714557390241059120?s=20) and [here.](https://x.com/fabioseva/status/1714901327631843711?s=46&t=OnA_W289RIsplarDuhpSrg)
Note: The current brand identity will be revised for production version.
![](https://i.imgur.com/PekUrdI.png)

## Final Product Specs

**Case:** Injected Polycarbonate, 42 mm x 42 mm x 6 mm.
**Movement:** Japanese.
**Dial**: Exquisite half display reading system, black dial with contrasting numbers.
**Glass:** Mineral glass with anti-reflective coating. 
**Strap:** Soft Silicone.
**Water resistance:** Yes (3ATM)

---

# Dwiss: a decade of innovation

DWISS - the manufacturer - is a niche watch brand founded in 2011 by Rafael Miranda, a former professor of watch design in Milan, Italy. His accolades include several design awards and publications in the watch industry.

The brand is committed to craft distinctive timepieces that stands out with innovative designs and groundbreaking features, including the use of pioneering materials and early adoption of web3 technology such as cryptocurrency, NFTs and metaverse experiences in the watch space.

![](https://i.imgur.com/p8gK5Fi.png)

![](https://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1694722112/t9ce7v5l3t52g3azgydp.png)

![](https://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1694722042/xhyf0mdtyqkfiip0plmr.jpg)


## Contemporary distribution methods

DWISS also excels in modern distribution methods. Leveraging the power of crowdfunding and Direct-to-Consumer (D2C) strategies, launching multiple campaigns and mastering influencer and digital advertising. These accomplishments attest to DWISS's strong marketing and sales capabilities, setting a **solid foundation for the success of our Go-to-Market strategy for NounsWatch**.

Crowdfunding campaigns that generated more than USD $1.5 million.
![](https://i.imgur.com/U5gHT6Y.png)

Dwiss have a portfolio of influencers that have millions of followers especially in Youtube, but also instagram, facebook, blogs and magazines.
![](https://i.imgur.com/JS08Qcu.png)

Dwiss masters Digital Advertising, generating 9.4 millions of impressions, and 109k clicks in 2023 alone.
![](https://i.imgur.com/f3G84AV.png)

---

# A unparalleled opportunity to reach a new audience

We meticulously planned a winning Go-to-Market Strategy to make the most of it with optimal resources. **The NounsWatch collection seizes an unparalleled opportunity of introducing Nouns to a whole new audience.** 

## Step 0: Entering the Affordable Fashion Market

In an industry that generated over $70 billion in 2022, fashion ranks as the second most significant reason people wear watches, trailing only behind timekeeping. This largely accounts for why the fashion watch segment records the highest annual unit sales in the tens of millions. **The NounsWatch collection pricing and style aims to secure a position in the largest portion of this growing segment: the sub-$200 fashion watch market.**

That said, time to sell.

![](https://i.imgur.com/DprKVhF.png)

## Step 1: A pre-sale shortcut to meet 10 Million customers on Indiegogo

A common challenge to IRL products is meeting the minimum order quantities (MOQ) whilst ensuring enough demand for the product. And for custom designed watches, the MOQ of 1000 pieces makes the equation a bit challenging. 

Thanks to Dwiss successful track record on Indiegogo campaigns we can have a reputable access to create a Drop.

An Indiegogo Drop is an exclusive offer for qualified business that serves a discount pre-sale channel without the need for the regular crowdfunding. The highlight is the added layer of marketing to reach the fullest of Indiegogo’s 10 million monthly visitors and 1 million combined social media followers from 235 countries.

Dwiss will launch a NounsWatch Drop pre-sale for the price of ~~$189.00~~ $129.00 with [teaser videos and images](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r7ZsbPHqzFw) that will feature Nouns on the homepage of the Indiegogo website, as well as in related content such as carousels, newsletters, and social media.

**By doing so, we aim to generate sufficient demand for NounsWatch, particularly from outside the Nouns and watchmaking communities, thus bringing it closer to mainstream media and markets.**

![](https://i.imgur.com/exRMxAh.png)

## Step 2: Continuous sale on the NounsWatch Shopify store

After the presale window concludes, sales will resume in our website [nounswatch.com](http://nounswatch.com/) for $189.00 ($169.00 for selected communities), where we will accept both fiat currency and cryptocurrency. Leveraging the same proven digital marketing strategy that Dwiss employs for its products, we are going to use a share of the sales profit in Digital Advertising to generate millions of impressions and drive hundreds of thousands of clicks to our website, until the point of delivery and after. If demand falls short, Dwiss name is in play. We bear the risk and will undertake the responsibility of selling the product.

![](https://i.imgur.com/jIsZVSV.jpg)

## Step 3: Ding-dong! Delivery Time

Upon receiving the initial shipment from the factory, we'll start fulfilling orders through both Indiegogo and Shopify channels. At the same time, we'll ramp up our marketing efforts to stimulate new demand, focusing on a broad [influencer campaign and a user-generated content initiative](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5h5gh3ZqPzjm_Rrt6FKdrTbbJ00IF9Es). **This is a pivotal moment for the NounsWatch and Nouns history, and we are committed to maximizing its impact.**

![](https://i.imgur.com/wztkALV.png)

## Step 4: The NounsWatch Legacy

**Spin the Flywheel (new!)**
Regardless the supply, **10% of every NounsWatch collection sales revenue will be sent back to the Treasury** and submitted to Propdates. Assuming a pre-sale sold-out of 1000 pieces, the gross revenue would be $129,000. 10% of this ($12,900) goes back to the DAO treasury, further reducing the actual costs to the DAO. Sales out of the pre-sale window generate more revenue.

**Release the IP (new!)**
The NounsWatch blueprint and 3d files **will be cc0, fully available on the public domain**.

**Everyday, forever (new!)**
The objective for NounsWatch is not to exist as a limited edition, but rather to establish it as a standard product in the Dwiss partnership lineup. **We will sustain production for as long as consumer demand remains**, and may release new straps, models, and features when deemed appropriate.

**Warranty and Customer Support**
Dwiss will provide a world-class ongoing support and warranty for customers after 2 years they have purchased NounsWatch.

---

## **Funds Allocation**

We have meticulously planned the budget to ensure optimal allocation of funds across all critical aspects of the project. Our financial strategy for V2 has been redesigned to sustain our competitive pricing strategy while accommodating the increased workload of the team until the sales take-off. 

We have estimated the financial requirements for the NounsWatch project as follows:

- $5,000 - Development
- $90,000 - NounsWatch and straps (1,000 pieces)
- $10,000 - Packaging
- $25,000 - External Labor and Taxes
- $14,000 - First-Class Video and 3D Production (third-party services)
- $7,000 - Indiegogo Drop Paid Feature Package
- $18,000 - Team Compensation

**TOTAL ASK: $169,000 USDC**
Wallet: [dwiss.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/0x80b0b325D6A1E19953dFffb6Cc117263916796F8)

## Timeline

![](https://i.imgur.com/UK7lhJP.png)

---

## Team

[Fabio Seva](https://x.com/fabioseva) - Concept & Marketing
LilNoun#125, nouns-pilled founder of [Public Good Beer](https://twitter.com/publicgoodbeer?s=21&t=OnA_W289RIsplarDuhpSrg)
[Rafael Miranda](https://x.com/rsmiranda) - Design
LilNoun#7753, watch designer and Dwiss founder
[Dwiss](https://x.com/dwisswatch) - Production and operations

---

**Acknowledgments:** we would like to thank the dozens of comments we received during V1, which enabled us to develop this new version. By participating in this project, the DAO is not just 'spending' on a product but making a strategic investment in invaluable brand equity. This intangible value—captured through consumer engagement, social influence, and expanded market reach—is an asset that can far outlive the investment, providing a return that is difficult to quantify. It’s important to understand that the full impact of this investment will unfold over time, requiring a level of trust in the project’s long-term vision and execution.

contentSignatures.reason: This is the most personal "physical meme" to date. A beautifully designed, CC0 wearable for Nouns fans and watch fans alike. A conversation starter about Nouns on your wrist. The fruits of an infinite art project, a means of proliferation, a physical object for world building and a CC0 public good.

content.title: Bright Any Colors with ⌐◨-◨ Noggles Jack Events
content.description:
# Bright Any Colors with ⌐◨-◨ Noggles Jack Events

# Bright Any Colors with ⌐◨-◨ Noggles Jack Events

![](https://eibakatsu.com/bac/1.png)

## TL;DR
- “Bright Any Colors” embodies the meaning that every individual shines to their potential.

- We will be hosting a charity event “Bright Any Colors with ⌐◨-◨” will be held for the first time at a closed elementary school in Nagoya on Saturday, December 23, 2023.
This event is a networking event where we discuss the role of technology in an era of “pluralism” with participants. People involved in seemingly different fields, such as social contribution organizations and the web3 community, will gather together with the aim of creating new support and revenue methods that combine social problem solving and web3.

- Simultaneously with the charity event, we will be hosting “Noggles Jack Nagoya” and the “web3 Community Exhibition,” expecting over 1,000 attendees. In line with the event, there will be talk sessions, Nouns' booths, workshops, promotional merchandise distributions, and planned social contribution activities.

- Prior to the event, we will have a booth for Nouns at the Design Festa in Tokyo on Sunday, November 12, 2023. Following our previous Proposal 228 “Noggles Jack Tokyo,” this will be our second event where we will display and sell Nouns merchandise. Moreover, we will also be promoting “Bright Any Colors with ⌐◨-◨.”

## Background & Challenges
- While individuals possess various facets, society often fails to accept them, because it's easier to manage by measuring everyone against a uniform set of values, leading to a tendency to avoid complexity.
I believe that the biggest societal issue lies in the attempt to oversimplify intricate matters. Many people in today's society are bound by existing frameworks, having forgotten how to create new concepts and systems on their own accord.

- The utilization of web3 technology for societal transformation is in an trial phase, but leveraging Nouns' autonomous decentralized system has the potential to assist.
There's a need for support towards technology that encourages “pluralistic” decision-making and collaboration, as well as the activities that accompany it.

- In October 2022, the United Nations Committee on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities pointed out that Japan's education for persons with disabilities is lagging behind and made [recommendations.](https://docstore.ohchr.org/SelfServices/FilesHandler.ashx?enc=6QkG1d%2FPPRiCAqhKb7yhsox6sZe%2Fik6d3iDJzISRPhvIaActFR9I%2FAIZ%2Be8dEYc3x9pGI%2BAqnUjiYnhf%2BzLRJLqW2mBzZdcaW0%2B10tvwrA97qOnmCuV89Qwl7dhkmc1B) However, there has been still no progress in understanding and awareness of disabilities, and the separation of special needs education from regular classes has been seen as a problem.
Furthermore, research and studies on rare and congenital diseases are struggling due to the influence of market principles and an emphasis on efficiency.

- “Bright Any Colors” is aimed at supporting individuals with disabilities, children, and students. Participants will be able to exchange opinions within the event, increasing the potential for new ideas and solutions to emerge.

## Theme & Objectives
“Bright Any Colors with ⌐◨-◨” aims to enjoyably learn about DAOs through Nouns, aspiring to pave the way for a future where everyone shines their brightest. Our passion for enhancing the lives of all resonates with the public, and we've designed this event hoping that the concepts and systems of web3 naturally gain broader recognition. Relying on the insights and experiences from this endeavor, we will continuously engage in activities that leverage web3 technology to address societal challenges. We will host events 3-4 times a year, striving for widespread awareness and education.

## Event Overview
### Dec 23, 2023 Event & Workshop
![](https://eibakatsu.com/bac/2.png)

- **A talk session will be held on the stage of the gymnasium.**
Our special guests for this event will be Ms. Chizuru Azuma, an actor who has been actively involved in social contribution activities for over 30 years, and Mr. paji, a research expert in DAO and Co-Planner at pNouns.
The theme will be an explanation of the full-fledged DAO "Nouns" and its applicability to social issues.
　
For example…the funding mechanism by Nouns DAO What is "Treasury Wallet"?
We'll introduce its structure, potential applications, and other real-life examples, all tailored for beginners.
Nouns-related images and videos will be projected using a projector into the visual stage production.

- **Booth exhibition by social contribution organizations.**
We will introduce initiatives by organizations supporting people with disabilities, children, and students, as well as employment support facilities, as well as sell products and conduct educational activities.

- **Invited event company "NFT COLOR" together the actively active web3 community in Japan Exhibiting NFT art works,** introducing the community, and interacting with social contribution organizations.

### Event Proposal
#### Various Workshops
![](https://eibakatsu.com/bac/3.png)

Ms. Chizuru Azuma is in charge of the planning, composition, casting, direction, costume design, and overall supervision of the [“MAZEKOZE Island Tour,”](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=waK22pnvFRY) which is being streamed worldwide as one of the events of the “Tokyo 2020 NIPPON Festival.”

[Using the theatrical arts to create a more diverse society](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=waK22pnvFRY) | Chizuru Azuma | TEDxKyoto

### Location
#### Nagono Campus
![](https://eibakatsu.com/bac/4.png)
["Nagono Campus"](https://nagono-campus.jp/englishguide/) is located in Nagoya City, Aichi Prefecture.

### Phase
![](https://eibakatsu.com/bac/5.png)

### Advatages of simultaneous event in Tokyo and Nagoya
![](https://eibakatsu.com/bac/6.png)

At the event "Noggles Jack Tokyo" held on May 20th and 21st, 2023, Nouns became widely known to the general public through Noggles.
At the charity event "Bright Any Colors with ⌐◨-◨," we will set up a "Noggles Jack Nagoya" booth.
Just like last time, attendees can enjoy Nouns characters and Noggles. Furthermore, this time we will introduce beginners to the concept and system of Nouns DAO, conveying its intrinsic appeal.
We will also introduce several active Nouns communities in Japan, offering a space where attendees can feel more connected and familiar with them.
Furthermore, at "Noggles Jack Tokyo2," we will once again meet many people in Japan's capital, Tokyo, and raise awareness for the charity event we plan to hold in the near future.

Thank you for the funding provided by Nouns for ["Noggles Jack Tokyo"](https://twitter.com/pNounsOFFICIAL/status/1665346115636727808) (Proposal 228).

![](https://eibakatsu.com/bac/7.png)
![](https://eibakatsu.com/bac/8.png)

#### pNouns New Initiative. Maximizing Technology at the Event.
AR Derived from 3D Nouns, Nouns is Now CC0.

![](https://eibakatsu.com/bac/cup2.gif)

![](https://eibakatsu.com/bac/kapi.gif)

#### Goods & Budget
![](https://eibakatsu.com/bac/10.png)


### Operations

[rosé](https://twitter.com/Roselog5)　Bright Any Colors with ⌐◨-◨, Lead & Organizer 

[hiro](https://twitter.com/hirookokokok)　Noggles Jack, Lead & Co-organizer

[sasorichan](https://twitter.com/gomibako0318) 　Bright Any Colors with ⌐◨-◨, Core member & Co-sponsor

[metamon](https://twitter.com/metamon360)　Responsible for AR/VR/Metaverse

content.title: Nouns : A Movie - Chapter 3, 4 & 5! ⌐◨-◨
content.description:
# Nouns : A Movie - Chapter 3, 4 & 5! ⌐◨-◨

 [![](https://i.postimg.cc/1zK1hgNV/blunts-announcement.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ef6hLq_xXUo)

*[Nouns Movie](https://nouns.movie/) Episode 2 with runtime of 11 mins is scheduled to be released in the week of Nov 15, 2023. Episode 2 will also be the first multi-client droposal in collaboration with Nounsagora. Droposal will come soon.*

### Tl;dr:
This specific prop is seeking funding to create **Episode 3, 4 & 5 with a run-time of 10.5-11 mins each** delivered within 240 days.

#### What is Atrium?
Atrium is a crypto-native network of independent artists and creators. Disciplines represented on Atrium currently include Screenwriting, Animation, Concept Art, VFX, Voice Actors, and Music production. Together, creatives on Atrium bring the best ranging experiences from **Pixar, Marvel, Luma Pictures, Sony, Netflix & many more.**

---
### Proposal Ask:
 1,125,000 (375K X 3) USD for a time-period of 240 days.

> Note: *Ask is following the funding breakdown shared in the original kick-off [proposal 245](https://nouns.wtf/vote/245).*  

#### Proposal timeline progress
![](https://i.postimg.cc/wBLDJgz6/3244.png)

#### Why Ask for 3 episodes at once?
- Working on 3 month-long milestones at a time was tuned in to showcase proof-of-work to DAO and drive accountability forward.


- Since then [Nouns Movie](https://twitter.com/nounsmovie) team has led by example, on what it means to be transparent in production process and keeping community at large in the loo.


- What we realised however, this introduced inefficiency in securing long-term senior talent to be available to work on the film as they have no guarantee on whether they will still be working on the film after 3 months (*for e.g. followup proposals not passing*). We are often competing against traditional studio contracts for senior talent.
  
- Funding 3 episodes upfront will enable us to introduce batching of tasks for pre-production and animation, making the process much more predictable to manage. 


- More funding committed for the film will enable us to pre-empt discussions with distribution partners who will have a clearer picture of financing on the project and high likelihood of it being fully completed once they commit.

---
#### Where will the funds go to?
- **Story and Scripting** for the Episode 3, 4 & 5 
- **Preview Work in Progress and BTS** delivered through out the proposal duration
- **Finished Episode 3,4 & 5** - delivered by 240 days time period.
- Propdates published all along the way.


![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/r19IfQTw3.png)


As we continue production, the timeline becomes more efficient and shrinks, ultimately leading us to the film conclusion. 

#### Kickoff Notes for EP3 onwards
- After Episode 2 release, the team will be on a short hiatus for the rest of November (2 weeks).
- Team ramps back up slowly throughout month of December and sporadic availability due to holiday month.
- Expected to fully iron out EP3 script during this time period.
- Team back at full capacity starting January and full production loop resumes. 
---

### Recap and Progress Updates so far
You can follow Ep2 Propdates [here](https://www.updates.wtf/prop/317). 

![](https://europe1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/optimized/2X/2/2415348f7943c8a429024b648b3eb68b24a0d7fa_2_1380x862.jpeg)

**Tl;dr:** Its bolder, bigger and better! 


#### Cast Announcements so far
![](https://i.postimg.cc/1zVh9NsW/19.png)

- [Elijah Fox](https://twitter.com/nounsmovie/status/1701347725407838288) (Voice of Gi)
- [Lisa Stanley](https://twitter.com/nounsmovie/status/1656100844763496448) (Voice of Mrs Waxman)
- [Ray Hurd](https://twitter.com/nounsmovie/status/1710009700341928121) (Voice of Go)
- [Cesar Romero](https://twitter.com/nounsmovie/status/1711863323967578591) (Voice of Leader blunt)

![](https://i.postimg.cc/253cSV1K/environment-factory-hallyway.png)
#### Behind the Scenes
- [Discourse](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8E_7XtzU47c&ab_channel=AtriumAnimation) with the directors : How Nouns Movie enabled them to do something unthinkable, completely remotely.
- Understanding the intricacies of Blus [Musical Score](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I4OavIimoXs&ab_channel=AtriumAnimation).
- Fun Trivia about the world [sound design](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7umbTCiMTmk&ab_channel=AtriumAnimation) with Jordan - our SFX Lead.

#### First Casting call
- Casting call complete. 15 characters from other Nouns-values aligned communities were selected to make cameo appearances through out the Episode 2.
https://twitter.com/nounsmovie/status/1686797509765840896
- We intend to do more of these along to way opening the world of Blus outwards for others to participate in.

#### Team Expansion Announcements
- Dan Waters
https://twitter.com/nounsmovie/status/1693785090340643078


### DApp / UI Updates
- **Nouns.Movie** was created to publish the story (dedicated webapp built with minting UX on top of Zora & cumulative leaderboard built-in)
- Added Multi-episode support. 
- Introduced Worldview mints: Inexpensive art mints from different locations from the world of Blus that adds to cumulative ranking on the leaderboard.
- Dedicated Behind the scenes section for audience to watch and explore auxillary content.
- Planned token-gating for streaming content.

![](https://i.postimg.cc/1Xd6YyB7/11111.png)
![](https://i.postimg.cc/fTsHzvSg/2222.png)

---

### Story Updates
**Genre**: Action, Comedy

Script for the delivered Episode 2 can be found [***here***](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1gdInCNXaLvKA5Vrxe6aCTiOtE67jNpG6/view?usp=sharing)

*We also created a rough outline of how the story progresses through completion. We are currently expanding from that structure as part of the next story act.*

---

#### Additionally
As part of the this continued workstream, we intend to:
- Create token-gating for content for future so the Nounish communities can watch the story overall but we keep doors open to bring streamers and other conventional partners of distribution.
- keep building out self-distribution channels for content.


*... We eagerly look forward to continue building the cinematic universe of Nouns.*


Team Nouns Movie ⌐◨-◨
![](https://i.postimg.cc/Xq7yPtm5/Screen-Shot-2023-10-09-at-5-46-55-PM.png)



---

### Appendix

**Nouns: A Movie Website**
https://nouns.movie/

**Nouns Movie Twitter**
https://twitter.com/nounsmovie

**Atrium**
https://atrium.art/

Atrium / Nouns Movie discord
https://discord.com/invite/J92zPvRGhv

**Propdates on EP2**
https://www.updates.wtf/prop/317


Self-sustaining creator flywheels
https://twitter.com/pbrianandj/status/1610695135414845440

Develop Film and TV like its 2023
![](https://i.imgur.com/Iwy1zcJ.png)
https://pricepoint.substack.com/p/price-point-018-how-to-develop-film

**Previous Nouns Movie Props**
https://www.nounsagora.com/proposals/317
https://www.nounsagora.com/proposals/245

--
