content.title: NounsWatch: Nouns Iconic Timepieces ⌐◨-◨ ⌚
content.description:
# NounsWatch: Nouns Iconic Timepieces ⌐◨-◨ ⌚

![](https://i.imgur.com/qj6bN2J.png)

# The Noggles meant to be worn all day and night
NounsWatch is a tangible representation of what the Nouns community is capable of, and adds to the other successfully funded initiatives extending the brand to a whole new universe of Fashion AND Watch enthusiasts. It seamlessly combines nounishness and horology, **on the verge of becoming the most personal product Nouns has ever created**.

`⌐◨-◨ for the wrists`

---

## Positioning
The watch industry is a lucrative market, with the segment accounting for over US$70 billion in revenue in 2022. We aim to position NounsWatch within the most attractive range of world-class watch brands: the affordable design (<200 USD).

![](https://i.imgur.com/DprKVhF.png)


---
## The NounsWatch design
Designed by renowned watch designer Rafael Miranda, the bold Noggle-inspired design features a superb polycarbonate case, a Japanese movement, and a exquisite half display with a glass mirror and a black dial.
![](https://i.imgur.com/PleFEx9.png)
The strap is made of easy interchangeable silicone rubber in either one color or the available Nouns Accessory themes (TBD).

![](https://i.imgur.com/9ptDzga.png)
The hour and minute handles features individual pieces that combines every hour to form the Noggles symbol.

![](https://i.imgur.com/mEBtHNJ.gif)

Not only have we considered its aesthetic appeal, focusing on style and taste, but we've also paid meticulous attention to its function. It's as much about refinement as it is about precision.

---
## Specs

**Case:** Polycarbonate, 42 mm x 42 mm x 6 mm. Fits from wrists of 15cm and up
**Movement:** Japanese
**Dial**: Exquisite half display reading system, black dial with contrasting numbers
**Glass:** Mineral glass with anti-reflective coating 
**Strap:** Easy interchangeable silicone rubber in various colors and patterns

---
## First Prototypes
In order to show our commitment to the project, we have developed two 3d printed prototypes as you can see below. Imagine how amazing they will look with the final production finish and the colored straps!

Video: [here](https://x.com/rsmiranda/status/1714557390241059120?s=20) and [here](https://x.com/fabioseva/status/1714901327631843711?s=46&t=OnA_W289RIsplarDuhpSrg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/Fm1vcc4.png)

---

## Timeline
![](https://i.imgur.com/ugqJkvg.png)


**Phase 1: Prototype (done √)**

**Phase 2 (option1): NFT Airdrop (~2 weeks)**
As soon as the prop get funded, we are going to create and airdrop 888 Nounswatch NFTs to Nouns holders (incl. Treasury Nouns), snapshot is created on the day this proposal is open for voting, the same day Nouns 888 was born. Each Nounswatch NFT is eligible to redeem 1 (one) physical Nounswatch on [https://nounswatch.com](https://nounswatch.com/) (beta), thus no need to connect and verify Nouns tokens.

**Phase 3: Color and straps variants definition (~2 weeks)**
- watch crown side
- 8 solid color variants (body + strap)
- 8 strap patterns that will be produced.

**Phase 4: Claim window and pre-sales (~4 weeks)**
Our Shopify storefront is gonna showcase the product, including all watch colors and strap variants available and handle the redeem information. By connecting wallet with Web3Connect/Shopthru, token holders are eligible a FREE watch + shipping. The claiming window is needed to guarantee quantities for each body/strap colors. After the window, we no longer guarantee the colors, and the redemptionwill be first come first serve. We will also be accepting pre-orders with payment in crypto and fiat to serve other internal and external customers.

**Phase 5: Production (~8 weeks)**
We are going to share images and content of the entire production process (moulding, injection, painting etc).

**Phase 6: Assembling, Packaging & Shipping  (~2 weeks)**
After receiving the final product from the factory we initiate the assembling, packaging, handling and shipping of Nounswatch to holders and buyers.

**Phase 6: warranty and after sales service for 2 years**
Dwiss will provide a world-class ongoing support and warranty for customers after 2 years they have claimed/purchased Nounswatch. This also includes long-term storage (>2y) of unclaimed watches.

**Promotional Video / Ad**
Once the first pieces are delivered we are going to create showcase video of Nounswatch and the Nouns Brand for marketing purposes. We will work with influencers to promote NounsWatches, sales will continue in Shopify store, and new models may come over the years.
 
---
## Team
**Fabio Seva** ([https://x.com/fabioseva](https://x.com/fabioseva?s=21&t=OnA_W289RIsplarDuhpSrg)) **- Concept & Marketing**
LilNoun#125, nouns-pilled founder of [Public Good Beer](https://twitter.com/publicgoodbeer?s=21&t=OnA_W289RIsplarDuhpSrg)

**Rafael Miranda** ([https://x.com/rsmiranda](https://x.com/rsmiranda?s=21&t=TBiiMRlpGleVhBPiCCngDQ)) **- Design**
An experienced watch designer with hundreds of watch collections designed for brands and personalities (incl. Versace, Valentino, Timex, Sir. Richard Branson) and winner of world-known design awards, like the Red Dot Design Award, IF Design Award, Good Design Award, among others.
![](https://i.imgur.com/p8gK5Fi.png)

**Dwiss - Production and operations**
The production is all handled by DWISS (https://www.dwiss.com), a swiss-based company founded by Rafael in 2011, which pioneered the web3 space in the watch industry, with 2 phygital watch collections, tokenomics, metaverse wearables, metaverse showrooms and 4x funded Indiegogo campaigns.
![](https://i.imgur.com/CqQU5u0.png)

---

## Production and **Funds Allocation:**

We have meticulously planned the budget to ensure optimal allocation of funds across all critical aspects of the project. This includes development, manufacturing, packaging, shipping, labor, and marketing. Our financial strategy has been designed with a keen focus on achieving the right balance between the minimum order quantity (MOQ) and an competitive final price for the product. This careful financial planning is integral to the successful realization and sustainability of the project.

We have estimated the financial requirements for the Nounstime watch project as follows:

5,000 USD Development
90,000 USD Production
25,000 USD External Labour and Taxes
30,000 USD Packaging and Shipping

**TOTAL ASK: $150,000 USDC**

**Acknowledgments:** We would like to thank all the great appreciation we had so far in the private conversations. We really want to make this happen!

content.title: Nouns Capture: Igniting Children’s Worlds with Fun, Play, and Learning
content.description:
# Nouns Capture: Igniting Children’s Worlds with Fun, Play, and Learning

# Nouns Capture App Expansion Proposal

## Table of Contents
1. [Introduction](#introduction)
2. [MVP Release and Success](#mvp-release-and-success)
3. [How the App Works](#how-the-app-works)
4. [Expansion Plan](#expansion-plan)
5. [Proven Success in EdTech](#proven-success-in-edtech)
6. [Nouns ROI: Benefits to the Nouns DAO](#nouns-roi-benefits-to-the-nouns-dao)
7. [Nouns Capture at NFT Conferences and Events](#nouns-capture-at-nft-conferences-and-events)
8. [Budget Breakdown](#budget-breakdown)
9. [Project Timeline: 4-Month Roadmap to Success](#project-timeline-6-month-roadmap-to-success)
10. [Ongoing Support and Maintenance](#ongoing-support-and-maintenance)

---

## 📖 Introduction
A Unique Opportunity for Nouns DAO to fund an experience uniquely centered around Nouns. Focused primarily on engaging children, the app aims to be a playground where Nouns are at the core of fun, interactive, and educational activities. This will be achieved through a scavenger hunt, encouraging movement, exploration, and learning in a delightful manner.

We propose a funding request of 35,000 USDC to expand the Nouns Capture app, an interactive scavenger hunt that educates school-aged students globally about Nouns and key Web 3 concepts in a fun and engaging way. Currently available for iOS, our expansion plan includes developing an Android version of the app, a worldwide launch to tens of thousands of school students globally, and full connected curriculum integration.

## 🌈 Nouns Doing Good: Witnessing Joy and Engagement Firsthand

Nouns, through the Nouns Capture app, have already begun to sprinkle the magic of joy and wonder into the lives of young explorers around the world. Our MVP has not just been a theoretical success; it’s been a playground where children’s faces light up with delight and curiosity as they engage in a universe filled with playful Nouns, embarking on adventures that fuse the real and digital worlds.

![Engaged and delighted children navigating the world of Nouns Capture](https://connectedpe.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Screenshot-2023-09-15-at-11.57.53-am.png)

From our hands-on experience, we've witnessed the authentic happiness and excitement that the Nouns Capture app brings to children. It’s not just about discovering and learning; it’s about igniting a passion for exploration and a love for an active, engaging, and joyful form of education, where each Noun becomes a cherished companion in their learning journey. For example students in Singapore using the Nouns capture app as part of a learning activity to learn about Nutrition and Menu planning. (see below)

![enter image description here](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FwWw7bpaIAchzny?format=jpg&name=medium)

We have a profound understanding of this realm and a clear vision of how to craft experiences that resonate with the hearts and minds of students globally. With Nouns at the core, the potential to unleash an even more captivating, enriching, and delightful educational adventures.


---

## 🏆 MVP Release and Success
The Nouns Capture app has already been released as a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) on iOS and has received an overwhelmingly positive response. [Download Here](https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/nouns-capture/id6447956444?uo=2)  

So far, with a word-of-mouth silent launch, we've had 3522 Educational Downloads. This represents schools and educational institutions downloading the app to explore Nouns in their contexts. The MVP showcases the potential of the app as a powerful educational tool, with students across the globe in our beta audience actively engaging with the platform. This early success is a testament to the app's strong foundation, and we aim to build upon this momentum with the proposed expansion.

![enter image description here](https://connectedpe.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Screenshot-2023-09-15-at-11.57.42-am.png)

---

## 🎮 How the App Works
The Nouns Capture app allows anyone to find and collect Nouns hidden within barcodes/QR codes in their real environments. By scanning these barcodes using the app, students unlock the hidden Nouns and can store them in their digital journal.  

As they progress through the game and collect more Nouns, students are also presented with opportunities to learn about Web 3 concepts. The app encourages exploration and learning in an engaging and interactive way, helping students gain a deeper understanding of the Nouns ecosystem and the broader principles of Web 3 technology.

![enter image description here](https://connectedpe.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Screenshot-2023-09-15-at-11.57.48-am.png)

With absolutely no setup required, you can get started hunting Nouns and playing the base experience right now. Here I am finding Nouns in my local supermarket using the MVP version. 

![enter image description here](https://connectedpe.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/ezgif.com-optimize-1.gif)


---

## 📈 Expansion Plan
### 🤖 Android Development
As part of our expansion, we will develop an Android version of the Nouns Capture app to ensure maximum reach and accessibility. This will significantly increase the app's user base and allow students with Android devices to enjoy the same engaging educational experience as their iOS counterparts.

### 🎨 UI Refinement: Unveiling a Nounish Aesthetic
While our current app serves as a functional MVP with essential UI and UX features, it's merely a stepping stone to what we envision. We're excited to bring to life an elevated user interface that embodies a distinct Nounish aesthetic, complete with harmonious colors and fonts. This refined design aims to not only enhance user engagement but also to resonate deeply with our target audience.

## 🌐 Evolving Playgrounds: Incorporating SubDAOs in the Nouns Capture Universe

In the next iteration of Nouns Capture, we plan to integrate various SubDAOs, making the experience more dynamic and engaging. Users will have the option to toggle between capturing different elements like Nouns, lil nouns, or gnars.

This inclusion allows for a broader, more diverse gameplay, offering a richer user experience while encouraging creativity and exploration. By doing this, we aim to unlock new possibilities and continuously evolve the game to meet and exceed user expectations.

![Example of toggling between capturing various elements in the Nouns Capture app](https://connectedpe.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Screenshot-2023-10-21-at-2.56.05-pm-e1697860665424.png)

Our inclusive approach aims to nurture a symbiotic relationship with SubDAOs, allowing them to infuse the game with their distinctive flavors, creatures, and narratives. This organic amalgamation aims to perpetuate an ever-evolving, rich, and engaging user experience, encouraging continuous exploration, learning, and fun.



### 🏋️ Global Launch to 20,000 PE Teachers
Launching the Nouns Capture app is far from a ‘build it and they will come’ approach. We are not starting from scratch; instead, we are leveraging an established stronghold in a crucial educational niche.

-   **Pre-established Audience:** We proudly host a robust audience, ready and waiting. Their presence guarantees that the app will not fall on deaf ears but will be eagerly embraced and incorporated into diverse learning environments.
    
-   **Teacher’s Influence:** Our network consists of 20,000 teachers, each a conduit of creativity and influence. Their involvement means tailored experiences crafted with expertise, ensuring the app's utility and engagement are maximized.
    
-   **Quantifying the Impact:** Let’s decipher the numbers - imagine each teacher on our list works with 100 students (its probably more than this), we are looking at a potential ripple effect of impact that helps proliferate nouns. 
    
-   **Innovation and Authority:** Our reputation precedes us. With a history of delivering value, the Nouns Capture app is another innovative offering that the educational community will trust and adopt enthusiastically into their learning programs. 
    
This isn’t a hopeful venture into uncertainty. It is a strategic deployment of an innovative tool into a welcoming and prepared ecosystem, promising not just exposure, but meaningful engagement and expansive influence.

### 📚 Integration with School Curricula
Our audience of teachers appreciates turnkey solutions that provide immediate value in their classrooms. To make this possible, we develop world-class, curriculum-aligned lesson plans that can be easily implemented. Our goal is to seamlessly integrate the Nouns Capture app into school curricula worldwide. By incorporating the app into students' learning, we ensure they gain valuable knowledge about key Web 3 concepts and other core subject areas while engaging with the Nouns ecosystem in a fun and interactive manner. [Download Our Sample Lessons](https://connectedpe.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/Nouns_20Lesson_20Plans.pdf)

![enter image description here](https://connectedpe.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Screenshot-2023-09-15-at-11.58.01-am.png)
---

## 🌟 Proven Success in EdTech: Global Impact & Engagement 🌟
Our apps are already used by hundreds of thousands of students yearly across the globe, with impressive success stories such as:  

 1. [Move It](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/move-it/kopilngnmfklhhjocdfdlokmodibcbmk): A brain break Chrome extension for students with 98 million pageviews.
 2. [Balance It](https://apps.apple.com/au/app/balance-it-task-cards/id630956844): An interactive mobile app for teaching gymnastics and balance skills, with over 1 million downloads.
 3. [Sports Tracker](https://sportstrackerapp.com/): A school sports software with over 330,000 student accounts.  

These achievements demonstrate our dedication to creating and delivering high-quality experiences that resonate with students and educators worldwide, as well as our capacity to effectively reach & shape these audiences.



---

## 💡 Nouns ROI: Benefits to the Nouns DAO
### 🌍 Real-Life Proliferation of Nouns
The Nouns Capture app offers a unique opportunity to expand the Nouns brand's reach among the global school student body, targeting a vast and diverse audience. By launching the app to our network of 20,000 PE teachers, we will introduce thousands of students to the Nouns ecosystem. While many proposals focus on Web 3 users, we believe that true proliferation stems from making Nouns known in traditional contexts. Schools serve as an ideal avenue for genuine proliferation, as they bridge the gap between the digital world and everyday life, providing an immersive and educational experience for students to learn about and engage with the Nouns ecosystem.

### 🤝 Engage the Next Generation
The World Economic Forum estimates that over 1 billion people will be using blockchain-based systems by 2030, and much of this future audience is currently in today's schools. By introducing Nouns and Web 3 to students early on, we can help cultivate a knowledgeable user base familiar with the Nouns ecosystem and contribute to the broader Web 3 community. We plan to do this via in-app education and interactive experiences.

![enter image description here](https://connectedpe.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Screenshot-2023-09-15-at-11.58.09-am.png)

---

## 🎤 Nouns Capture at NFT Conferences and Events
Nouns Capture will be a valuable tool that can be leveraged at NFT conferences and events as an innovative and engaging way to educate attendees about Nouns and Lil Nouns. By utilizing Nouns Capture in these situations, we aim to create memorable experiences for participants and generate enthusiasm for the Nouns ecosystem.  
Here's a simple scenario illustrating how Nouns Capture can be effectively utilized at NFT conferences and events:  
- Attendees are informed about the Nouns Capture activity during the event's opening announcements or through promotional materials distributed before the event.
- They are instructed to download the Nouns Capture app on their smartphones to participate in the activity.
- The event organizers have strategically placed Nouns hidden within QR codes throughout the venue. These QR codes could be located at various points of interest, such as exhibits, booths, or food and beverage stations.
- Attendees use the Nouns Capture app to scan and collect the hidden Nouns as they explore the venue and engage with the event's programming.
- As they collect Nouns, participants also learn about Web 3 concepts and the Nouns ecosystem, further enhancing their understanding and connection to the Nouns brand.
- Upon completion of the activity, attendees return to the Nouns booth to prove their captures by showing their in-app journal containing the collected Nouns.
- Event organizers reward the participants with prizes, such as exclusive NFTs, merchandise, or event passes, creating a memorable and engaging experience for attendees.

---

## 💰 Budget Breakdown
UI Refinement and Android Development (Nouns Capture): $15,000
Marketing and Global Launch: $10,000
Curriculum Integration and Content Development: $5,000
Operations: $5,000 USDC
Total: 35,000 USDC

---

## 🗓️ Project Timeline: 4-Month Roadmap to Success
### 📅 Months 1-2
- 🎨 UI Refinement and Android Development for Nouns Capture
### 📅 Months 3-4
- 🎯 Finalize App Features and Integrations
- 📚 Start Curriculum Integration and Content Development
- 🚀 Begin Marketing and Global Launch preparations
- 📚 Complete Curriculum Integration and Content Development
- 🚀 Finalize Marketing and Global Launch preparations
- 🌐 Nouns Capture App Global Launch
- 🛠️ Operations commence

---

## 🔧 Ongoing Support and Maintenance
Creating and maintaining impactful educational experiences for students worldwide is at the heart of our business. The ConnectedPE team is fully committed to providing ongoing support and maintenance for the Nouns Capture app as an integral part of our app portfolio. This is what happens when you build aligned experiences that are designed for real-world use; it is NOT a burden to upkeep these as they are fundamental experiences for those in our audience. Nouns Capture will receive the same level of support and attention as any of our other apps and products, ensuring its continued success and impact on global students. This commitment comes without any additional cost from the DAO.

content.title: Nouns Got Something to Say.
content.description:
# Nouns Got Something to Say.

![](https://imgur.com/fvL8mqd.jpg)

# TL;DR
 
⌐◨-◨ We believe in the **Power of Culture and Music** to unite people and share the essence of the **Nouns Community**.

Inspired by Beyoncé's Renaissance Tour and Comic-Con, **Nouns Got Something to Say** is a music concert where attendees are encouraged to dress up as Nouns.

**Live Music** sets will be performed by artists who align with the counterculture, promoting raw, unapologetic art. We will engage artists with cult followings to draw fans to the event and Noun-ish culture.

A **Costume Contest** will be held for attendees who dress up as Noun characters. Attendees may enter the contest by posting a photo of their outfit on social media and tagging #NounsGotSomethingToSay on the day of the event. Prizes will be awarded to the winners.

**Noggles** will be given out to all event attendees, performers and staff. 

**Where**: Los Angeles, CA
**When**: Q1 2024
**Venue**: ~500 Capacity (such as The Troubadour)
**Cost of Attendance**: $10 (or free if you dress up as a Noun! and/or are a Noun holder!)
**Ticketing**: Digital Collectables on Layer 2 (BASE)

___


# The Ask

87,500 USD for the planning and execution of one (1) **Nouns Got Something to Say** event to be held in Los Angeles, CA in Q1 of 2024 and host approximately 500 attendees. Scope of work will include…
* Securing Talent, Event Staff and Music Venue
* Event Promotion and Marketing
* Utilize Digital Collectable Ticketing Platform
* Host Noun’s Costume Contest
* Post Event Promotion with Event Media Assets

*Funds transferred to Ed Balloon LLC upon execution.*


![](https://imgur.com/FNnhx4w.gif)
*Recap video from Avalanche Pack, a web3 powered concert series produced by Ed Balloon in 2023 sponsored by Avalanche (AVAX) Blockchain. The artist lineup featured JPEGMAFIA, Clipping., Jeleel, Ed Balloon and Witch Prophet.*

___

# The Goal

**Nouns Got Something to Say** is a unique music concert experience designed to be a proof of concept for an organic, interactive event series, merging music and the culture of Nouns. The event further aims to use culture as a means to bridge the gap between the Nouns community and those who may not yet be in the Web3 bubble. Culture is not a concept that can be confined; we aim to embody the Nouns' spirit of freedom and weirdness.
___

# Proliferating Nouns Brand

The primary objective of **Nouns Got Something to Say** extends beyond delivering a remarkable event; it is also about elevating the brand recognition and presence of Nouns. Here's how the event will contribute to achieving this goal:

* **Unique Brand Integration** - The event is intricately designed to showcase and celebrate the essence of Nouns. Attendees dressing up as Nouns is a testament to the distinct and unrestrictive nature of the Noun’s community. This creative expression will serve as a live, tangible representation of the brand.

* **Educational Opportunity** - The event aims to serve as an educational platform. By introducing the Nouns culture to a wider audience in an engaging and fun manner, we ensure that more people understand what it means to be a part of the Noun’s community. This exposure will leave a lasting impression on attendees.

* **Organic Engagement** - The costume contest will foster organic engagement by using social media platforms as a means for attendees to enter the contest. Attendees actively participating in the event will spark curiosity among their followers, leading to discussions about Nouns.

* **Long-lasting Impact** - The success of this event will create a long-lasting impression in the minds of attendees. They will associate the Noun’s brand with a memorable experience, reinforcing the brand's core values of freedom and individuality.
___

# Proof of Concept

As a pioneering event, **Nouns Got Something to Say** serves as a proof of concept for a new approach to building and promoting the brand. It demonstrates the brand's commitment to pushing boundaries and finding innovative ways to connect with a broader audience. With a successful event, we would like to continue to propose and produce future Nouns Got Something To Say events.
___
![](https://imgur.com/5TtIrDH.jpg)
# Use Of Funds

To bring our vision for **Nouns Got Something To Say** to life, we are requesting funding in the amount of $87,500. We will allocate the funding as follows:

**Talent Fees: $45K**
Performance and rider fees to 3 artists who will perform at the event.

**Venue Rental: $15K**
Rental of music venue in Los Angeles (such as The Troubadour) for the event.

**Security and Staff: $2.5K**
Security personnel and event staff.

**Costume Contest: $1.5K**
Prizes for fans wearing the best noun-inspired costumes. Expenses related to hosting the contest.

**Legal: $1K**
Contract review for securing talent and venue.

**Promotion and Marketing: $2.5K**
Advertising the event on social media, event listings, and targeted promotions. Design and production of promotional materials.

**Photography: $3K**
Hire a photographer to capture the event.

**Noggles: $2K**
Noggles for all event attendees, performers and staff.

**Digital Collectable Ticketing: $5K**
Sell tickets for the event as digital collectables on BASE.

**Event Production Fee: $10K**

*Any profits collected from ticket sales will be pledged towards future Nouns Got Something To Say events.*

___

# The Team

**Ed Balloon [Event Planner & Creative Director]**

= Partnered with blockchain company AVALANCHE (AVAX) in 2023 to produce a quarterly series of concert events in DTLA featuring performances by artists such as JPEGMAFIA, CLIPPING., and JELEEL.

= PERFORMED and PRODUCED EVENTS throughout the US including at notable WEB3 CONFERENCES (eg. Consensys, NFT-NYC, SXSW, Zoratopia & ETH Denver) and ART MUSEUMS (eg. Museum of Fine Arts Boston, Institute of Contemporary Art Boston & Knockdown Center NYC).

Twitter: [@Ed_Balloon](https://twitter.com/Ed_Balloon)

![](https://imgur.com/oGAEvfK.jpg)

Spearheading cultural representation and identity through his music and digital art, Ed Balloon has solidified himself not only as a Web3 artist and musician but also as a community leader. Known for his innovative approach to music making, dynamic production style, and unique blend of electronic, hip-hop, and R&B, his 2022 Run Ed collection was presented as a one-of-a-kind generative sound and motion endeavor that blended stop-motion, 2D and 3D animation, and music. To help uplift other artists, 50 percent of the collection’s secondary sales continued to go toward The Ed Balloon Generational Wealth Fund, which collects work from Black and other under-represented artists in Web3. The pioneering musician also recently self-funded through the sale of NFTs the stop motion animated satire "A SONG ABOUT BLACK LOVE.” Executive produced by Daveed Diggs and starring Ed alongside actor Seth Green, the film showcases the difficulties of finding love as a black puppet. Ed was also recently nominated to nftnow's NFT100, a celebration of the top 100 influential creators and community leaders in the NFT space.

___

# Conclusion

By strategically merging music, culture, and technology, **Nouns Got Something to Say** will help to make the Noun’s brand more accessible and renowned. We envision this event as a catalyst for the brand's growth and an opportunity to connect with a diverse and engaged audience.

content.title: Villa Nouns
content.description:
# Villa Nouns  

## Summary

![3D Render](https://i.postimg.cc/wvPnykQT/DEFINITIVO-4-K-2.jpg)

We’re transforming a villa by the sea in Italy into the first-ever Nouns vacation rental.

Imagine a living art gallery, where nounish NFTs, items, and projects are not just showcased but become the center of a unique experience. Villa Nouns aims to be the ultimate destination for Nouns fans and newcomers alike, a place that blurs the line between onchain and offchain.

More than a place to stay, our goal is to create a highly curated, customisable, Nouns-themed venue open to all. By encouraging innovation, art, education and fun experiences, Villa Nouns will reflect the Nouns values and ethos in the real world, while meeting the growing demand for immersive experiences inside and outside of the Nouns community. 

**How it works**

- **Book** your stay on Airbnb, or onchain from villanouns.wtf.
- **Access** the villa with your wallet, and share access with others onchain. No physical keys needed.
- **Explore** the spaces to discover and interact with the Nouns universe.
- **Buy** nounish furniture, items or NFTs directly at the villa, with your Ethereum wallet.

Revenue generated from bookings and sales of nounish items will be partly channeled back into the Nouns treasury, as well as shared with partnering communities and Nouns owners.

**Timeline**

We plan to complete all work in 12 to 24 weeks and start welcoming guests by 2024.

**Team**

- **Management**: Led by the villa owner, an experienced property developer.
- **Development**: Carried out by dlabs, known for working on projects like Nouns Agora, Optimism, Slice and Juicebox.
- **Design and art**: Made by skilled architects, designers and artists.
- **Community**: Nouns owners and communities will be able to partner up with us and become sponsors of the project, further customising the spaces at the villa.

**Funding request**

We request 121 ETH to give the villa a nounish makeover, cover operational expenses for 1 year, as well as ensure guests have a highly curated experience.

The villa in its present state is already a sought-after location in the area. Renovating it will only add to its popularity, so execution risks are minimal.

The primary goal of this project is to explore the potential of a nounish vacation destination, gauging both demand and impact, while keeping risks and costs low for the DAO.

The villa will stay Nouns-themed for at least 2 years, and possibly indefinitely. This fact together with the growth potential and the future plans outlined below further help justifying the expense.

**Future plans**

The proposal aims to fund the redesign of the villa and cover operational costs, but our commitment doesn’t stop there. In the coming months we’ll explore the following areas, either autonomously or with further support from the DAO:

- **Nounish home goods**: In collaboration with artists and designers, we’ll craft a line of items and furniture inspired by Nouns. They'll first appear at Villa Nouns and then will be available for everyone to buy, helping to proliferate the Nouns vibe far and wide.
- **Activities for everyone**: We’ll offer a range of activities to enhance the guest experience further. Think pools, sports areas, dining spots, and curated outdoor adventures for kids and adults.
- **Builders retreats**: During the low-season we plan to host artists, hackers, and creators to brainstorm and build on nounish ideas, free of charge. Leveraging Prop House for the selection process, Villa Nouns will be temporarily turned into a hub sparking innovative projects and fostering connections in the Nouns ecosystem.
- **More spaces, more stories**: We plan to open more properties locally and around the world, especially in places rich in art and culture. It’s not just about expanding — it's about building a global community that shares the Nouns spirit.
- **Franchise model as a public good**: Keeping in line with the CC0 spirit, we’ll be opening doors for property owners to become part of Villa Nouns, while ensuring quality through a rigorous review by our team.
- **Decentralized ownership**: If the concept proves successful and Nouns DAO wishes to double down on the initiative, it will be possible for the DAO to own or co-own the estate.

![3D Render](https://i.postimg.cc/wvz0Smvj/2-final.jpg)

---

## The nounish experience

![Villa_Nouns_Gate.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/m2Zxzzn0/Villa-Nouns-Gate.jpg)

References to many past and future Nouns projects will be integrated with the interiors of the villa and the surrounding natural environment. 

Guests will be able to read the Nouns comic, ride Gnars skateboards or surfboards, watch the Nouns movie, learn the history of Nouns, and more. Furthermore, holders of Nouns and derivatives will enjoy an even more personalised experience, customising screens and interiors of the villa based on their NFT holdings.

Certain areas of the house like the bedrooms will be themed on specific Nouns or derivative collections. The overall experience will also evolve over time due to feedback and new projects in the Nouns ecosystem.

Most items at the villa will be Nouns themed, like towels, cutlery and home accessories, and some will also be gifted to guests. Among the nounish objects, furniture and decorations, we also plan to build suggestive stone mosaics and murals made by artists in the Nouns community. 

![_final.gif](https://i.postimg.cc/TPDBMryW/final.gif)

**Booking and entering the villa**

![main.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/cHc90Td6/main.jpg)

Guests will be able to book the villa on Airbnb, or directly onchain through a custom booking website on [villanouns.wtf](http://villanouns.wtf).

The villa can be accessed by connecting the wallet on-site and verifying the purchase. Other wallets can also be appointed by the buyer to unlock the villa using delegate.cash.

![iphone mock.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/BntdNW4p/iphone-mock.jpg)

---

## The villa and location

![1.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/VLh7fJP9/1.jpg)

Villa Nouns is an elegant villa located in Sardinia offering stunning views over the La Maddalena Archipelago, one of Italy's most coveted tourist destinations.

The spacious interior is designed for relaxation and focus, while the outdoor patio and large private garden are perfect for enjoying al fresco dining, relaxing in the Jacuzzi, or immersing in nature.

![2.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/fy280LtN/2.jpg)

The villa includes a large living room with a sofa bed, four bedrooms (three with queen beds, two of which have en-suite bathrooms, and one with twin beds), and three bathrooms with hydromassage showers.

Features a 1250 sqm garden, a heated four-person Jacuzzi, high-speed Starlink internet connection, heating and air conditioning, and private parking for up to two cars.

![Villa_Nouns_Backyard.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/T2JM3qtV/Villa-Nouns-Backyard.jpg)

**The location**

![locations.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/htH3rfC4/locations.jpg)

The villa is located in the heart of Costa Smeralda between the picturesque port town Palau and the popular spot Roccia dell’Orso. Its prime location provides easy access to beautiful beaches and renowned attractions.

The spectacular Maddalena islands, are just a short boat ride away, while the prestigious Porto Cervo and Porto Rotondo are conveniently close, making it the perfect location to enjoy the most evocative places Sardinia has to offer.

See more on [villanouns.wtf/gallery](http://villanouns.wtf/gallery)

**Financial aspects**

The villa has been rented out for several years, with rates between $50 and $110 per person per night based on the season. This generated on average $60k of revenues a year, mainly during summer.

By renovating the villa we expect an increase in demand and in turn revenues and prices — especially during summer. During the low season, the villa may also be repurposed for events and host other activities related to Nouns, allowing experimentation in coordination with the DAO and the exploration of alternative revenue models.

---

## Roadmap

**October 2023 - December 2023**
- Villa Nouns refurbishment and redesign
- Development of website and on-chain booking experience

**From January 2024**
- Open bookings at [villanouns.wtf](http://villanouns.wtf) and start welcoming guests

---

## Funding request

![expenses.png](https://i.postimg.cc/mZCsxQGw/Screenshot-2023-10-20-at-20-09-58.png)

**Villa redesign and refurbishment - 71 ETH**

- [Renovation] Allocate 45 ETH to upgrade the villa's interior and exterior to incorporate Nouns-themed objects, decorations, furniture, NFT displays, and other technologies to make the guests experience unique.
- [Professional services] Architects, interior designers and artists involved in the redesign process
- [Onchain lock and interactive experience] Make a smart lock which allows access based on onchain bookings, as well as develop and fine-tune the interactive experience at the villa.

**Development - 28 ETH**

- [Website and contracts integration] Build the [villanouns.wtf](http://villanouns.wtf) platform, with an innovative onchain booking experience.

**Marketing and operational costs - 22 ETH**

- Create material to promote Villa Nouns as the ultimate nounish destination, such as drone and showcase videos, and professional photo shoots.
- All operational and management costs involved in bringing Villa Nouns to fruition.

**Total ask: 121 ETH**

---

PS. You can already submit your interest for staying on [villanouns.wtf](http://villanouns.wtf) **⌐◨-◨**

content.title: A very Nounish ⌐◧-◧ Kids Xmas Party for 5,000 kids in need
content.description:
# A very Nounish ⌐◧-◧ Kids Xmas Party for 5,000 kids in need

## 
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/H15-ixnya.png)

*Imagine 5,000 kids, each with their own unique challenges, coming together in a space filled with laughter, joy, and acceptance. Decked out in noggles, experiencing Nouns stories, interacting with vibrant Nouns sculptures and characters, and immersing themselves in a world where disability, disadvantage, or illness doesn't define them. Instead, they're celebrated for their individuality and spirit, all while being introduced to the imaginative universe of Nouns. This is the magic of the Variety Kids Xmas Party, and with your support, we can make it an unforgettable experience.*
### Introduction:
The Variety Kids Xmas Party is an annual event held in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia that brings joy and inclusion to over 5,000 Victorian children facing diverse challenges. We seek Nouns DAO's support of 28.99 ETH to enhance this iconic event, held across 39,000 square metres, with the Nouns bringing the FUN and ENTERTAINMENT, ensuring a memorable experience for all attendees including:
* 5,000 kids in need
* 3,000 parents and carers
* 600 corporate volunteers
* 100 VIP guests

This year's party will be held in mid-December 2023.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SybKqjyga.jpg)

### ⌐◧-◧ Background:
For over three decades, the Variety Kids Xmas Party has been a beacon of hope for kids in need. Held at the Melbourne Convention Exhibition Centre, this event has touched the lives of over 165,000 children since its inception in 1986. The massive event is completely FREE for 5,000 children and 3,000 carers to attend, ensuring that each child receives a gift and experiences an inclusive day of fun, activities, stage entertainment, carnival rides, all-abilities sport and an all-important visit from Santa. For many, this celebration is the only one they have during the Christmas season, and the gifts they receive at the party are often the only ones they receive. The Variety Kids Xmas Party is a safe space for children living with disabilities or experiencing disadvantage or illness, allowing them to be themselves without fear of judgment from their peers. This remarkable event is made possible by the dedication and hard work of the small Variety team and over 600 volunteers.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SkJSDa1xp.jpg)


### ⌐◧-◧ Profound Impact:
The Variety Kids Xmas Party is more than just a day of fun; it's a lifeline for families who often feel isolated or overlooked. For many children, the event offers a rare opportunity to experience joy, laughter, and a sense of belonging. Parents often remark on the transformative effect of the party, noting the boost in their children's confidence and self-esteem. The ripple effect extends beyond the children to their families, providing them with a much-needed respite and the chance to see their children thrive in a supportive environment. The memories created during the party serve as a source of strength and inspiration for families throughout the year.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BkJ5cjkxT.jpg)

### ⌐◧-◧ Testimonials:
"You have no idea what this means to us. Without Variety, we were having no Christmas." Kayla

“Being on your own and battling to afford the basics, you are so conscious of trying to make Christmas special. I will be forever thankful that Variety did that for me and my boys this Christmas.” Shelly, parent of Jaxon and Dylan.

To make the day even more special, each child receives a gift bag full of age-appropriate toys and games (including Nounish items) to take home and enjoy. For some children, this was the only gift they received that Christmas.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/ryvQ5jklT.jpg)


### ⌐◧-◧ Videos and imagery:

Watch the party in action – news coverage of last year's event 
[7 News Click here to play](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o8bpybGRlZY&themeRefresh=1)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/H17HSTyea.png)

[9 News Click here to play ](https://youtu.be/GXfgo3frPww)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJx9B6yxa.png)

Meet some of the families who attend and hear what it means to them 
[Click here to watch Seth & Teagan's Variety Story](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rhk80WxPSyk)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/B1gBLaJea.png)

**Click here to view our gallery** of [pictures of the day](https://photos.app.goo.gl/GATPZpPnU5TEy7nTA) 


### ⌐◧-◧ A Nounish Christmas Deliverables:

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1AOkl6x6.png)


To elevate the 2023 Variety Kids Xmas Party, we propose the Nouns brand activations in synchronicity with the Variety red branding where Nouns bring the FUN and ENTERTAINMENT! These activations include a standalone **Nouns Fun Zone** with Nounish activities, branding across the venue and the **Nouns Entertainment Zone** (which cover 80% of the venue space) with dedicated Nouns branding at a cost of 28.99 ETH. Deliverables include:

* **Nouns Fun Zone**: A centrepiece that showcases the Nouns brand and its ethos including large-scale foam Noggle sculpture and cutouts. 
    * Distribution of **LO-FI Noggles** to attendees: A fun and interactive way for kids to engage with the Nouns brand.
    * Nouns Colouring-in Station: A **creative space** for children to colour and engage with Nouns-themed artworks.
    * A roving Nouns character costume: **roving characters** are a hit with attendees and receives lots of photo requests! The character and Noun volunteers will hand out **Noggles** and **Nouns temporary tattoos**.
    * LEGO Nouns creation station – hosted by kid’s entertainers and **LEGO** experts **live-building giant Noggles** as well as a **kids creation station** for attendees create their favourite Nouns tokens to contribute to the Nouns sculpture.

* **Nouns Entertainment Zone**:
    * From on-stage entertainment (characters, dancers, magicians and more!) to carnival rides, all-abilities sports demonstrations, craft activities and the big man – SANTA – himself, Nouns will be bringing the entertainment to our 5,000 kids! Each area of the entertainment zone (venue-wide) will be branded with Nouns corflute signs (Nouns Entertainment Zone) with Nouns brand ownership of the main stage through stage signage, on-stage screens, signage on grandstand seating, on-stage Noggles sculpture, Noggles signage on all carnival rides and activities across 39,000 square feet.

* **Nouns Community Volunteers**:
    * An opportunity for members of the local Nouns community to take part and witness the Nounish party through volunteering for the event (all volunteers require a current Working with Children’s Check) as well as providing filming and documentation for distribution in the Nouns community

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SJpH0RkxT.png)

### ⌐◧-◧ Value to Nouns DAO:
By integrating the Nouns brand into the Variety Kids Xmas Party and its associated marketing campaign, we aim to increase brand awareness, foster a positive association with the Nouns community and create exposure for the DAO to our ongoing corporate partners who will be in attendance at an associated VIP event. This event will serve as a platform to showcase the Nouns brand's commitment to social causes and its ability to make a tangible difference in the lives of thousands, reaching a diverse and expansive audience through a large scale IRL experience amplified online and through media outreach.

* Fun and Entertainment Zone activations as detail in previous section
* Variety Kids Xmas Party – Powered by Nouns byline on all marketing, media and communication channels
* Photo and video documentation of the event including a Nouns specific video story highlighting the event-wide Nouns activations and funding est. views 5,000+
* Nouns logo on 600 volunteer t-shirts
* Content creation, distribution and amplification on social media channels on all Variety Vic platforms and supporting Nouns channels post-event including Variety boosted post with est. 100,000 reach to targeted audiences. Variety main socials:
    * Instagram 3.4k followers
    * X 2.15k followers
    * Facebook 18k followers
* Potential for mainstream media coverage (the party receives television and print media coverage) and submission to web 3 media outlets (Coin Telegraph, Chainsaw et al). Event releases plus specific story pitches centred on Nouns funding. Advertising space rate (ASR) for news stories is $37,500 for an audience on 377,000 per story and print $16,000 ASR for an audience of 566,000. Online article reach on Coin Telegraph exposure to 8M unique monthly visitors.
* Invitation to four contributing Nouns community members to
    * Volunteer to assist with Nouns activations
    * Attend our corporate VIP morning tea overlooking the party followed by a tour of the party plus speech opportunity to over 100 Variety sponsors and major donors about Nouns, the DAO’s work and how to get involved by buying Nouns (contribution to long-term growth and prosperity of the Nouns project) plus networking at the VIP event
    * Opportunity to hand out Nouns merchandise
* Exposure to celebrity sports people and entertainers on the day including crypto-knowledgeable AFL players (crypto.com is a major AFL sponsor) and the local web3 community who have supported Variety in other ways
* Exposure to 600 blue chip corporate volunteers from major banks, telcos and more on event set up day and event day. Inclusion of About Nouns blurb and video QR code in volunteer comms
* Comprehensive post-event promotion detailing the impact and reach of the Nouns brand during the event

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Hy_4qsyg6.jpg)

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Sydqnskla.jpg)

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/H1O5y2JeT.jpg)


### ⌐◧-◧ Budget & Funding:
Hosting an event as impactful as the Variety Kids Xmas Party, with over 8,000 people in attendance, requires a significant financial investment each year even with a number of suppliers providing their services at a greatly reduced cost or comped. On average, previous Xmas Parties have cost USD $160,000 and have been funded from Variety's non-profit funds.

Variety is committed to continue to fund this event with the knowledge that it is crucial for thousands of families whose children are living with disabilities, illnesses, or experiencing disadvantages. It serves as a day of joy and inclusion, often providing the only Christmas celebration and gifts these children receive. For over three decades, this event has been sustained by year-round contributions from our dedicated individual of donors and fundraisers.

The current cost-of-living crisis has intensified the needs of our most vulnerable families, increasing the demand for our support. Simultaneously, community donations have become less frequent, as they are no longer as possible for some individuals as they once were.

If the Nouns prop passes to fund the 2023 event, the money previously allocated for it will be redirected to our individual grant program, which provides essential items like wheelchairs, communication devices, scholarships, education programs and assistance dogs for kids experiencing disadvantage or living with conditions including Cerebral Palsy, Down Syndrome, Autism, global development delay, muscular dystrophy, brain
injury, spinal injury, rare and chronic disease and more.

Variety – the Children’s Charity requests a total of ~USDC 47,479 (28.99 ETH) to fund the Nouns brand fun and entertainment zones. Variety will be contributing ~USDC 113,000 to cover the balance of event costs.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/ryuBcikxp.jpg)


**BUDGET**

* Entertainment – all on-stage performers, Santa, dancers, character performers such as the Grinch and Real Dinosaurs, carnival rides including a ferris wheel, sideshow alley, Santa’s grotto, all-abilities sports activations, silent movie cinema, and main stage visual, LED screens, audio, staging, stage lighting & rigging  **$32,511 USD/19.85 ETH**
* Photography/filming and package creation **$3,219 USD/1.97 ETH**
* Nouns Noggles - donated **$0 USD/0 ETH**
* LEGO - donated **$0 USD/0 ETH**
* Colouring sheets - printing **$645 USD/0.39 ETH**
* Free standing foam Noggles sculpture **$645 USD/0.39 ETH**
* Nouns signage x 25 **$804 USD/0.49 ETH**
* Nouns character costume **$4,506 USD/2.75 ETH**
* 600 Nouns branded tees worn by corporate volunteers across the venue **$3,862 USD/2.36 ETH**
* 2,000 temporary Noggles tattoos **$1,287 USD/0.79 ETH**

 **TOTAL  **$47,479** USD  /  **28.99** ETH**

*** USD to ETH conversion correct at time of writing 19 September 2023 3.00pm AEST

In addition, Variety will be paying USD $128k (funded across the year by our donors) as follows
* Catering extras (90% catering sponsor)	$7,443
* Event management and non-main stage venue AV, staging & rigging	$31,900
* Venue hire cost	$15,400
* Gift bag of toys for every child	$64,169
* Transport, freight, couriers and postage 	$2,951
* Staffing, logistics, and marketing	$6,416
	
    

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/B1L_0i1x6.jpg)


### ⌐◧-◧ The Team
**Georgie Smith - Variety Project Lead**
[Georgie](https://https://twitter.com/RoxbySmith) has a twenty-five-year career in not-for-profit fundraising, marketing and event management and currently leads Variety – the Children’s Charity digital innovation program including crypto philanthropy. The Variety Kids Xmas Party logistics are supported by our internal events, kids support and marketing team alongside Events Logistics Australia.

**Blueberry DAO**
[Blueberry DAO](https://twitter.com/blueberry_dao) supports children’s charities including Variety – the Children’s Charity, both a member of the DAO and a [recipient](https://nouns.build/dao/ethereum/0xa54D5b96C3223fBcb8EBf312D9C4908e45CE8c50/vote/0x68e0a403cf98b83cce2f040231a28906eac59ff8104bf9c3e2cf8a3b41dfa8a1) of a bikes for kids grant for a child in need. Blueberry DAO started with the help of a community grant from Nouncil.

**NounsAU and Klim (Big Shot Toys) – Prop consultants and contributors**
Prop consultation by [NounsAU](https://twitter.com/nounsAU) community and [Big Shot Toys](https://twitter.com/bigshottoyworks).

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rk4P9oJxp.jpg)

### About Variety - the Children's Charity:
[Variety – the Children’s Charity](https://www.variety.org.au/vic/) stands as a global beacon of hope, with a network spanning 40 offices in 14 countries. Through the unwavering dedication and generosity of its community of supporters, millions of individual children worldwide have experienced improved lives.

Variety - the Children's Charity Victoria is dedicated to assisting children who face challenges due to disability, disadvantage, or illness. The charity offers invaluable support to families and organisations by granting equipment, ranging from wheelchairs to all-abilities playgrounds, ensuring practical assistance reaches those in dire need. Beyond tangible aid, Variety runs transformative programs designed to educate and empower children who might otherwise be overlooked. Scholarships are also awarded to nurture the talents of children living with disadvantages or disabilities. And, Variety hosts events that infuse joy, light, and laughter into the lives of these children and their families – with our keystone event being the Variety Kids Xmas Party.

Pioneering the intersection of charity and technology, Variety Victoria has been at the forefront of web 3 and crypto philanthropy in Australia. In addition to accepting crypto donations for over 2 years, their innovative approach includes, joining and submitting a successful proposal with Blueberry DAO, being recognised as the charity of choice for notable entities like NFT Melbourne and Oshi Gallery and being an active beneficiary of various NFT auctions.

**Addressing comments in candidature**

Thank you all so much for your amazing support and feedback!

In regards to paid social advertising, external channels have been removed. Variety may contribute a small sum (est $50) to extend reach targeted to audiences.

In regards to sustained funding, this is a one-off Nouns activation that could be repeated in future years and in future regions should the community wish to support it.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1U3hjkgT.jpg)


![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJrMGWnyp.png)

content.title: Nounswatch: Nouns Iconic Timepieces
content.description:
# Nounswatch: Nouns Iconic Timepieces

![](https://i.imgur.com/qj6bN2J.png)

# The Noggles meant to be worn all day and night
NounsWatch is a tangible representation of what the Nouns community is capable of, and adds to the other successfully funded initiatives extending the brand to a whole new universe of Fashion AND Watch enthusiasts. It seamlessly combines nounishness and horology, **on the verge of becoming the most personal product Nouns has ever created**.

`⌐◨-◨ for the wrists`

---

## Positioning
The watch industry is a lucrative market, with the segment accounting for over US$70 billion in revenue in 2022. We aim to position NounsWatch within the most attractive range of world-class watch brands: the affordable design (<200 USD).

![](https://i.imgur.com/DprKVhF.png)


---
## The NounsWatch design
Designed by renowned watch designer Rafael Miranda, the bold Noggle-inspired design features a superb polycarbonate case, a Japanese movement, and a exquisite half display with a glass mirror and a black dial.
![](https://i.imgur.com/PleFEx9.png)
The strap is made of easy interchangeable silicone rubber in either one color or the available Nouns Accessory themes (TBD).

![](https://i.imgur.com/9ptDzga.png)
The hour and minute handles features individual pieces that combines every hour to form the Noggles symbol.

![](https://i.imgur.com/mEBtHNJ.gif)

Not only have we considered its aesthetic appeal, focusing on style and taste, but we've also paid meticulous attention to its function. It's as much about refinement as it is about precision.

---
## Specs

**Case:** Polycarbonate, 42 mm x 42 mm x 6 mm. Fits from wrists of 15cm and up
**Movement:** Japanese
**Dial**: Exquisite half display reading system, black dial with contrasting numbers
**Glass:** Mineral glass with anti-reflective coating 
**Strap:** Easy interchangeable silicone rubber in various colors and patterns

---
## First Prototypes
In order to show our commitment to the project, we have developed two 3d printed prototypes as you can see below. Imagine how amazing they will look with the final production finish and the colored straps!

Video: [here](https://x.com/rsmiranda/status/1714557390241059120?s=20) and [here](https://x.com/fabioseva/status/1714901327631843711?s=46&t=OnA_W289RIsplarDuhpSrg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/Fm1vcc4.png)

---

## Timeline
![](https://i.imgur.com/ugqJkvg.png)


**Phase 1: Prototype (done √)**

**Phase 2 (option1): NFT Airdrop (~2 weeks)**
As soon as the prop get funded, we are going to take a snapshot and airdrop 888 Nounswatch NFTs to Nouns holders (incl. Treasury Nouns). Each Nounswatch NFT is eligible to redeem 1 (one) physical Nounswatch on [https://nounswatch.com](https://nounswatch.com/) (beta), thus no need to connect and verify Nouns tokens.

**Phase 2: Color and straps variants definition (~2 weeks)**
- watch crown side
- 8 solid color variants (body + strap)
- 8 strap patterns that will be produced.

**Phase 3: Claim window (~4 weeks)**
Our Shopify storefront is gonna showcase the product, including all watch colors and strap variants available and handle the redeem information. By connecting wallet with web3 connect, token holders are eligible a FREE watch + two straps of choice + shipping. The claiming window is needed to guarantee quantities for each body/strap colors. After the window, we no longer guarantee the colors, and the redemption will be first come first serve.

**Phase 4: Production (~8 weeks)**
We are going to share images and content of the entire production process (moulding, injection, painting etc).

**Phase 5: Assembling, Packaging & Shipping  (~2 weeks)**
After receiving the final product from the factory we initiate the assembling, packaging, handling and shipping of Nounswatch to users.

**Phase 6: warranty and after sales service for 2 years**
Dwiss will provide a world-class ongoing support and warranty for customers after 2 years they have claimed/purchased Nounswatch. This also includes long-term storage (>2y) of unclaimed watches.

**Promotional Video / Ad**
Once the first pieces are delivered we are going to create showcase video of Nounswatch and the Nouns Brand for marketing purposes.



---
## Team
**Fabio Seva** ([https://x.com/fabioseva](https://x.com/fabioseva?s=21&t=OnA_W289RIsplarDuhpSrg)) **- Concept & Marketing**
LilNoun#125, nouns-pilled founder of [Public Good Beer](https://twitter.com/publicgoodbeer?s=21&t=OnA_W289RIsplarDuhpSrg)

**Rafael Miranda** ([https://x.com/rsmiranda](https://x.com/rsmiranda?s=21&t=TBiiMRlpGleVhBPiCCngDQ)) **- Design**
An experienced watch designer with hundreds of watch collections designed for brands and personalities (incl. Versace, Valentino, Timex, Sir. Richard Branson) and winner of world-known design awards, like the Red Dot Design Award, IF Design Award, Good Design Award, among others.
![](https://i.imgur.com/p8gK5Fi.png)

**Dwiss - Production and operations**
The production is all handled by DWISS (https://www.dwiss.com), a swiss-based company founded by Rafael in 2011, which pioneered the web3 space in the watch industry, with 2 phygital watch collections, tokenomics, metaverse wearables, metaverse showrooms and 4x funded Indiegogo campaigns.
![](https://i.imgur.com/CqQU5u0.png)

---

## Production and **Funds Allocation:**

We have meticulously planned the budget to ensure optimal allocation of funds across all critical aspects of the project. This includes development, manufacturing, packaging, shipping, labor, and marketing. Our financial strategy has been designed with a keen focus on achieving the right balance between the minimum order quantity (MOQ) and an competitive final price for the product. This careful financial planning is integral to the successful realization and sustainability of the project.

We have estimated the financial requirements for the Nounstime watch project as follows:

5,000 USD Development
90,000 USD Production
25,000 USD External Labour and Taxes
30,000 USD Packaging and Shipping

**TOTAL ASK: $150,000 USDC**

**Acknowledgments:** We would like to thank all the great appreciation we had so far in the private conversations. We really want to make this happen!

contentSignatures.reason: Exciting prop and beautiful piece of wearable Nounish art. A way to identify and represent yourself as Nounish IRL. Enjoyed working with Seva on Public Goods Beer and the Farcaster ETH Lisbon meetup. He delivers.

content.title: Real World Nouns Asset Purchase
content.description:
# Real World Nouns Asset Purchase


**PLEASE NOTE, THIS PROPOSAL WAS UPDATED FOLLOWING A COMMENT AROUND ADDING MORE LEGAL CLARITY TO THE PROCESS + EXPLAIN HOW NON-KYCd MEMBERS CAN SELL THEIR OWNERSHIP RIGHTS**

NounsDAO is among one of the most prominent communities and ecosystems in web3. For the last couple years, Nouns has led the charge on a new way for projects and ideas to get funded. Over this time, the vast majority of funding was issued with few strings attached or promise of financial returns - instead, focusing on funding things the community wants to see happen in the world. 

This proposal is an experiment to break ground on a new kind of proposal: one that has the potential to provide perks to Nouns holders, and that has the potential to generate financial returns on deployed capital to ultimately increase demand for Nouns NFTs. 

**Some background on Venture Club**

Venture Club is a web2.5 project that has been building legal infrastructure to democratize capital formation over the last 1.5 years. Our core focus is on taking offchain assets (such as equity, SAFEs, SAFTs, Income sharing agreements, real estate, etc), and moving them compliantly onchain as NFTs, in different UIs. The NFTs created are DeFi compatible between KYCd addresses and allow-listed smart contracts. 

You can see some of the assets we’ve minted onchain [here](https://opensea.io/collection/venture-club).

Our proposal is a proof of concept, to demonstrate the ability of Nouns DAOs to participate in the purchase of traditional real world assets. We believe this option will open up new use cases for NounsDAOs, which have not yet been possible before.

**Why should you care?**

Having a clear and tested process to acquire “real world” assets has the potential to benefit current and future Nouns members. The main reasons why this should be of interest are:

1. Provide perks to members. For example, a piece of real estate could be purchased, and access could be given to Nouns members. Or rental income could be shared with Nouns members. Having access to these sort of assets most definitely helps propagate the Nouns meme, while simultaneously providing a very tangible benefit. 
2. Provide Nouns holders a means to benefit financially from teams and startups they support via the DAO.

**A Proof of Concept**

This proposal is a proof of concept (POC), to demonstrate that 1. NounsDAO can deploy capital to purchase an offchain asset; and that 2. ownership of this offchain asset can be claimed compliantly by its NounsDAO members. *This POC aims to demonstrate this concept via the purchase of an ownership stake in Venture Club, who has built the technology to make these offchain purchases possible.*

Our hope is that this model can be used in the future by NounsDAO to invest and acquire a variety of new asset classes which has not been possible until now (to our knowledge, a few projects have tried, but none have been able to provide a clear / compliant path forward). 

By proving this model out, it may even be possible that we see an increased demand for Nouns NFTs from speculators looking for exposure to assets and opportunities only available to this community. 

The end result is a NounsDAO with **an increased number of options** in front of it. Options to engage, options to reward, options to monetize and attract - in order to create a more desirable community to be a part of. 

**Our proposal**

- We are asking the NounsDAO community to make a strategic 50 ETH investment in Venture Club (via a SAFE investment agreement).
- Ownership in the investment will be split between all Nouns members who claim their personal ownership in the SAFE via the Venture Club app.
- Payment for proportional ownership in the SAFE will be made in a fresh ERC20 token that will be airdropped to all Nouns holders. This is a utility token, used as payment only.
- As a US based company focused on tokenization of securities, Venture Club takes compliance seriously. Only KYCd individuals will be able to claim ownership in the SAFE. In addition, unaccredited US investors will not be able to participate. 
- For individuals who don’t meet these criteria, they will be able to sell their ERC20 payment token for their portion of the SAFE using P2P tools like airswap. Venture Club will help facilitate this process via our Discord.
- As part of the Venture Club tokenization process, it is possible to set carry fee (currently 1%), as well as royalty fees (currently 5%) on secondary sales of NFTs. In order to incentivize the sponsoring of this proposal, fees arising from this proposal will be shared equally between Venture Club and those who sponsor this proposal.

**Milestones and next steps / sequence of events**

- Once this proposal is approved, a deal page will be published on Venture Club
- A Discord channel will be created in the Venture Club Discord to provide any support
- Nouns holders will be able to access the opportunity on our app, and mint their respective share of the SAFE contract via an NFT
- Once this proof of concept is complete, we would like to work with other teams looking to provide tangible benefits to Nouns holders.
- We will timebox the duration to 2 months after the proposal passing to claim ownership rights.

**Some additional information**

- Some of our investors: [Gabby](https://twitter.com/gabusch) (Founder of YGG), [Timour](https://twitter.com/timourxyz) (Seed Club), [MetaCartel Ventures](https://metacartel.xyz/) (first venture dao in web3), Evgeny (founder of [Re7](https://www.re7.capital/)), Ben Middleton (founding partner at [Ascensive Assets](https://ascensiveassets.com/)), [Cultur3 Capital](https://cultur3.capital/) (web3 focused fund), among others
- Our [slide deck](https://cloudfiles.to/yw9rM7pi48O) (pw:Seed23)
- Our app: [app.ventureclub.club](http://app.ventureclub.club) (note, we’ve created a group for Nouns which you can join on the Network tab. Once you join this group, you’ll be able to see a live deal)
- Read more about our team [here](https://www.notion.so/d99b16167b8e475b89d4763e1edee999?pvs=21).
- [Twitter account](https://twitter.com/ventureclubclub)
- [Legal process](https://www.notion.so/venture-club/Venture-Club-Legal-Process-e685692049e94451bfbd94465cf4b5f5)
