- Event Planner - $20K
- Team Travel & Accommodation - allow $25K

contentSignatures.reason: in general i think we tend to overestimate the importance of view count, and underestimate the importance of helping individuals from the artist & maker community fall in love with the brand. it’s also a critical time in hollywood where people are wrestling with the impact of technology. this proposal is an opportunity to present a more optimistic view of what tech can do for the industry and comes at an important inflection point for both hollywood and the DAO. stoopid buddy are talented builders who genuinely love the project and have overdelivered in each of their previous engagements with the dao (i have a bit of info asymmetry here since i’ve seen the doc rough cut). i’d personally like to see this group receive the requested funds as soon as possible so that they can get to work helping their industry fall in love with nouns.
I still believe this is to be a magical proposal where the outcomes will push the nouns community much further.

content.title: Noun en Scène (aka Mise en Scène with Noun 'Muppets') - TAKE 2!!
content.description:
# Noun en Scène (aka Mise en Scène with Noun 'Muppets') - TAKE 2!!

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SyewEPEla.gif)

### This is a resubmission of [Prop 371](https://nouns.wtf/vote/371). 

And if you're asking yourself, **'What's changed, Chris?'** Let me provide you with a quick and handy summary up top: 

#### **The Noun Ask**
Some nuance was missing in the previous prop. I love the idea of 'earning' a Noun, and since (at the present moment) there is no defined way to do that, I decided to build it into the prop itself as a way to indicate that interest. 

**This 'earning' is not, however, a transaction in the current prop** but will instead be in a future prop that allows Nouners to vote on whether a Noun is **deserved or not** once everyone has seen the epically awesome results!

#### **The Story** 
Some of you also wanted to hear a little bit more about the story these images would be capturing and I'm more than happy to oblige because for me, it's the characters, story and nounish themes that are the most exciting things about getting to execute 'Noun en Scène'. 

I see the Nouns as little, innocent agents of change, who are chock-full of optimism and doing their best - pulled and directed by their noggles - to go around and help people, even if they have no freakin' idea how! They might screw up, they might not know what they're doing, but that's never going to stop them from trying their gosh darn hardest to do some good! 

And to explore these ideas, I did a fun jam session working on a series document and a pilot 'scriptment' (*neither are finished or definitive, but a step in the creative discovery process that gives me a jumping off point as we continue to develop character, story and themes*) for the nounish show, 'G◨-◨D INTENTIONS', that doesn't exist, but whose episodes 'Noun en Scène' will capture cinematic stills from, making it seem like this nounish 'Muppet' show IS a real thing: *[WORKING SERIES DOCUMENT](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sNWmF0Lhlqe7bRMHra9EKHyoLSPr3B1CDIwSJJw8sTs/edit?usp=sharing)*

#### **Distribution Clarification** 
The main goal of this project is to get these images out into the world so that people can see them and get curious about Nouns. And I think putting these kind of high-quality, cinematic images in places where NFTs are not often seen (specifically billboards but  also super large format at a gallery show) will allow them to function as both **quirky advertisments for Nouns and high quality art pieces that connect with people outside of this space**. 

There is not, however, an ask for funds for the billboards or gallery rentals in this prop because I intend to do a **Droposal** afterwards where all of the NFT sales revenue goes towards this exact distribution effort (Yitong, let's talk!). **Digital funding physical!**

As mentioned in the prop, we will also be documenting the process of the creation of these images, so I foresee quite a lot of BTS content that is going to be going up through Zora and socials (maybe we could even do a **Nounish vid about it??**).

#### And finally, **Project Clarification** 
I could've used this prop to ask for development funds for a script and storyboards and gone a more traditional route, but **I think that the deliverables coming out of this being able to live as a **finished photography series/art project** unto itself is far more exciting!** 

This doesn't mean that I want the project to end or plan to end it after this prop's deliverables - *I mean, c'mon, we're going to have two incredible Noun 'Muppets' to create with!* - simply that **utilizing funds to execute high-quality, finished images that we can use to make people Noun-curious in IRL spaces right away** is far better than having *only* developed material with the *intention* to do more. 

We want to deliver something final AND ALSO intend to do more :) 


### **And with that...** 
**Please find the sturdy bones of the previous prop with these updates incorporated below** 👇

---
# **TL;DR**

**Cinematic stills from a television series that doesn't exist (yet!) starring Chip - a cookie Noun - and Benny - a rabbit Noun- in the surreal, funny and over-the-top adventures they find themselves on while trying to do good in the world.**


![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJ1-5UUsh.png)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/r17M9IIs2.png)


# **TELL YOU MORE ABOUT THE PROJECT? WHY OF COURSE!**

A single frame can tell an entire story. It can draw you in. Make you think. Send you tumbling towards what happens next… 


![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SyoqtGsuh.jpg)
(*let’s put some Noggles on Roger*)

It’s what the best films do. I mean look at that Roger Rabbit still. What are Roger and Eddie looking at? What’s about to happen? And why are they handcuffed together?! Not to mention location, costumes, use of lighting or even the colors! There’s a palpable tension and curiosity in that single frame that makes us **care**. 

I want to bring that to a fun art project focused on a pair of Nouns - Chip and Benny - and their adventures in the - slightly (or sometimes *very*) heightened and over-the-top - world of ‘**Noun en Scène**’.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJmaYfou3.png)

Think of it as a cinematic one-shot storytelling project that takes our pixelated, digital little Nouns, turns them into real life ‘muppet’-like puppets and then throws them into film scenes with flesh and blood people.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rkwdXQiu3.jpg)
(*cinematic scenes that make you ask questions and keep looking*)

Every one-shot tosses our sweet, little Nouns into a new dramatic scene where they're forced to deal with the crazy situation they've gotten themselves into by trying to help or do a good deed for a random human they've met. 

And through these scenic moments, the world of Chip, Benny and the 'Noun en Scène' project will grow, evolve and hopefully become something people want to see more of!


![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJMTUmid2.jpg)

By utilizing ‘Muppet’-like characters mixed with real people and heightened, cinematically-lit scenes, the absurdity and beauty of life will become that much more stark, profound and hopefully very funny. 

Taking cues and paying homage to a variety of influences including Alex Prager, The Far Side, world cinema, the Kermitage Collection and many more, this project aims to utilize a couple Nouns to create captivating characters we just can’t get enough of. 

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1_riGoO3.jpg)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/B1dHszjOn.jpg)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HkX_jzi_h.jpg)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1CuBtIjh.jpg)


Chip and Benny are just a couple innocent, little guys trying to help and do good in the world, but instead they keep finding themselves entangled in situations way beyond their depth. 

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJCRRGj_3.jpg)

# **COOL. SO WHAT’S THE PLAN?**

These shoots will be treated like an indie film production - the difference being that we are capturing **single shots** that tell full, rich stories while still requiring casting, makeup, lighting, location scouting/rentals, puppet styling etc. 

On the casting front, while at first it will make sense to work with local working actors/models and friends, as the project gains traction and grows - or when I’m working on my next tv show - I think there is a fun way to bring known name actors into these scenes and add a whole other level of playfulness to the project. 

The first step will be designing, modeling and manufacturing our Noun ‘muppets.’ **Luckily, I’ve gotten a very exciting collaborator on board for this!**

# **PUPPET HEAP!**
[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SJrVNiKx6.png)](https://youtu.be/agxY_pJwo8o?feature=shared)


**Puppet Heap** is a unique design and production studio specializing in storytelling through the creation of iconic characters for all sorts of media including film, television, advertising, theater, and new media. The company was founded by artist, designer, filmmaker, and teacher Paul Andrejco after observing the burgeoning pile of puppets that had accumulated in his Hoboken apartment back in the early ‘90s. Now, just a few blocks away, Puppet Heap is home to teams of artists, designers, writers, and producers creating character based narratives for clients around the world including **The Walt Disney Company, Sesame Workshop, and Nickelodeon**. Puppet Heap has been entrusted with the care, maintenance, and creative support of the Muppets for Disney’s **The Muppets Studio** since 2006.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HyX40MsOh.jpg)
(*Puppet Heap team on set of Imagine Dragon's 'Radioactive'*)

Puppet Heap loves the project - *I nounspilled them* - and will be joining to design and create the physical puppets of Chip and Benny. And as scale and scope continue to evolve in their journey (we have big plans), they’ll be there, helping to tell their growing story - and all the other Nouns that come into play too.
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJXG1rDp2.jpg)

# **AWESOME! AND WHAT ABOUT ME?**

My name is Chris Martin - not of Coldplay, sorry - and I’ve been making independent, global film and television productions for a decade plus now - primarily in Korea.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HklvCzid2.jpg)

Most recently, I co-created, co-wrote, directed, showran,and EP’ed 20 episodes of a show called 'Dramaworld' currently streaming on Amazon that stars well-known actors including Liv Hewson (‘Yellowjackets’, ‘Santa Clarita Diet’), Brett Gray (‘I’m a Virgo’, ‘On My Block’), Daniel Dae Kim (‘Lost’, ‘Hawaii 5-0’), Ha Jiwon (‘Secret Garden’) and K-pop star Henry Lau.

[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/ryG2-7jun.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/Dramaworld-2/dp/B09QWZ45Y1)

With everything I create, I try to lean into **a playful, magical realist tone that’s grounded in heart**, which is the kind of storytelling that I think is not only a perfect fit for Nouns, but also an incredible way to bring people into this journey of Chip and Benny as they go around trying to help.



I love everything about Nouns - the ethos, the support for creative, weird projects, and did I mention the freakin’ Noggles?! - and have been trying to figure out how I could do something creative that furthered that mission for quite awhile now. 

Then suddenly, while wandering around a street festival the other day, I saw this:

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HkmKCfj_3.jpg)

**And bingo! 💡**

The idea for ‘Noun en Scène’ landed fully formed in my brain! And I knew I had to make it a reality and see what it could eventually become!

# **WHY SHOULD NOUNS FUND THIS?**

Storytelling is everything - always has been. And in a world where we are inundated with ‘content’ online, a playful, quirky and precise project like this will be a breath of fresh air to stand out against the noise.

Utilizing photography as a medium and consistent characters as the subject will allow fans to come back, excited to see where the journey of Chip and Benny will lead and who they'll be trying to 'help' next. 

And by staging everything down to the last detail, each photographic story that comes out of ‘Noun en Scène’ will simultaneously be a fine art piece, a Sunday (web)comic and continuous character development leading to a broader (and very Noun-curious) audience. 

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/r12QW7iuh.jpg)

And in the spirit of '**mint everything**,' we are planning to utilize Zora to **mint and document our progress** - design sketches, scripts, behind the scenes, etc. It feels like a great way to document the process of creation and build something creative in public. 

# **Speaking of creative, meet Benny!**
Here's Paul's initial design for Benny:

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/H1YB-Han3.jpg)

Arms and legs, oh my! With our puppets, we want to keep what makes Nouns distinct while adding a whole new flavor that brings them to life and gives them character. 

### **The (mis)adventures of Chip and Benny** 
By creating empathy and connection with our two little Nouns through **visual storytelling**, the project will help spread Nouns and nounish-ness far and wide - just how Chip and Benny would want it. 

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SJIwS910n.jpg)
(*One-shot example sketch - 'Chip and Benny Check for- AHHHHH!'*)

And we plan to have this first leg of the project culminate in a **fun droposal** that takes Chip and Benny IRL in eye-catching ways (*see below for a tease*). 

# **THE ASK AKA THE BUDGET**

We want to propose a tight, but realistic budget that still allows us to execute this at the highest professional standards, so that we can first not only prove the concept, but create something that rivals the quality of anything you'd see in a high budget studio release. 

We want to go above and beyond everyone’s expectations for what 'Noun en Scène' can be because seeing is believing and we think this initial batch of scenes will prove the potential of building out characters in a uniquely nounish way and make people want to see where we can go with Chip and Benny in the future. 

**BUDGET:**
* **$40,000 USDC (2 puppets x $20,000 USDC/puppet)** **one-time cost** for the design and fabrication of our ‘Noun Muppets’ - this allows Puppet Heap to design, costume and build out Chip and Benny in their physical ‘muppet’-ish forms (**to be used again and again as the project continues and evolves**).
* **$50,000 USDC** production budget to shoot and finish (at least) 5 'one-shots' - this will be a fully crewed up shoot with actors, set design, hair & makeup etc. and the budget will be used to pay crew, rent equipment, secure locations, finish photos in post etc. (all the production related expenses)
* **Detailed breakdown** to give a general idea of how the funds will be used **[HERE](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1yym2vm-ojk9sXjrwziRHCDY6VYrSZPva3XBaryZLFUY/edit?usp=sharing)**
* **Potentially 1 Noun** - If the results are of a quality that Nouners think warrants it, I ask that **another prop be put up to vote on whether a Noun (Noun 483, cookie head Noun from the treasury) has been 'earned' and can be sent as a reward**. A big part of why I'm doing this is be able to participate more fully and help provide a voice to shape the Nouns ecosystem going forward and I believe becoming a Noun holder is the next step to that!

**TOTAL BUDGET: $90,000 USDC + Potentially 1 NOUN (tbd by future proposal)**

**PAYMENT ADDRESS:**
noun-en-scene.eth
0x6Ccb83c907dBf0B4bc28f9BF83173b0ab943350B

# **TIMELINE**

Upon prop passing, we can make our puppets and be in production in approximately **2.5 months** and aiming to have finished images ready **~1 month later**.

All the while **minting our progress and creative developments** on Zora.

# **FUTURE STEPS**

My aim is to use the project to develop the characters and story of these two best friends on their journey to help and do good - even if it always seems to go a little sideways - in a surprising novel and onchain way. 'Noun en Scène' as the first piece will allow us to capture cinematic moments that bring Nouns into the real(ish) world and, hopefully, helps people fall in love with Chip, Benny and their continued adventures.

Which brings me back to the aforementioned droposal! 

What better way to take this project out into the world than through a **Droposal whose sales revenue will 100% go to getting these images up onto billboards and putting together a gallery show of a select number of physicals.** 

More on both those soon! 

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJFGYFIi3.jpg)
(⌐◨-◨'s *on billboards?*)


Paul and I have a ton of fun ideas for where to take this and how to grow it, so we're looking forward to what we can achieve this go round while keeping our minds open to how it can be expanded!

Thank you for taking the time to read and look forward to making the world a little more nounish!

**Time for Chip, Benny and their friends to save the world. One good deed at a time!**

*Keep Nouns weird.*

-Chris

contentSignatures.reason: Can't wait for Chip and Benny to come to life.

Chris had his proposal defeated and came back with updates which includes a fun story world more defined. 

I will be supportive!

content.title: Add a Dynamic Reserve Price for the Auctions
content.description:
# Add a Dynamic Reserve Price for the Auctions

Hello, we are the founding and operating members of the Japanese-speaking sub-DAO, [pNouns](https://pnouns.wtf/), (owning Noun #553/#556), and the members of [Crypto Learning Club (CLC)](https://cryptolearningclub.org/), (owning Noun #605/#606).

## TL;DL
- Observing the stagnant winning bids for #853 / #854 / #855 auctions (just under 20ETH), it is evident that the current NFT auction system is likely to attract even more arbitrageurs.
- The increase in arbitrageurs will lead to a stagnation in NounsDAO by strategically opposing any proposals made during the first fork.
- In order to continue the auctions while preventing the entry of arbitrageurs, we propose a contract to set the dynamic reserve price for NFT auctions at a value equal to or greater than the current pro-rata share of a single Noun = "the treasury at the start of the auction divided by the number of remaining NFTs."


**Note**

We propose this as a candidate proposal to start a discussion within the community. Any feedback is welcome. We will update the proposal documents [here](https://github.com/openreachtech/nounsdao-proposals). As for the future process, if there is enough support for adding a dynamic reserve price, we would like to update the candidate proposal and submit the implementation part as well.

## Structural Issues Facing NounsDAO

### What's Happening?
As of August 2023, the treasury wallet, managed on the smart contract, holds nearly 30,000 ETH as the operational fund for the DAO. These funds have been allocated to the roughly 10 proposals posted every week for various grants (ranging from tens to hundreds of ETH) to support branding activities for Nouns' automatically generated on-chain meme characters and to expand NounsDAO's "Nounish philosophy" worldwide. 

However, after the FTX incident in November 2022 and the subsequent decline in the NFT and blockchain market, the average price of a Noun, which was previously being auctioned for an average of 50-100 ETH per day, plummeted to 30-35 ETH.

As a result, by dividing the approximately 30,000 ETH pooled in the treasury wallet by the number of NFTs issued, and utilizing the commonly employed 'rage quit' function found in other DAOs, it became possible to liquidate Nouns when market conditions deteriorated. Recognizing this opportunity, arbitrageurs began to form a faction anticipating liquidation within NounsDAO to seek profit from the situation.

For this faction, the ETH accumulated in the treasury wallet translates to casting "Against" votes for any proposal that could potentially reduce the ETH they receive when liquidating their Nouns. As a result, NounsDAO's activities stagnated for nearly six months from early 2023 onwards.


In response to this, a solution arose from within the DAO, combining an on-chain forking mechanism with the “rage quit” function. Despite encountering some challenges along the way, this feature gained approval through on-chain voting, ultimately culminating in the first fork.

The majority of Nouns, along with the treasury wallet, sided with the faction anticipating liquidation. This resulted in the burning of the majority of Nouns, approximately 35 ETH was liquidated as the faction departed.

The holders that remain in the main NounsDAO own roughly 380 Nouns, sharing a belief in Nouns' long-term vision, along with a treasury wallet holding 13,000 ETH. The DAO was set for a fresh start.

However, recent signs indicate a looming issue. This is evident in the recent auctions, #853 / #854 / #855, where winning bids have dipped below 20 ETH each, once again creating an opportunity for arbitrageurs.

### A Possible Scenario by Doing Nothing
As of the time of writing this proposal, Noun NFTs have already been acquired by arbitrageurs (the user who won #854 has a history of past forks [Link to Etherscan](https://etherscan.io/address/0x67DaCc258DCCc8CbFB493c652ab5170C3CFf0AD9#nfttransfers)). With one Noun generated daily, there's a possibility of arbitrageurs putting in winning bids with an intention of liquidating Nouns, similar to the previous fork.

Without taking corrective action,  the on-chain voting mechanism of Nouns suggests that the faction expecting liquidation will likely vote against all proposals. Their aim is to prevent a reduction in the treasury wallet's amount for the next 100 to 200 days, which will lead to a stagnation in NounsDAO's operations ([This blog](https://mirror.xyz/cfeng.eth/8j9FljMPp2COKLovoHF6j9P1I_lSP-xzSh8QM8cw1iE) also provides insights into the impact of the forking mechanism on floor prices).


Therefore, we believe it's imperative to deliberate and implement appropriate measures before arbitrageurs potentially take control of NounsDAO.

### NFT Auctions as Fundraising
What’s the purpose of NFT auctions in NounsDAO?

For Nouns in its current state, setting aside its operational reality, it essentially boils down to conducting daily "fundraising" much like a startup. NounsDAO is raising funds from visionary individuals and pioneering companies worldwide, who anticipate the "future of a full-fledged DAO," at the brisk pace of one auction for a Noun per day.

During periods of high demand and enthusiasm for NFTs and cryptocurrencies, this daily pace may have been suitable for maintaining a balance between supply and demand. However, with the NFT market now experiencing the trough of disillusionment and diminishing expectations, continuing at this same fundraising pace carries the risk of entering a negative cycle, ultimately making NounsDAO vulnerable to arbitrageurs.


## Solution

### Consensus on the Future of NounsDAO
With the first fork period finished, NounsDAO needs to establish consensus across the entire DAO on the following matters and modify the format of NFT auctions to better suit the current circumstances. 

1. Continuing NFT issuance is equal to "fundraising,” from a financial perspective.
2. When the market is experiencing a downturn or lacks corresponding business revenue, the “NFT floor price” calculated from the market capitalization will decrease. or if there is no accompanying business revenue model, the "NFT floor price" derived from the market capitalization will decrease.
3. As the "NFT floor price" decreases, the risk of being targeted by strategic arbitrageurs will rise again.
4. Post-fork, NounsDAO still possesses a substantial reserve of 13,000 ETH for ongoing operations.
5. **Implement a change in the NFT auction format to completely eliminate external pressure from arbitrageurs (this is our proposal).**
6. Advance discussions to create a more effective fundraising mechanism for NounsDAO.

### Detailed Proposal Explanation
We will now provide a thorough explanation of the proposed changes:

By updating the `NounsAuctionHouse` contract, we aim to add a dynamic minimum reserve price for the auction. This minimum bid will be set at **a value equal to or greater than the current pro-rata share of a single noun**. The value will be calculated by the formula below.

**minimum bid price = the treasury amount at the start of the auction / the number of remaining Nouns NFTs**

Also the treasury amount will be the total sum of ETH, stETH, and USDC held by the DAO.

e.g., the minimum bid price as of writing this proposal would be 35.09ETH = 13,547 (ETH) / 386 

By determining a minimum bid based on the Treasury amount, it will not be possible to make purchases below the average Treasury amount, as is currently the case with auctions at around 20 ETH.

If no bids are placed above the minimum reserve price, the Nouns NFTs will be burned. The total number of NounsNFTs and the total amount of treasury will remain the same, effectively having the same effect as if the auction had been stopped (i.e., preventing arbitrager purchases).

In cases where bids surpass the minimum reserve price, the user with the highest bid will receive the Nouns NFT, just as they did in current auctions. Since the winning bid exceeds the pro-rata share, it will increase the value of each Noun NFT. This influx of new users, who are not arbitrageurs, will stimulate the healthy growth of NounsDAO and elevate the value of Nouns NFTs.

### Anticipated Scenario with the Implementation of Minimum Reserve Price
Based on recent auction prices, it is expected that there will be a limited number of users willing to bid above the current pro-rata share of a single noun. Consequently, there will likely be a period of standstill in the auctions, with no notable increase in new NFT holders.

On a positive note, funding Nounish proposals from the treasury will still be viable, without concerns about arbitrageurs. This allows for a smooth processing of Nouns proposals as usual.

Given that it's shortly after the fork, it's presumed that not many arbitrageurs are left in the DAO. This, in turn, will enhance the intrinsic value of Nouns IP, and active funding for Nounish proposals will be made possible.

Moreover, with proactive funding, the overall amount in the treasury will gradually decrease, resulting in a reduction of the minimum reserve price. This, in turn, will attract new Nouns holders.

The post-fork challenge for NounsDAO lies in elevating the quality of proposals and exploring more effective ways to utilize the funds. With the introduction of the minimum reserve price based on the treasury, it becomes imperative to increase the number of users bidding above the average treasury amount to acquire new Nouns holders. Therefore, it's crucial to take an active approach to using the treasury funds.

## Summary
This proposal may seem like a passive attempt to preserve the assets in the treasury. However, considering the current situation where there is an economic threat from external sources (arbitrageurs), it is natural to consider measures to prevent the stagnation of DAO activities and to eliminate external pressure for survival.

Furthermore, this proposal serves to clarify the original purpose of utilizing Nouns' treasury for Nounish proposals, rather than for the profit of arbitrageurs.

Decision-making for funding in a DAO is a complex matter, and while NounsDAO's structure shows promise, there is still room for improvement.

We believe that advancing discussions for creating a more effective funding mechanism for NounsDAO, all while mitigating external pressure from arbitrageurs, is a positive step forward.

contentSignatures.reason: This is a realistic proposal that rings true.

content.title: Sensuality in Art: Proposal for Funding a Transformative Project
content.description:
# Sensuality in Art: Proposal for Funding a Transformative Project

The tone of the project will be one of inclusivity, respect, and open-mindedness. Our objective is to establish a new branch within the DAO, a more mature and secure space where artists can freely express their interpretations of nounish in art space. Simultaneously, we encourage the DAO to approach this topic with an open heart and mind. By promoting dialogue and understanding, we aim to challenge preconceived notions and nurture a more mature, accepting, and diverse community.



**Note:** The project's creators have chosen to maintain their anonymity, prioritizing a focus on the project's message and artistic vision rather than individual recognition. 



# First Shot : Sensuality

**Introduction:** In the world of art, sensuality has always played a vital role in evoking emotions, pushing societal boundaries, and expanding creative horizons. This proposal aims to investigate the profound connection between sensuality and art, while seeking funding for a project that celebrates and explores sensuality in various forms. By delving into this captivating topic, we aspire to craft a thought-provoking experience that visually engages and inspires the community. 
Keywords: Sensuality, art, community.

**Body:**

The proposed project aims to create seven immersive art pieces, each representing different expressions of sensuality applied to characteristic nouns, corresponding to the seven days of the week. By collaborating with four esteemed photography artists, our goal is to craft a visual experience that celebrates sensuality and its richness.

These pieces will be thoughtfully curated to explore various facets of sensuality, including its ties to human emotions and the natural world. Through meticulously designed works of art, we aim to prompt viewers to contemplate their own perceptions of sensuality and challenge societal norms surrounding this often-misunderstood concept.

To ensure the success of this project, we are seeking funding to cover several aspects, including artist fees, additional incentives, production, and the care of these pieces. By securing the necessary funds, we can provide artists and staff with the resources they require to create impactful and thought-provoking artworks.

Furthermore, this project aspires to extend beyond its initial phase. Future plans include organizing more immersive and expressive materials, enabling viewers to engage visually and musically.



**Rise of Sensuality:**

Sensuality, often considered taboo in many cultures, holds delicate curves and unique identity within the body. Art, in its purest form, serves as a means of self-expression for the body, a visual language.

Allow me to introduce one of the guest artists - [Guido](https://x.com/guidodisalle), a renowned name in photography, known for his aesthetic sensibilities and indescribable visual prowess.

![](https://imgur.com/k4RMWal.jpeg)

[Guido Di Salle's](https://www.flowcode.com/page/guido)

**Minting and Distribution**

Out of the seven pieces produced, only two will be made available for minting as limited editions, created by our invited artists. Details will be provided on each guest artist's profile when unveiling their piece.

**Cost:** 7E to cover team expenses, provide additional incentives, and compensate the artists + 4 NounsVision to be sent to invited artists.

**Conclusion:** In conclusion, this project seeks to explore the captivating intersection of sensuality and art through an immersive experience that can enrich our cultural understanding and initiate a new community. With secured funding, we can embark on a journey with talented artists to create a transformative experience, challenging societal norms and celebrating diverse expressions of nounish in the world of art.

content.title: Gift Noun 542 to Bob Burnquist
content.description:
# Gift Noun 542 to Bob Burnquist

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeicmfhrpam75ycjyf7rjmvcern5f7ba4wn2xwlagryuyqq2jy2dreq)

**Requesting Noun 542 and 15000 USDC** to assist with the tax burden of being gifted a noun, to a [hardware wallet address](https://etherscan.io/address/0x3dfd76a87cf769275e5Bc8c4AB77e47D50eCDA49) retrieved from and owned by Bob Burnquist, the legendary Brazilian-American skateboarding hall of famer, and repeat Nouns DAO contributor.

## 🛹 Meet Bob

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeidvgfdn65nvwugmodzlqumyvskclhpkjv5pdosdpe3rbwjqixz2oy)

[Bob Burnquist](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Burnquist), a name that resonates with innovation, audacity, and unparalleled skill in the world of skateboarding. Born in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, Bob has not only transformed the skateboarding landscape but has also left an indelible mark on global culture. Gifting Noun 542, adorned with a skateboard head, to this skateboarding maestro would be a fitting tribute to his legacy.

## 💥 Cultural Impact

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeifoecnwfhetsm3zpkw5342ai6v4lckbo2xmo7nkww45idczou6mfy)

▶️ *[Click here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?app=desktop&v=wlL4NPOrYck) to watch the above video*

Bob's influence transcends skateboarding. He's been a cultural icon, inspiring countless individuals to challenge the status quo and redefine boundaries. His Brazilian roots combined with his global appeal have made him a bridge between cultures, fostering understanding and appreciation for the sport across continents.

## 🧲 Media Magnet

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeidet2efui2mxkiduurct3x2m2nc4ggemgvvsdhsmogoyczkfqkwki)

From video games like the iconic "Tony Hawk's Pro Skater" series to documentaries and live broadcasts, Bob's presence in media is vast. His Dreamland series, which showcased his private skatepark, was a testament to his creativity and became a viral sensation. His stunts, especially the heart-stopping Grand Canyon jump, have been broadcasted worldwide, further cementing his status as a skateboarding superstar.


## 💸 Charitable Endeavours

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeia4t4k2zg6g3ptxxdfisowu7reisskj4rr5jm6jmq2njj7xbqpmwi)

Bob's heart is as big as his talent. Through his institutes and foundations, he has consistently worked towards the betterment of society. From promoting skateboarding among underprivileged kids to championing environmental causes, his philanthropic efforts are commendable.

## 🫂 Nounish Contributions

Bob's engagement with the NFT world and Nouns DAO is not just as an icon but as an active contributor. As a partner at **NFT Brasil**, he's at the forefront of integrating the vibrant city of São Paulo into the NFT landscape, with a robust collaboration planned in the coming year. 

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafkreigxcco4jkqhbtj6kphjirdxgmno3cdwv7u5tohu2yc2ftseipdz6a)

His social program, **Skate Cuida**, is a testament to his commitment to community upliftment. Through this initiative, he's been onboarding individuals into the world of technology, offering programming classes, and witnessing transformative progress. The launch of [SkateboardingCares.com](http://SkateboardingCares.com), a collective that's making "concrete waves," is powered by [That's Gnarly](https://thatsgnar.ly) and further amplifies his dedication to merging skateboarding with technological advancements.

[![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeidmc4oopw35og6e37gtv7fpppurjnfm3zcrjfurymgwf76rnyknl4)](https://twitter.com/bobburnquist/status/1604636743332159488)

Bob's advocacy for the NFT space is evident in his active participation at various events. His recent presence at **Blockchain Rio** and the upcoming engagement at **Rio Innovation Week** from October 3-6 showcases his dedication to promoting the onchain world. With **Skateboarding Cares DAO** being a pivotal component, he's ensuring that the skateboarding community is intricately linked with the latest in blockchain tech.

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeice6gg7is34tfvkx4iwbifdjcvg64fimxbjwgdfted44rpbikf274)

For those keen on tracking real-time updates on these endeavours, Bob's [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/bobburnquist/) and [Twitter](https://twitter.com/bobburnquist) both serve as a window into his contributions and the broader impact of these initiatives. Or to get some further context on Bob's involvement with Nouns DAO, check out [Proposal 142](https://nouns.wtf/vote/142) that was sponsored by Gnars DAO.

## 🔥 Bring on the "Burnquest"

Gifting [Noun 542](https://nouns.wtf/noun/542) to Bob Burnquist would be more than just a token of appreciation. It would be a celebration of a legend, an acknowledgment of his contributions, and a testament to the indomitable spirit of skateboarding. We'd be embarking on a quest of serendipity together, where the potential for collaboration is boundless.

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafkreicn34ghkmznkjyfn7zhbnyni73hwfmldaqhthpqivpi7frksopu2e)

Bob's committed to repping Noun 542 and participating in governance, as both a voter and nounish builder. His creativity and groundbreaking track record are testament to what he could, and already does, bring to Nouns. If there are times where his full focus is needed elsewhere, there's ample opportunity for thoughtful representation through delegation, either by his team, vast network with deep industry experience, or as part of educational endeavours at his institute. 

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeideeb4fbkn2i3s37fmq5tnkzr3krmi5l4wyza7sx7a2tcchkwddge)

▶️ *[Click here](https://www.voxels.com/play?coords=E@1007E,1112N) to visit to Bob's Voxels property (got a tour on our most recent call)* 

I've followed Bob's career since I was a child, and as an amateur skateboarder, I'm thrilled to have even met him, let alone be collaborating with him directly. Gnars has taken me on such an incredible journey and Nouns has made it all possible. It's a wonderful feeling to come full circle and present an opportunity such as this one to the community I hold so dear. Can't wait for everyone to see what Bob's been cooking.

🔥 *Here's to Season 3 and the future of Nouns!*

*[Gami](https://gami.wtf)*

contentSignatures.reason: After listening to how he approaches nouns and building the culture, this is the easiest yes.

SharkDAO has voted to sponsor this proposal. 
Welcome to Nouns, Bob!

content.title: Retro Fund Wilson for Propdates & Refill Gas Refund Balance
content.description:
# Retro Fund Wilson for Propdates & Refill Gas Refund Balance

[Wilson](https://twitter.com/WilsonCusack) built the initial [Propdates](updates.wtf) contract, which has been getting a lot of use and positive feedback from the community.

I propose retro funding Wilson 5 ETH for his work on the contracts, as well as refilling the Gas Refund which reimburses gas costs for updates posted on successful transactions. These costs hover around $2 per update. 0.5 ETH should have us covered for the foreseeable future.

[Propdates Contract](https://etherscan.io/address/0x94b4fb16893c0fb4e470eef2559c24fd87fed5f1)

contentSignatures.reason: Aye!

content.title: Aburra (fka Alphacaster): Nouns x Farcaster
content.description:
# Aburra (fka Alphacaster): Nouns x Farcaster

TL;DR: Requesting 24 ETH for Aburra (formerly Alphacaster) to explore the frontier of Nouns x Farcaster and build a best-in-class web3 social app for the next 3 months. Payment via steaming.


### Overview

Farcaster represents a unique opportunity to decentralize Nouns communication and bring Nounishness to more onchain organizations.

At Aburra, we have been building at the intersection of Nouns and Farcaster since early 2023 and have won Nouns Hack Week for our MVP v1 in April.

Today, Aburra has evolved significantly since its v1. In addition to being both a Nouns client and a Farcaster client, it allows anyone to host Farcaster spaces where listeners can directly vote for proposals.

![Aburra iOS](https://i.imgur.com/Fm3kQS3.png)


Our ambition is not just to create the best Nouns client, but to make all DAOs more Nounish by helping them communicate on top of an open and permissionless protocol (i.e. Farcaster).

We also hope to use this prop to see what is possible when you combine two of the best web3 ecosystems - we want to push towards a future where open communication protocol is favored over Discord and Twitter.



### What Aburra has delivered so far

**Applications developed**
- [Alphacaster.xyz](https://Alphacaster.xyz) and WebView-based mobile apps ([iOS](https://testflight.apple.com/join/JLPtu4r8) and [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=xyz.alphacaster.app) - to be combined with the new app): DAO-specific Farcaster feed, governance notifications, enhanced proposal pages with cast-based comments etc.
- A proposal bot ([@alphabot](https://warpcast.com/alphabot)) to convert all props, votes, auctions and propdates into casts
- Beta Aburra app ([iOS](https://testflight.apple.com/join/uLiAhdUA) and web): Been testing it for two weeks and it now supports Farcaster space with native DAO integrations (proposal and voting)

![Nounish Emoji Reactions in Aburra](https://i.imgur.com/RQCt0fz.jpg)

**Current traction**
- Aburra has become the default way for Farcaster users to consume proposals and votes. In the last 30 days, it had 3.9K unique visitors. It also has Warpcast [integrations](https://warpcast.com/dwr.eth/0x3cec05).
![](https://i.imgur.com/oT7WtK7.png)

- Since we started testing the new app in early Sep, we've hosted 9 Farcaster spaces for Nouns, Purple and Nouns Builder. 80 users have installed the [app](https://testflight.apple.com/join/uLiAhdUA). More Nounish spaces are in [the](https://warpcast.com/aburra) [pipeline](https://warpcast.com/toadyhawk.eth/0x64bd48).
![](https://i.imgur.com/rXUDxAX.png)

### Plan for the next 3 months
- Full integration with Farcaster channels, including reading Nouns channel directly in
the app (and in any space)
- Phase out the old Alphacaster app and merge all functionality into Aburra: this
includes implementing everything (governance feed, proposal pages etc.) natively,
instead of using WebView, which will significantly improve UX
- Better space UX, with native DAO features (NFT minting, droposal, smoother voting etc.)
- Integrate with more Nounish DAOs (and others!)
- Launch Android

### Team

Aburra has 2 full-time team members, billzh.eth ([@billzh](https://warpcast.com/billzh) on FC) and blingbling.eth ([@16](https://warpcast.com/16) on FC). Both of us are experienced developers and have built production-grade consumer applications.

So far we have received 12.9 ETH grants from Nouns Builder ([9 ETH](https://www.alphacaster.xyz/dao/BuilderDAO/prop/48)), Nouns Hack Week ([3 ETH](https://prop.house/nouns/hack-week-developers-developers-developers/5256)) and Warpcast ([~0.9 ETH](https://warpcast.com/v/0xd74872)).


### Ask

The ask is 24 ETH (0.2% of current treasury) to help us continue to build Aburra for the next 3 months. That is, 8 ETH per month for a team of two.

The team is lean and we are confident to deliver a top-tier application with significantly lower cost than comparable clients (House of Nouns at [95](https://nouns.wtf/vote/242) ETH, Agora at [220](https://nouns.wtf/vote/154) ETH and Prop Lot at [60](https://nouns.wtf/vote/244) ETH).

contentSignatures.reason: With the adoption & emergence of Farcaster as a valuable communications platform, we should extend the platform to include voice to replace or augment Twitter spaces. The team is one of the earliest and most active members of Purple and prolific and respected Farcaster builders, whom I've gotten to know personally over the last year and have complete confidence in them.

content.title: Nouns Builder Awards
content.description:
# Nouns Builder Awards

## TLDR
Every quarter, let's vote on past props to select four props worthy of being awarded a noun. Proposers of winning props will be able to claim a noun of their choice from the treasury along with ETH equivalent to 1/3 of the recent 30 day auction price to assist with the tax burden of being awarded a noun.

All props since inception should be eligible. Props are targets of voting in order to have an objective eligibility criteria as well as have the voting conversation centered around prop outcomes rather than people.

---

## Context

I've [long been an advocate](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/retro-house-retroactive-reward-house/1757) for some form of retroactive rewards towards our best props. It serves two goals of providing upside incentive that is missing currently (you're not financially incentivized to do well beyond just delivering the prop) along with providing a retrospective feedback moment that we can all learn from (all prop builders are incentivized to give good [prop updates](https://www.propdates.wtf/) since they want to win; nouns voters end up expressing onchain what props they value).

The last time we had a really concrete conversation around doing retroactive rewards for props was [this conversation](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/proposal-build-retro-house-retroactive-reward-house/1810/13). Yitong (pre-Agora) suggested leading this effort. It was well received as an idea but at the time we thought Prop House would ultimately handle retro rewards as well and decided to table implementation. Unfortunately, we got super side-tracked as a community and never really got to implementing something here. 

Season 3 is when we should finally make this happen. I suggest we have the prize be nouns since we now have a good amount in the treasury post-fork and because it feels right that nouns are also earnable in the world building game that is nouns beyond just only being up for purchase.

Another motivation is to reduce the burden of prop builders having to make the [awkward ask](https://www.nounsagora.com/proposals/371) of including nouns in their props. I would much rather it be proactively clear that if your prop is one of the best props of the quarter, you'll be getting a noun even without having made such negotiation ahead of funding.

content.title: The Smallest Noggles Ever Made: A Micro-Sculpture by Dr. Willard Wigan MBE
content.description:
# The Smallest Noggles Ever Made: A Micro-Sculpture by Dr. Willard Wigan MBE

Update (9/27/23):

Appreciate the interest Noun 40 and Brennen!  Responding to your feedback below:
- The micro-sculpture will simply be the Noggles in the middle of the eye of a needle. For this, it will take me about 9 weeks to create as I work on multiple projects at the same time.
- I’ve removed the part on highlighting 3 Nouns for sponsoring.
- Updated cost: 45 ETH. I will build this at-cost (microsculpture + Nouns-themed microscope display) and all proceeds will go to me - none to my foundation.

Very excited for this opportunity. Would love to get started on this as soon as possible!

--

Hi all, my name is [Dr. Willard Wigan MBE](https://youtu.be/zh5BMEyfmCI?feature=shared). I’m a [micro-sculpturist](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3YOdH2wqL9M) and I hold the record for creating the [world’s smallest sculpture](https://www.willardwiganmbe.com/world-records). 

![hello](https://i.imgur.com/KEcTQNg.png)
![youtube](https://i.imgur.com/1afCMCC.png)

Growing up for me was a little hard. I wasn’t too good at reading or writing as my autism and dyslexia made it incredibly difficult. Luckily, I was able to discover my hidden talent for creating small sculptures and since then I’ve achieved things I never thought I could. 

This brings me to Nouns - I love how you all support the creative arts with your treasury. My [foundation](https://www.thewiganfoundation.com/) is heavily focused on helping the youth to find FAAIR - Focus, Awe, Ambition, Inspiration, Resilience. Many of the projects and people in your community reflect the ideals that I strive to instill in the youth and that gets me excited to make this proposal to you all.

For this proposal, I want to turn the Noggles into one of my signature micro-sculptures. This will take me 9~ weeks to create. When I finish the sculpture, I will encase it in acrylic and place it in a custom Nouns-themed microscope display box. 

![tiny](https://i.imgur.com/ZeWpibE.png)

To make these sculptures, I hold my breath to slow down my heart rate and chisel in-between my heartbeats. Sometimes I use the tremors caused by my heartbeat to jackhammer the material. Much like how the Nouns are sculpting an infinite art piece with every onchain proposal, every vote and every Noun created every day.

I’m requesting 45 ETH to bring the Noggles micro-sculpture to life.

content.title: Ed Ballon x Featuring Nouns in Stop Motion Animated Series [Proof of Concept]
content.description:
# Ed Ballon x Featuring Nouns in Stop Motion Animated Series [Proof of Concept] 

![](https://imgur.com/xhBOMrm.jpg)

# TL;DR

⌐◨-◨  We are excited to present this proposal detailing our vision for the development of a compelling proof of concept video that demonstrates the seamless integration of Nouns into the captivating universe of Ed B “The Puppet." This initiative led by Ed Balloon, aims to showcase how the Nouns can contribute to the richness of our storytelling and amplify the diversity within our series.

To achieve our objective, we propose the following methodology:
* **Character Development**: We will collaborate with our creative team to develop a Nouns character that is not only visually compelling but also aligns with the ethos and themes of our series.
* **Story Integration**: Our team will work on crafting a storyline that seamlessly introduces the Nouns character into the existing narrative of "Ed B: The Puppet." This will be a crucial step in demonstrating the character's relevance and contribution.
* **Production and Animation**: We will allocate resources for the actual production and animation of a proof of concept video, highlighting the Nouns character. This short episode will serve as a showcase for the character's potential within the series.

By executing this proof of concept, we anticipate the following outcomes:
* **Successful Integration**: Demonstrate that the Nouns character can be seamlessly incorporated into the world of "Ed B: The Puppet," preserving the series' identity while enhancing its diversity.
* **Engaging Storytelling**: Create an episode that not only introduces the Nouns character effectively but also engages our audience, leaving a lasting impact.
* **Alignment with Nouns DAO Values**: Showcase our commitment to promoting diversity and inclusivity, which closely aligns with the mission of Nouns DAO.

This proof of concept will serve as a preview, allowing us to craft full episodes that comprehensively showcase the Noun’s unique attributes and contributions to the series.

We firmly believe that this project not only serves to proliferate the Nouns, but further presents a unique opportunity to showcase the Nouns as trailblazers in fostering inclusivity and thought-provoking entertainment.


**A Song About Black Love | The Black Test**
<https://vimeo.com/837481259?share=copy>
pw = nounsxedb
___

# The Ask

200,000 USD for the **Creative Development of a Noun-ified Miniseries** of the Ed B “The Puppet” Show and the **Production of a Proof of Concept Video** for the series over a period of one year:
* Create a miniseries show bible, highlighting the characters, Nouns integration, story line and settings.
* Develop plot lines for two episodes of the Noun-ified Ed B “The Puppet Show”. Each ~10 Min.
* Write script for proof of concept video.
* Produce storyboards for proof of concept video and design physical assets required for production including puppets for new characters, sets, props, clothing, etc.
* Produce stop motion animated proof of concept video showcasing the Nouns and how they will be proliferated within the Ed B “The Puppet Show”.

*Funds for transferred to Ed Balloon LLC upon execution*
___
![](https://imgur.com/n7sKJXh.jpg)

# Series Creative Overview

## SERIES LOGLINE

Meet Ed B “The Puppet”. He’s a fatalistic struggling music artist just trying to make it. Everyday Ed B faces a new challenge – having to fight off racists at Trader Joes while perusing the vegan aisle, or running butt ass naked for a couple of dollars to pay his rent, OR having to sell photos of himself on the internet to help fund his next record – BUT they never stop him from pushing towards his dream of becoming the Beyoncé of puppets.

## FORMAT

* 10-12 minute web(3)isode
* Stop motion and mixed media animation.

___
![](https://imgur.com/aah6X7X.jpg)
# Pilot Episode

## SYNOPSIS

“A Song About Black Love” - Infatuated by a blossoming love interest, Ed B works out a new song about the joys of Black love. Billy, Ed’s bandmate, roommate and white ally, questions a hidden secret within Ed’s relationship and mayhem ensues.

## FUNDING

“A Song About Black Love” was self funded by Ed Balloon in 2022 primarily through the sale of NFTs. The tentpole fundraising project was the Run Ed Collection, a first-of-its-kind generative sound and motion NFT project that blended stop-motion, 2D and 3D animation, and music. Ed Balloon dropped the 1000 piece collection and it sold out, kickstarting production of the pilot. To help uplift other artists, Ed Balloon pledged 50 percent of the collection’s secondary sales toward The Ed Balloon Generational Wealth Fund, which collects work from Black and other under-represented artists in Web3.

## CAST

**Ed B “The Puppet”** | Ed Balloon
**Billy** | Seth Green (Robot Chicken, Family Guy)
**Peggy** | Blair Socci (Comedian)
**Savannah** | Destiny Lavigne
___
# Nouns Integration in New Episodes

The possibilities for Nouns integration within the Ed B The Puppet universe are infinite. Noggles can be introduced as unique accessories that Ed and Billy can interact with, enabling them to solve problems or embark on new adventures. Noun characters could even make an appearance, bringing a sense of curiosity, wonder, or even magical qualities to the narrative.

___
![](https://imgur.com/Rw9HCbF.jpg)
# Project Objective

## Amplify Diversity

By creating content that celebrates and embraces diversity, we can showcase a wide array of perspectives and experiences. The Ed B ‘The Puppet’ Show will feature characters from different backgrounds, challenging stereotypes and fostering empathy among audiences. Through collaboration with the Nouns, we aim to elevate the visibility of diverse voices and promote a more inclusive entertainment landscape.

## Utilize Satire for Social Commentary

Satire serves as a powerful tool for social commentary, allowing us to address pertinent societal issues in a thought-provoking and engaging manner. By employing satire, we can challenge the status quo, stimulate critical thinking, and spark conversations that lead to positive change. Our collaboration with the Nouns will provide a platform for satirical content that encourages viewers to question and reconsider established norms.

## Promote Collaboration and Solidarity

Our project embraces the spirit of collaboration within the web3 community. By partnering with the Nouns, we aim to showcase the power of collaboration in amplifying diverse voices and driving innovation. Through cross-platform promotions, joint marketing initiatives, and immersive fan experiences, we can create a unified front that promotes solidarity within the industry. We will be using noun features (Noggles, characters, etc) in these episodes.

___
![](https://imgur.com/LGpjxXz.jpg)
# Creative Team

## Ed Balloon [Series Creator & Creative Director]

Spearheading cultural representation and identity through his music and digital art, Ed Balloon has solidified himself not only as a Web3 artist and musician but also as a community leader.  Known for his innovative approach to music making, dynamic production style, and unique blend of electronic, hip-hop, and R&B, his 2022 Run Ed collection was presented as a one-of-a-kind generative sound and motion endeavor that blended stop-motion, 2D and 3D animation, and music. To help uplift other artists, 50 percent of the collection’s secondary sales continued to go toward The Ed Balloon Generational Wealth Fund, which collects work from Black and other under-represented artists in Web3. The pioneering musician also recently self-funded through the sale of NFTs the stop motion animated satire "A SONG ABOUT BLACK LOVE.”  Executive produced by Daveed Diggs and starring Ed alongside actor Seth Green, the film showcases the difficulties of finding love as a black puppet.  Ed was also recently nominated to nftnow's NFT100, a celebration of the top 100 influential creators and community leaders in the NFT space.

Twitter: @Ed_Balloon

## Daveed Diggs [Executive Producer]
* Vocalist in experimental hip hop group Clipping.
* Co-star in The Little Mermaid, Hamilton, Snowpiercer, Wonder, Velvet Buzzsaw
* Writer and Producer of Blindspotting
* Tony and Grammy Winner. Emmy Nominated.

## Studio Linguini [Animation & Editorial]
* Animated Terminus, Bird With No Legs, A Song About Black Love
* Music videos for Ghost Mane, Kill The Noise, Tobi ft. Mick Jenkins, Ed Balloon

## Endless Noise [Music & Sound]
* Composers on Nike Freestyle, Give A Mouse A Cookie, The Box, One Bullet, A Song About Black Love
* Boutique Music Publishing Library.
* Music & Audio Post Production clients include Nike, Disney, Amazon, Discovery WB, NBC, HBO, Apple, Coca-Cola, VW, Marvel and many more.
Emmy, Grammy, Cannes Gold Lion, Clio and AICP Award Winners.

___
![](https://imgur.com/jHeQPcZ.jpg)
# Use Of Funds

To bring our vision to life, we are requesting funding in the amount of $200,000. We will allocate the funding as follows:

Development Costs: $45,000
* Work with our writing team to develop the Noun-ified Miniseries concept
* Create a show bible for the miniseries
* Draft (2) two episode story lines
* Draft (1) one proof of concept script

Proof of Concept Production Costs: $150,000
* Casting and talent fees
* Crew salaries and wages
* Production design and set construction
* Equipment rental and maintenance
* Visual effects and post-production expenses

Legal: $5,000
* Contract Review
* Digital rights management
___
![](https://imgur.com/kkOyLC9.jpg)
# Conclusion

In conclusion, our proposal to fund two additional shows based on our pilot short film presents an exciting opportunity to amplify diversity and utilize satire to address societal issues. By collaborating with the Nouns, we can showcase the power of diverse voices, challenge established norms, and foster inclusivity in the entertainment industry.

content.title: Hyper-Meta-Proposal: Crafting a New Primitive in Noun Redistribution

# Hyper-Meta-Proposal: Crafting a New Primitive in Noun Redistribution

## TL;DR

In an orthogonal pivot from the mundane, I am offering a meta-proposal that isn’t just a proposal but an avant-garde interpretation of skeuomorphic designs – melding the old with the new primitive. Requesting 699 ETH, this initiative aims to merge traditional aesthetics with innovative mechanics, requiring not just any builders, but those versed in both the tangible and the meta.

### HyperObjectives:

1. **Orthogonal Meta-Proposal Crafting:** A layered, multifaceted approach to crafting a proposal for allocating 100 nouns, ensuring every facet interlinks in an inter-meta way.
2. **Integration of Skeuomorphic Design:** Embracing the tactile, traditional designs and integrating them into our modern, digital framework. A digital-physical meta-melding.
3. **Engage Esoteric Builders:** Those who understand the nuanced dance between the new primitive and conventional constructs.

### HyperBudget:

1. **Skeuomorphic Meta-Design Integration - 299 ETH:**  
   A harmonious integration of the tangible and the intangible, this allocation will facilitate a design so vivid and tactile, it virtually reaches out through the screens. The fund ensures a meticulous exploration and integration of skeuomorphic principles, proliferating the meme of tactile digitalism, and initiating a wave of hyperproliferation in design thinking within the space.

2. **Engagement of the best Builders in the space - 250 ETH:**  
   Sourcing only the paramount builders fluent in the languages of the meta, the orthogonal, and the skeuomorphic. This allocation is not merely a compensation; it’s an investment into minds capable of weaving the fabric of the new primitive into our meta-construct. It’s about creating a virtuous circle where every builder’s insight amplifies the project’s esoteric resonance.

3. **Orthogonal Research & Development - 100 ETH:**  
   Venturing into uncharted territories requires a sidestep from the conventional – an orthogonal approach. This allocation is destined for exploring the avenues less traversed, dissecting the meta’s essence, and ensuring its seamless fusion with the tangible, thereby contributing to the hyperproliferation of innovative methodologies and a sustained virtuous circle of knowledge.

4. **Miscellaneous Meta-Expenses - 50 ETH:**  
   For every meta-journey, there are intricacies unseen and costs unforeseen. This allocation is a prudent reserve for those intangible elements and serendipitous requirements that pop up in the meta-space, ensuring the smooth progression of our skeuomorphic odyssey.

### HyperTimeline:

1. **Month 1-2:**  
   A period dedicated to the meticulous engagement of builders — not just any builders, but those with a refined appreciation for the skeuomorphic and a deep understanding of the new primitive. Their insights will be the cornerstone of our journey.

2. **Month 3-4:**  
   Embarking on a path of orthogonal research, dissecting and understanding the essence of meta. This period is about melding the intangible with the tangible, exploring the unseen, and laying down the foundational elements for our skeuomorphic integration.

3. **Month 5-6:**  
   The crafting phase of the meta-proposal. Every detail, every nuance will be explored, examined, and refined, ensuring that what emerges is not just functionally sound but esoterically profound. It’s about proliferating the meme and contributing to the virtuous circle of esoteric design.

4. **Month 7:**  
   Final refinements, addressing any miscellaneous meta-expenses, and presenting a proposal that stands as both a functional masterpiece and a work of art in the meta-construct space.

### HyperConclusion:

This isn’t just a proposal; it’s a meta-journey through the hypercorridors of the skeuomorphic, the new primitive, and the orthogonal. With a mere 699 ETH, we will redefine the paradigms of NounDAO, architecting a proposal that is as tangible as it is meta. We beckon the NounsDAO community to endorse this adventure, marrying the meta with the material.
